  • src
  • core_init_atmosphere
mpas_init_atm_cases.F
Go to the documentation of this file.
1! Copyright (c) 2013, Los Alamos National Security, LLC (LANS)
2! and the University Corporation for Atmospheric Research (UCAR).
3!
4! Unless noted otherwise source code is licensed under the BSD license.
5! Additional copyright and license information can be found in the LICENSE file
6! distributed with this code, or at http://mpas-dev.github.com/license.html
7!
8module init_atm_cases
9
10 use mpas_kind_types
11 use mpas_derived_types
12 use mpas_pool_routines
13 use mpas_constants
14 use mpas_dmpar
15 use mpas_sort
16 use atm_advection
17 use mpas_rbf_interpolation
18 use mpas_vector_reconstruction
19 use mpas_timer
20 use mpas_init_atm_static
21 use mpas_init_atm_surface
22 use mpas_atmphys_constants, only: svpt0,svp1,svp2,svp3
23 use mpas_atmphys_functions
24 use mpas_atmphys_initialize_real
25 use mpas_log, only : mpas_log_write
26
27 ! Added only clause to keep xlf90 from getting confused from the overloaded abs intrinsic in mpas_timekeeping
28 use mpas_timekeeping !, only: MPAS_Time_type, MPAS_TimeInterval_type, MPAS_Clock_type, &
29 ! mpas_set_time, mpas_set_timeInterval, mpas_get_time, operator(+), add_t_ti
30
31
32
33 contains
34
35
36 subroutine init_atm_setup_case(domain, stream_manager)
37 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
38 ! Configure grid metadata and model state for the hydrostatic test case
39 ! specified in the namelist
40 !
41 ! Output: block - a subset (not necessarily proper) of the model domain to be
42 ! initialized
43 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
44
45 use mpas_stream_manager
46 use mpas_init_atm_gwd, only : compute_gwd_fields
47
48 implicit none
49
50 type (domain_type), intent(inout) :: domain
51 type (MPAS_streamManager_type), intent(inout) :: stream_manager
52
53
54 integer :: i
55 integer :: ierr
56 type (block_type), pointer :: block_ptr
57
58 type (mpas_pool_type), pointer :: mesh
59 type (mpas_pool_type), pointer :: fg
60 type (mpas_pool_type), pointer :: state
61 type (mpas_pool_type), pointer :: diag
62 type (mpas_pool_type), pointer :: diag_physics
63 type (mpas_pool_type), pointer :: lbc_state
64
65 integer, pointer :: config_init_case
66 logical, pointer :: config_static_interp
67 logical, pointer :: config_native_gwd_static
68 logical, pointer :: config_met_interp
69 logical, pointer :: config_blend_bdy_terrain
70 character (len=StrKIND), pointer :: config_start_time
71 character (len=StrKIND), pointer :: config_met_prefix
72
73 character(len=StrKIND), pointer :: mminlu
74 character(len=StrKIND), pointer :: xtime
75
76 type (MPAS_Time_type) :: curr_time, stop_time
77 type (MPAS_TimeInterval_type) :: clock_interval, lbc_stream_interval, surface_stream_interval
78 character(len=StrKIND) :: timeString
79
80 integer, pointer :: nCells
81 integer, pointer :: nEdges
82 integer, pointer :: nVertLevels
83
84 ! The next four variables are needed in the argument list for blend_bdy_terrain
85 ! with the dryrun argument set to true; accordingly, we never actually need to
86 ! set these pointers to fields
87 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: latcell
88 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: loncell
89 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: ter
90 integer, dimension(:), pointer :: bdyMaskCell
91
92
93 call mpas_pool_get_config(domain % blocklist % configs, 'config_init_case', config_init_case)
94
95 if ((config_init_case == 1) .or. (config_init_case == 2) .or. (config_init_case == 3)) then
96
97 call mpas_log_write(' Jablonowski and Williamson baroclinic wave test case ')
98 if (config_init_case == 1) call mpas_log_write(' no initial perturbation ')
99 if (config_init_case == 2) call mpas_log_write(' initial perturbation included ')
100 if (config_init_case == 3) call mpas_log_write(' normal-mode perturbation included ')
101 block_ptr => domain % blocklist
102 do while (associated(block_ptr))
103
104 call mpas_pool_get_config(block_ptr % configs, 'config_static_interp', config_static_interp)
105 call mpas_pool_get_config(block_ptr % configs, 'config_met_interp', config_met_interp)
106
107 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'mesh', mesh)
108 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'state', state)
109 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'diag', diag)
110
111 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nCells', ncells)
112 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nVertLevels', nvertlevels)
113
114 call mpas_log_write(' calling test case setup ')
115 call init_atm_case_jw(mesh, ncells, nvertlevels, state, diag, block_ptr % configs, config_init_case)
116 call decouple_variables(mesh, ncells, nvertlevels, state, diag)
117 call mpas_log_write(' returned from test case setup ')
118 block_ptr => block_ptr % next
119 end do
120
121 else if ((config_init_case == 4) .or. (config_init_case == 5)) then
122
123 call mpas_log_write(' squall line - super cell test case ')
124 if (config_init_case == 4) call mpas_log_write(' squall line test case')
125 if (config_init_case == 5) call mpas_log_write(' supercell test case')
126 block_ptr => domain % blocklist
127 do while (associated(block_ptr))
128
129 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nCells', ncells)
130 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nVertLevels', nvertlevels)
131
132 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'mesh', mesh)
133 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'state', state)
134 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'diag', diag)
135
136 call mpas_log_write(' calling test case setup ')
137 call init_atm_case_squall_line(domain % dminfo, mesh, ncells, nvertlevels, state, diag, config_init_case)
138 call decouple_variables(mesh, ncells, nvertlevels, state, diag)
139 call mpas_log_write(' returned from test case setup ')
140 block_ptr => block_ptr % next
141 end do
142
143 else if (config_init_case == 6 ) then
144
145 call mpas_log_write(' mountain wave test case ')
146 block_ptr => domain % blocklist
147 do while (associated(block_ptr))
148
149 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nCells', ncells)
150 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nVertLevels', nvertlevels)
151
152 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'mesh', mesh)
153 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'state', state)
154 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'diag', diag)
155
156 call mpas_log_write(' calling test case setup ')
157 call init_atm_case_mtn_wave(domain % dminfo, mesh, ncells, nvertlevels, state, diag, block_ptr % configs, config_init_case)
158 call decouple_variables(mesh, ncells, nvertlevels, state, diag)
159 call mpas_log_write(' returned from test case setup ')
160 block_ptr => block_ptr % next
161 end do
162
163 else if (config_init_case == 7 ) then
164
165
166 call mpas_log_write(' real-data GFS test case ')
167 block_ptr => domain % blocklist
168
169 do while (associated(block_ptr))
170
171 call mpas_pool_get_config(block_ptr % configs, 'config_static_interp', config_static_interp)
172 call mpas_pool_get_config(block_ptr % configs, 'config_native_gwd_static', config_native_gwd_static)
173 call mpas_pool_get_config(block_ptr % configs, 'config_met_interp', config_met_interp)
174 call mpas_pool_get_config(block_ptr % configs, 'config_blend_bdy_terrain', config_blend_bdy_terrain)
175
176 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'mesh', mesh)
177 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'fg', fg)
178 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'state', state)
179 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'diag', diag)
180 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'diag_physics', diag_physics)
181
182 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nCells', ncells)
183 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nEdges', nedges)
184 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nVertLevels', nvertlevels)
185
186 !
187 ! Before proceeding with any other processing that takes non-trivial time (e.g., static field interpolation),
188 ! check that the intermediate file with terrain information exists if config_blend_bdy_terrain = true.
189 !
190 ! NB: When calling blend_bdy_terrain(...) with the 'dryrun' argument set, the nCells, latCell, lonCell,
191 ! bdyMaskCell, and ter arguments are not used -- only the config_met_prefix and config_start_time
192 ! arguments are used.
193 !
194 if (config_blend_bdy_terrain) then
195 call mpas_pool_get_config(block_ptr % configs, 'config_start_time', config_start_time)
196 call mpas_pool_get_config(block_ptr % configs, 'config_met_prefix', config_met_prefix)
197
198 call blend_bdy_terrain(config_met_prefix, config_start_time, &
199 ncells, latcell, loncell, bdymaskcell, ter, .true., ierr)
200 if (ierr /= 0) then
201 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
202 call mpas_log_write('Blending of terrain along domain boundaries would fail, and', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
203 call mpas_log_write('config_blend_bdy_terrain = true in the namelist.init_atmosphere file.', &
204 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
205 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
206 end if
207 end if
208
209 if (config_static_interp) then
210
211 !
212 ! Without a convex mesh partition file, interpolating static fields in parallel
213 ! will give incorrect results. Since it is very unlikely that typical users
214 ! will have convex partitions, it's safer to just stop if multiple MPI tasks are
215 ! detected when performing the static_interp step.
216 !
217 if (domain % dminfo % nprocs > 1) then
218 call mpas_log_write('****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
219 call mpas_log_write('Error: Interpolation of static fields does not work in parallel.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
220 call mpas_log_write('Please run the static_interp step using only a single MPI task.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
221 call mpas_log_write('****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
222 end if
223
224 call init_atm_static(mesh, block_ptr % dimensions, block_ptr % configs)
225 end if
226
227 if (config_native_gwd_static) then
228 call mpas_log_write(' ')
229 call mpas_log_write('Computing GWDO static fields on the native MPAS mesh')
230 call mpas_log_write(' ')
231 ierr = compute_gwd_fields(domain)
232 if (ierr /= 0) then
233 call mpas_log_write('****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
234 call mpas_log_write('Error while trying to compute sub-grid-scale orography', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
235 call mpas_log_write('statistics for use with the GWDO scheme.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
236 call mpas_log_write('****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
237 end if
238 end if
239
240 !
241 ! If at this point the mminlu variable is blank, we assume that the static interp step was
242 ! not run, and that we are working with a static file created before there was a choice
243 ! of land use datasets; in this case, the dataset was almost necessarily USGS
244 !
245 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'mminlu', mminlu)
246 if (len_trim(mminlu) == 0) then
247 call mpas_log_write('****************************************************************')
248 call mpas_log_write('No information on land use dataset is available.')
249 call mpas_log_write('Assume that we are using ''USGS''.')
250 call mpas_log_write('****************************************************************')
251 write(mminlu,'(a)') 'USGS'
252 end if
253
254 call init_atm_case_gfs(block_ptr, mesh, ncells, nedges, nvertlevels, fg, state, &
255 diag, diag_physics, config_init_case, block_ptr % dimensions, block_ptr % configs)
256
257 if (config_met_interp) then
258 call physics_initialize_real(mesh, fg, domain % dminfo, block_ptr % dimensions, block_ptr % configs)
259 end if
260
261 block_ptr => block_ptr % next
262 end do
263
264 else if (config_init_case == 8 ) then
265
266 call mpas_log_write('real-data surface (SST) update test case ')
267
268 !
269 ! Check that config_fg_interval matches the output_interval of the surface stream
270 !
271 clock_interval = mpas_get_clock_timestep(domain % clock, ierr=ierr)
272 surface_stream_interval = mpas_stream_mgr_get_stream_interval(stream_manager, 'surface', mpas_stream_output, ierr)
273 if (clock_interval /= surface_stream_interval) then
274 call mpas_log_write('****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
275 call mpas_log_write('The intermediate SST file interval specified by ''config_fg_interval''', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
276 call mpas_log_write('does not match the output_interval for the ''surface'' stream.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
277 call mpas_log_write('Please correct the namelist.init_atmosphere and/or', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
278 call mpas_log_write('streams.init_atmosphere files.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
279 call mpas_log_write('****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
280 end if
281
282 block_ptr => domain % blocklist
283 do while (associated(block_ptr))
284 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'mesh', mesh)
285 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'fg', fg)
286 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'state', state)
287
288 ! Defined in mpas_init_atm_surface.F
289 call init_atm_case_sfc(domain, domain % dminfo, stream_manager, mesh, fg, state, block_ptr % dimensions, block_ptr % configs)
290 block_ptr => block_ptr % next
291 end do
292
293 else if (config_init_case == 9 ) then
294
295 call mpas_log_write('Lateral boundary conditions case')
296
297 !
298 ! Check that the first-guess interval (which is the same as the clock timestep)
299 ! matches the output interval of the 'lbc' stream
300 !
301 clock_interval = mpas_get_clock_timestep(domain % clock, ierr=ierr)
302 lbc_stream_interval = mpas_stream_mgr_get_stream_interval(stream_manager, 'lbc', mpas_stream_output, ierr)
303 if (clock_interval /= lbc_stream_interval) then
304 call mpas_log_write('****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
305 call mpas_log_write('The intermediate file interval specified by ''config_fg_interval''', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
306 call mpas_log_write('does not match the output_interval for the ''lbc'' stream.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
307 call mpas_log_write('Please correct the namelist.init_atmosphere and/or', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
308 call mpas_log_write('streams.init_atmosphere files.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
309 call mpas_log_write('****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
310 end if
311
312 curr_time = mpas_get_clock_time(domain % clock, mpas_now)
313 stop_time = mpas_get_clock_time(domain % clock, mpas_stop_time)
314
315 do while (curr_time <= stop_time)
316
317 block_ptr => domain % blocklist
318 do while (associated(block_ptr))
319 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'mesh', mesh)
320 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'fg', fg)
321 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'state', state)
322 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'diag', diag)
323 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'lbc_state', lbc_state)
324
325 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'xtime', xtime)
326
327 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nCells', ncells)
328 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nEdges', nedges)
329 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(block_ptr % dimensions, 'nVertLevels', nvertlevels)
330
331 call mpas_get_time(curr_time, datetimestring=timestring)
332 xtime = timestring ! Set field valid time, xtime, to the current time in the time loop
333
334 call init_atm_case_lbc(timestring, block_ptr, mesh, ncells, nedges, nvertlevels, fg, state, &
335 diag, lbc_state, block_ptr % dimensions, block_ptr % configs)
336
337 block_ptr => block_ptr % next
338 end do
339
340 call mpas_stream_mgr_write(stream_manager, streamid='lbc', ierr=ierr)
341 call mpas_stream_mgr_reset_alarms(stream_manager, streamid='lbc', direction=mpas_stream_output, ierr=ierr)
342
343 call mpas_advance_clock(domain % clock)
344 curr_time = mpas_get_clock_time(domain % clock, mpas_now)
345
346 end do
347
348 !
349 ! Ensure that no output alarms are still ringing for the 'lbc' stream after
350 ! we exit the time loop above; the main run routine may write out all other
351 ! output streams with ringing alarms.
352 !
353 call mpas_stream_mgr_reset_alarms(stream_manager, streamid='lbc', direction=mpas_stream_output, ierr=ierr)
354
355 else
356
357 call mpas_log_write(' ****************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
358 call mpas_log_write(' Only test cases 1 through 9 are currently supported.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
359 call mpas_log_write(' ****************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
360
361 end if
362
363
364 !initialization of surface input variables technically not needed to run our current set of
365 !idealized test cases:
366 if (config_init_case < 7) then
367 block_ptr => domain % blocklist
368 do while (associated(block_ptr))
369 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'mesh', mesh)
370 call mpas_pool_get_subpool(block_ptr % structs, 'fg', fg)
371
372 call physics_idealized_init(mesh, fg)
373
374 block_ptr => block_ptr % next
375 end do
376 end if
377
378 end subroutine init_atm_setup_case
379
380!----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
381
382 subroutine init_atm_case_jw(mesh, nCells, nVertLevels, state, diag, configs, test_case)
383 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
384 ! Setup baroclinic wave test case from Jablonowski and Williamson 2008 (QJRMS)
385 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
386
387 implicit none
388
389 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: mesh
390 integer, intent(in) :: nCells
391 integer, intent(in) :: nVertLevels
392 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: state
393 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: diag
394 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(in) :: configs
395 integer, intent(in) :: test_case
396
397 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: u0 = 35.0
398 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: alpha_grid = 0. ! no grid rotation
399
400! real (kind=RKIND), parameter :: omega_e = 7.29212e-05
401 real (kind=rkind) :: omega_e
402
403 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: t0b = 250., t0 = 288., delta_t = 4.8e+05, dtdz = 0.005, eta_t = 0.2
404 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: u_perturbation = 1., pert_radius = 0.1, latitude_pert = 40., longitude_pert = 20.
405 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: theta_c = pii/4.0
406 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: lambda_c = 3.0*pii/2.0
407 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: k_x = 9. ! Normal mode wave number
408
409 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: rdzw, dzu, rdzu, fzm, fzp
410 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: surface_pressure
411 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: zgrid, zxu, zz, hx
412 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: pressure, ppb, pb, rho_zz, rb, rr, tb, rtb, p, pp, dss, t, rt
413 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: u, ru, w, rw, v
414 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: rho, theta
415 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: zb, zb3
416 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: deriv_two
417
418!.. initialization of moisture:
419 integer, pointer :: index_qv
420 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: rh_max = 0.40 ! Maximum relative humidity
421! real (kind=RKIND), parameter :: rh_max = 0.70 ! Maximum relative humidity
422 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels, nCells) :: qsat, relhum
423 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: scalars
424!.. end initialization of moisture.
425
426 integer :: iCell, iCell1, iCell2 , iEdge, vtx1, vtx2, ivtx, i, k, nz, itr, itrp, cell1, cell2
427 integer, pointer :: nz1, nCellsSolve, nEdges, maxEdges, nVertices
428
429 !This is temporary variable here. It just need when calculate tangential velocity v.
430 integer :: eoe, j
431 integer, dimension(:), pointer :: nEdgesOnEdge, nEdgesOnCell
432 integer, dimension(:,:), pointer :: edgesOnEdge, cellsOnEdge, verticesOnEdge, cellsOnCell
433 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: weightsonedge
434
435 real (kind=rkind) :: flux, fluxk, lat1, lat2, eta_v, r_pert, u_pert, lat_pert, lon_pert, r
436
437 real (kind=rkind) :: ptop, p0, phi
438 real (kind=rkind) :: lon_edge
439
440 real (kind=rkind) :: r_earth, etavs, ztemp, zd, zt, dz, gam, delt, str
441
442 real (kind=rkind) :: es, qvs, xnutr, znut, ptemp
443 integer :: iter
444
445 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1 ) :: hyai, hybi, znu, znw, znwc, znwv, hyam, hybm
446 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1 ) :: znuc, znuv, bn, divh, dpn
447
448 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1 ) :: sh, zw, ah
449 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels ) :: zu, dzw, rdzwp, rdzwm
450 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels ) :: eta, etav, teta, ppi, tt, temperature_1d
451
452 real (kind=rkind) :: d1, d2, d3, cof1, cof2, psurf
453 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: cf1, cf2, cf3
454
455 ! storage for (lat,z) arrays for zonal velocity calculation
456
457 logical, parameter :: rebalance = .true.
458 integer, parameter :: nlat=721
459 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels) :: flux_zonal
460 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1, nlat) :: zgrid_2d
461 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels, nlat) :: u_2d, pp_2d, rho_2d, qv_2d, etavs_2d, zz_2d
462 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels, nlat) :: p_2d, pb_2d, ppb_2d, rr_2d, rb_2d, tb_2d, rtb_2d
463 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels, nlat-1) :: zx_2d
464 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nlat) :: lat_2d
465 real (kind=rkind) :: dlat, hx_1d
466 real (kind=rkind) :: z_edge, z_edge3, d2fdx2_cell1, d2fdx2_cell2
467
468! logical, parameter :: moisture = .true.
469 logical, parameter :: moisture = .false.
470
471 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xcell, ycell, zcell
472 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xedge, yedge, zedge
473 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xvertex, yvertex, zvertex
474 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: dcedge, dvedge, areacell, areatriangle
475 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: kiteareasonvertex
476
477 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: latcell, latvertex, lonvertex, latedge, lonedge
478 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: fedge, fvertex
479
480 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: sphere_radius
481 logical, pointer :: on_a_sphere
482 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: config_coef_3rd_order
483 integer, pointer :: config_theta_adv_order
484 integer, pointer :: config_init_case
485
486
487 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_init_case', config_init_case)
488 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_coef_3rd_order', config_coef_3rd_order)
489 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_theta_adv_order', config_theta_adv_order)
490
491
492 !
493 ! Scale all distances and areas from a unit sphere to one with radius sphere_radius
494 !
495 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'xCell', xcell)
496 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'yCell', ycell)
497 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zCell', zcell)
498 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'xEdge', xedge)
499 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'yEdge', yedge)
500 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zEdge', zedge)
501 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'xVertex', xvertex)
502 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'yVertex', yvertex)
503 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zVertex', zvertex)
504 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dvEdge', dvedge)
505 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dcEdge', dcedge)
506 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'areaCell', areacell)
507 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'areaTriangle', areatriangle)
508 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'kiteAreasOnVertex', kiteareasonvertex)
509 call mpas_pool_get_config(mesh, 'on_a_sphere', on_a_sphere)
510 call mpas_pool_get_config(mesh, 'sphere_radius', sphere_radius)
511
512 xcell(:) = xcell(:) * sphere_radius
513 ycell(:) = ycell(:) * sphere_radius
514 zcell(:) = zcell(:) * sphere_radius
515 xvertex(:) = xvertex(:) * sphere_radius
516 yvertex(:) = yvertex(:) * sphere_radius
517 zvertex(:) = zvertex(:) * sphere_radius
518 xedge(:) = xedge(:) * sphere_radius
519 yedge(:) = yedge(:) * sphere_radius
520 zedge(:) = zedge(:) * sphere_radius
521 dvedge(:) = dvedge(:) * sphere_radius
522 dcedge(:) = dcedge(:) * sphere_radius
523 areacell(:) = areacell(:) * sphere_radius**2.0
524 areatriangle(:) = areatriangle(:) * sphere_radius**2.0
525 kiteareasonvertex(:,:) = kiteareasonvertex(:,:) * sphere_radius**2.0
526
527 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'weightsOnEdge', weightsonedge)
528 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'nEdgesOnEdge', nedgesonedge)
529 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'nEdgesOnCell', nedgesoncell)
530 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'edgesOnEdge', edgesonedge)
531 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cellsOnEdge', cellsonedge)
532 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cellsOnCell', cellsoncell)
533 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'verticesOnEdge', verticesonedge)
534 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'deriv_two', deriv_two)
535 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zb', zb)
536 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zb3', zb3)
537
538 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nVertLevels', nz1)
539 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nCellsSolve', ncellssolve)
540 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nVertices', nvertices)
541 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nEdges', nedges)
542 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'maxEdges', maxedges)
543 nz = nz1 + 1
544
545 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zgrid', zgrid)
546 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'rdzw', rdzw)
547 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dzu', dzu)
548 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'rdzu', rdzu)
549 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fzm', fzm)
550 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fzp', fzp)
551 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zxu', zxu)
552 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zz', zz)
553 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'hx', hx)
554 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dss', dss)
555
556 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'exner_base', pb)
557 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho_base', rb)
558 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho_p', rr)
559 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho', rho)
560 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'theta_base', tb)
561 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'theta', theta)
562 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rtheta_base', rtb)
563 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rtheta_p', rt)
564 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'exner', p)
565 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_base', ppb)
566 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_p', pp)
567 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'surface_pressure', surface_pressure)
568 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'ru', ru)
569 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rw', rw)
570 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'v', v)
571
572 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'rho_zz', rho_zz)
573 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'theta_m', t)
574 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'scalars', scalars)
575 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'u', u)
576 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'w', w)
577
578 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'latCell', latcell)
579 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'latVertex', latvertex)
580 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'lonVertex', lonvertex)
581 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'latEdge', latedge)
582 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'lonEdge', lonedge)
583 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fEdge', fedge)
584 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fVertex', fvertex)
585
586 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf1', cf1)
587 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf2', cf2)
588 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf3', cf3)
589
590!.. initialization of moisture:
591 scalars(:,:,:) = 0.0
592 qsat(:,:) = 0.0
593 relhum(:,:) = 0.0
594 qv_2d(:,:) = 0.0
595!.. end initialization of moisture.
596
597 surface_pressure(:) = 0.0
598
599 call atm_initialize_advection_rk(mesh, ncells, nedges, maxedges, on_a_sphere, sphere_radius )
600 call atm_initialize_deformation_weights(mesh, ncells, on_a_sphere, sphere_radius)
601
602 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(state, 'index_qv', index_qv)
603
604 xnutr = 0.0
605 zd = 12000.0
606 znut = eta_t
607
608 etavs = (1.0 - 0.252) * pii/2.
609 r_earth = sphere_radius
610 omega_e = omega
611 p0 = 1.0e+05
612
613 call mpas_log_write(' point 1 in test case setup ')
614
615! We may pass in an hx(:,:) that has been precomputed elsewhere.
616! For now it is independent of k
617
618 do icell=1,ncells
619 do k=1,nz
620 phi = latcell(icell)
621 hx(k,icell) = u0/gravity*cos(etavs)**1.5 &
622 *((-2.*sin(phi)**6 &
623 *(cos(phi)**2+1./3.)+10./63.) &
624 *(u0)*cos(etavs)**1.5 &
625 +(1.6*cos(phi)**3 &
626 *(sin(phi)**2+2./3.)-pii/4.)*r_earth*omega_e)
627 end do
628 end do
629
630 ! Metrics for hybrid coordinate and vertical stretching
631
632 str = 1.5
633 zt = 45000.
634 dz = zt/float(nz1)
635
636 call mpas_log_write(' hx computation complete ')
637
638 do k=1,nz
639
640! sh(k) is the stretching specified for height surfaces
641
642 sh(k) = (real(k-1)*dz/zt)**str
643
644! to specify specific heights zc(k) for coordinate surfaces,
645! input zc(k) and define sh(k) = zc(k)/zt
646! zw(k) is the hieght of zeta surfaces
647! zw(k) = (k-1)*dz yields constant dzeta
648! and nonconstant dzeta/dz
649! zw(k) = sh(k)*zt yields nonconstant dzeta
650! and nearly constant dzeta/dz
651
652 zw(k) = float(k-1)*dz
653! zw(k) = sh(k)*zt
654!
655! ah(k) governs the transition between terrain-following
656! and pureheight coordinates
657! ah(k) = 0 is a terrain-following coordinate
658! ah(k) = 1 is a height coordinate
659
660 ah(k) = 1.-cos(.5*pii*(k-1)*dz/zt)**6
661! ah(k) = 0.
662 call mpas_log_write(' k, sh, zw, ah = $i $r $r $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/sh(k),zw(k),ah(k)/))
663 end do
664 do k=1,nz1
665 dzw(k) = zw(k+1)-zw(k)
666 rdzw(k) = 1./dzw(k)
667 zu(k ) = .5*(zw(k)+zw(k+1))
668 end do
669 do k=2,nz1
670 dzu(k) = .5*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1))
671 rdzu(k) = 1./dzu(k)
672 fzp(k) = .5* dzw(k )/dzu(k)
673 fzm(k) = .5* dzw(k-1)/dzu(k)
674 rdzwp(k) = dzw(k-1)/(dzw(k )*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1)))
675 rdzwm(k) = dzw(k )/(dzw(k-1)*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1)))
676 end do
677
678!********** how are we storing cf1, cf2 and cf3?
679
680 cof1 = (2.*dzu(2)+dzu(3))/(dzu(2)+dzu(3))*dzw(1)/dzu(2)
681 cof2 = dzu(2) /(dzu(2)+dzu(3))*dzw(1)/dzu(3)
682 cf1 = fzp(2) + cof1
683 cf2 = fzm(2) - cof1 - cof2
684 cf3 = cof2
685
686! d1 = .5*dzw(1)
687! d2 = dzw(1)+.5*dzw(2)
688! d3 = dzw(1)+dzw(2)+.5*dzw(3)
689! cf1 = d2*d3*(d3-d2)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
690! cf2 = d1*d3*(d1-d3)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
691! cf3 = d1*d2*(d2-d1)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
692
693 call mpas_log_write(' cf1, cf2, cf3 = $r $r $r', realargs=(/cf1,cf2,cf3/))
694
695 do icell=1,ncells
696 do k=1,nz
697 zgrid(k,icell) = (1.-ah(k))*(sh(k)*(zt-hx(k,icell))+hx(k,icell)) &
698 + ah(k) * sh(k)* zt
699 end do
700 do k=1,nz1
701 zz(k,icell) = (zw(k+1)-zw(k))/(zgrid(k+1,icell)-zgrid(k,icell))
702 end do
703 end do
704
705 do i=1, nedges
706 icell1 = cellsonedge(1,i)
707 icell2 = cellsonedge(2,i)
708 do k=1,nz1
709 zxu(k,i) = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell2)-zgrid(k,icell1) + zgrid(k+1,icell2)-zgrid(k+1,icell1)) / dcedge(i)
710 end do
711 end do
712 do i=1, ncells
713 do k=1,nz1
714 ztemp = .5*(zgrid(k+1,i)+zgrid(k,i))
715 dss(k,i) = 0.
716 ztemp = zgrid(k,i)
717 if(ztemp.gt.zd+.1) then
718 dss(k,i) = dss(k,i)+xnutr*sin(.5*pii*(ztemp-zd)/(zt-zd))**2
719 end if
720 end do
721 end do
722
723 !do k=1,nz1
724 ! call mpas_log_write(' k, zgrid(k,1),hx(k,1) = $i $r $r', intArgs=(/k/), realArgs=(/zgrid(k,1),hx(k,1)/))
725 !end do
726
727 !do k=1,nz1
728 ! call mpas_log_write(' k, zxu(k,1) = $i $r', intArgs=(/k/), realArgs=(/zxu(k,1)/))
729 !end do
730
731 call mpas_log_write(' grid metrics setup complete ')
732
733!************** section for 2d (z,lat) calc for zonal velocity
734
735 dlat = 0.5*pii/float(nlat-1)
736 do i = 1,nlat
737
738 lat_2d(i) = float(i-1)*dlat
739 phi = lat_2d(i)
740 hx_1d = u0/gravity*cos(etavs)**1.5 &
741 *((-2.*sin(phi)**6 &
742 *(cos(phi)**2+1./3.)+10./63.) &
743 *(u0)*cos(etavs)**1.5 &
744 +(1.6*cos(phi)**3 &
745 *(sin(phi)**2+2./3.)-pii/4.)*r_earth*omega_e)
746
747 do k=1,nz
748 zgrid_2d(k,i) = (1.-ah(k))*(sh(k)*(zt-hx_1d)+hx_1d) &
749 + ah(k) * sh(k)* zt
750 end do
751 do k=1,nz1
752 zz_2d(k,i) = (zw(k+1)-zw(k))/(zgrid_2d(k+1,i)-zgrid_2d(k,i))
753 end do
754
755 do k=1,nz1
756 ztemp = .5*(zgrid_2d(k+1,i)+zgrid_2d(k,i))
757 ppb_2d(k,i) = p0*exp(-gravity*ztemp/(rgas*t0b))
758 pb_2d(k,i) = (ppb_2d(k,i)/p0)**(rgas/cp)
759 rb_2d(k,i) = ppb_2d(k,i)/(rgas*t0b*zz_2d(k,i))
760 tb_2d(k,i) = t0b/pb_2d(k,i)
761 rtb_2d(k,i) = rb_2d(k,i)*tb_2d(k,i)
762 p_2d(k,i) = pb_2d(k,i)
763 pp_2d(k,i) = 0.0
764 rr_2d(k,i) = 0.0
765 end do
766
767
768 do itr = 1,10
769
770 do k=1,nz1
771 eta(k) = (ppb_2d(k,i)+pp_2d(k,i))/p0
772 etav(k) = (eta(k)-.252)*pii/2.
773 if(eta(k) >= znut) then
774 teta(k) = t0*eta(k)**(rgas*dtdz/gravity)
775 else
776 teta(k) = t0*eta(k)**(rgas*dtdz/gravity) + delta_t*(znut-eta(k))**5
777 end if
778 end do
779
780 phi = lat_2d(i)
781 do k=1,nz1
782 temperature_1d(k) = teta(k)+.75*eta(k)*pii*u0/rgas*sin(etav(k)) &
783 *sqrt(cos(etav(k)))* &
784 ((-2.*sin(phi)**6 &
785 *(cos(phi)**2+1./3.)+10./63.) &
786 *2.*u0*cos(etav(k))**1.5 &
787 +(1.6*cos(phi)**3 &
788 *(sin(phi)**2+2./3.)-pii/4.)*r_earth*omega_e)/(1.+0.61*qv_2d(k,i))
789
790
791 ztemp = .5*(zgrid_2d(k,i)+zgrid_2d(k+1,i))
792 ptemp = ppb_2d(k,i) + pp_2d(k,i)
793
794 !get moisture
795 if (moisture) then
796 qv_2d(k,i) = env_qv( ztemp, temperature_1d(k), ptemp, rh_max )
797 end if
798
799 tt(k) = temperature_1d(k)*(1.+1.61*qv_2d(k,i))
800 end do
801
802 do itrp = 1,25
803 do k=1,nz1
804 rr_2d(k,i) = (pp_2d(k,i)/(rgas*zz_2d(k,i)) - rb_2d(k,i)*(tt(k)-t0b))/tt(k)
805 end do
806
807 ppi(1) = p0-.5*dzw(1)*gravity &
808 *(1.25*(rr_2d(1,i)+rb_2d(1,i))*(1.+qv_2d(1,i)) &
809 -.25*(rr_2d(2,i)+rb_2d(2,i))*(1.+qv_2d(2,i)))
810
811 ppi(1) = ppi(1)-ppb_2d(1,i)
812 do k=1,nz1-1
813
814 ppi(k+1) = ppi(k)-dzu(k+1)*gravity* &
815 ( (rr_2d(k ,i)+(rr_2d(k ,i)+rb_2d(k ,i))*qv_2d(k ,i))*fzp(k+1) &
816 + (rr_2d(k+1,i)+(rr_2d(k+1,i)+rb_2d(k+1,i))*qv_2d(k+1,i))*fzm(k+1) )
817 end do
818
819 do k=1,nz1
820 pp_2d(k,i) = .2*ppi(k)+.8*pp_2d(k,i)
821 end do
822
823 end do ! end inner iteration loop itrp
824
825 end do ! end outer iteration loop itr
826
827 do k=1,nz1
828 rho_2d(k,i) = rr_2d(k,i)+rb_2d(k,i)
829 etavs_2d(k,i) = ((ppb_2d(k,i)+pp_2d(k,i))/p0 - 0.252)*pii/2.
830 u_2d(k,i) = u0*(sin(2.*lat_2d(i))**2) *(cos(etavs_2d(k,i))**1.5)
831 end do
832
833 end do ! end loop over latitudes for 2D zonal wind field calc
834
835 !SHP-balance:: in case of rebalacing for geostrophic wind component
836 if (rebalance) then
837
838 do i=1,nlat-1
839 do k=1,nz1
840 zx_2d(k,i) = (zgrid_2d(k,i+1)-zgrid_2d(k,i))/(dlat*r_earth)
841 end do
842 end do
843
844 call init_atm_recompute_geostrophic_wind(u_2d, rho_2d, pp_2d, qv_2d, lat_2d, zz_2d, zx_2d, &
845 cf1, cf2, cf3, fzm, fzp, rdzw, nz1, nlat, dlat, sphere_radius)
846
847 end if
848
849!******************************************************************
850
851!
852!---- baroclinc wave initialization ---------------------------------
853!
854! reference sounding based on dry isothermal atmosphere
855!
856 do i=1, ncells
857 do k=1,nz1
858 ztemp = .5*(zgrid(k+1,i)+zgrid(k,i))
859 ppb(k,i) = p0*exp(-gravity*ztemp/(rgas*t0b))
860 pb(k,i) = (ppb(k,i)/p0)**(rgas/cp)
861 rb(k,i) = ppb(k,i)/(rgas*t0b*zz(k,i))
862 tb(k,i) = t0b/pb(k,i)
863 rtb(k,i) = rb(k,i)*tb(k,i)
864 p(k,i) = pb(k,i)
865 pp(k,i) = 0.
866 rr(k,i) = 0.
867 end do
868
869! if(i == 1) then
870! do k=1,nz1
871! call mpas_log_write(' k, ppb, pb, rb, tb (k,1) = $i $r $r $r $r', intArgs=(/k/), realArgs=(/ppb(k,1),pb(k,1),rb(k,1)*zz(k,1),tb(k,1)/))
872! end do
873! end if
874
875! iterations to converge temperature as a function of pressure
876!
877 do itr = 1,10
878
879 do k=1,nz1
880 eta(k) = (ppb(k,i)+pp(k,i))/p0
881 etav(k) = (eta(k)-.252)*pii/2.
882 if(eta(k).ge.znut) then
883 teta(k) = t0*eta(k)**(rgas*dtdz/gravity)
884 else
885 teta(k) = t0*eta(k)**(rgas*dtdz/gravity) + delta_t*(znut-eta(k))**5
886 end if
887 end do
888 phi = latcell(i)
889 do k=1,nz1
890 temperature_1d(k) = teta(k)+.75*eta(k)*pii*u0/rgas*sin(etav(k)) &
891 *sqrt(cos(etav(k)))* &
892 ((-2.*sin(phi)**6 &
893 *(cos(phi)**2+1./3.)+10./63.) &
894 *2.*u0*cos(etav(k))**1.5 &
895 +(1.6*cos(phi)**3 &
896 *(sin(phi)**2+2./3.)-pii/4.)*r_earth*omega_e)/(1.+0.61*scalars(index_qv,k,i))
897
898 ztemp = .5*(zgrid(k,i)+zgrid(k+1,i))
899 ptemp = ppb(k,i) + pp(k,i)
900
901 !get moisture
902 if (moisture) then
903
904 !scalars(index_qv,k,i) = env_qv( ztemp, temperature_1d(k), ptemp, rh_max )
905
906 if(ptemp < 50000.) then
907 relhum(k,i) = 0.0
908 elseif(ptemp > p0) then
909 relhum(k,i) = 1.0
910 else
911 relhum(k,i) = (1.-((p0-ptemp)/50000.)**1.25)
912 end if
913 relhum(k,i) = min(rh_max,relhum(k,i))
914
915 !.. calculation of water vapor mixing ratio:
916 if (temperature_1d(k) > 273.15) then
917 es = 1000.*0.6112*exp(17.67*(temperature_1d(k)-273.15)/(temperature_1d(k)-29.65))
918 else
919 es = 1000.*0.6112*exp(21.8745584*(temperature_1d(k)-273.15)/(temperature_1d(k)-7.66))
920 end if
921 qsat(k,i) = (287.04/461.6)*es/(ptemp-es)
922 if(relhum(k,i) .eq. 0.0) qsat(k,i) = 0.0
923 scalars(index_qv,k,i) = relhum(k,i)*qsat(k,i)
924 end if
925
926 tt(k) = temperature_1d(k)*(1.+1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,i))
927
928 end do
929
930 do itrp = 1,25
931 do k=1,nz1
932 rr(k,i) = (pp(k,i)/(rgas*zz(k,i)) - rb(k,i)*(tt(k)-t0b))/tt(k)
933 end do
934
935 ppi(1) = p0-.5*dzw(1)*gravity &
936 *(1.25*(rr(1,i)+rb(1,i))*(1.+scalars(index_qv,1,i)) &
937 -.25*(rr(2,i)+rb(2,i))*(1.+scalars(index_qv,2,i)))
938
939 ppi(1) = ppi(1)-ppb(1,i)
940 do k=1,nz1-1
941
942! ppi(k+1) = ppi(k)-.5*dzu(k+1)*gravity* &
943! (rr(k ,i)+(rr(k ,i)+rb(k ,i))*scalars(index_qv,k ,i) &
944! +rr(k+1,i)+(rr(k+1,i)+rb(k+1,i))*scalars(index_qv,k+1,i))
945
946 ppi(k+1) = ppi(k)-dzu(k+1)*gravity* &
947 ( (rr(k ,i)+(rr(k ,i)+rb(k ,i))*scalars(index_qv,k ,i))*fzp(k+1) &
948 + (rr(k+1,i)+(rr(k+1,i)+rb(k+1,i))*scalars(index_qv,k+1,i))*fzm(k+1) )
949
950 end do
951
952 do k=1,nz1
953 pp(k,i) = .2*ppi(k)+.8*pp(k,i)
954 end do
955
956 end do ! end inner iteration loop itrp
957
958 end do ! end outer iteration loop itr
959
960 do k=1,nz1
961 p(k,i) = ((ppb(k,i)+pp(k,i))/p0)**(rgas/cp)
962 t(k,i) = tt(k)/p(k,i)
963 rt(k,i) = t(k,i)*rr(k,i)+rb(k,i)*(t(k,i)-tb(k,i))
964 rho_zz(k,i) = rb(k,i) + rr(k,i)
965 end do
966
967 !calculation of surface pressure:
968 surface_pressure(i) = 0.5*dzw(1)*gravity &
969 * (1.25*(rr(1,i) + rb(1,i)) * (1. + scalars(index_qv,1,i)) &
970 - 0.25*(rr(2,i) + rb(2,i)) * (1. + scalars(index_qv,2,i)))
971 surface_pressure(i) = surface_pressure(i) + pp(1,i) + ppb(1,i)
972
973 end do ! end loop over cells
974
975 !call mpas_log_write('')
976 !call mpas_log_write('--- initialization of water vapor:')
977 !do iCell = 1, nCells
978 ! if(iCell == 1 .or. iCell == nCells) then
979 ! do k = nz1, 1, -1
980 ! call mpas_log_write('$i $i $r $r $r $r', intArgs=(/iCell,k/), realArgs=(/t(k,iCell),relhum(k,iCell),qsat(k,iCell),scalars(index_qv,k,iCell)/))
981 ! end do
982 ! call mpas_log_write('')
983 ! end if
984 !end do
985
986 lat_pert = latitude_pert*pii/180.
987 lon_pert = longitude_pert*pii/180.
988
989 do iedge=1,nedges
990
991 vtx1 = verticesonedge(1,iedge)
992 vtx2 = verticesonedge(2,iedge)
993 lat1 = latvertex(vtx1)
994 lat2 = latvertex(vtx2)
995 icell1 = cellsonedge(1,iedge)
996 icell2 = cellsonedge(2,iedge)
997 flux = (0.5*(lat2-lat1) - 0.125*(sin(4.*lat2) - sin(4.*lat1))) * sphere_radius / dvedge(iedge)
998
999 if (config_init_case == 2) then
1000 r_pert = sphere_distance( latedge(iedge), lonedge(iedge), &
1001 lat_pert, lon_pert, 1.0_rkind)/(pert_radius)
1002 u_pert = u_perturbation*exp(-r_pert**2)*(lat2-lat1) * sphere_radius / dvedge(iedge)
1003
1004 else if (config_init_case == 3) then
1005 lon_edge = lonedge(iedge)
1006 u_pert = u_perturbation*cos(k_x*(lon_edge - lon_pert)) &
1007 *(0.5*(lat2-lat1) - 0.125*(sin(4.*lat2) - sin(4.*lat1))) * sphere_radius / dvedge(iedge)
1008 else
1009 u_pert = 0.0
1010 end if
1011
1012 if (rebalance) then
1013
1014 call init_atm_calc_flux_zonal(u_2d,etavs_2d,lat_2d,flux_zonal,lat1,lat2,dvedge(iedge),sphere_radius,u0,nz1,nlat)
1015 do k=1,nvertlevels
1016 fluxk = u0*flux_zonal(k)/(0.5*(rb(k,icell1)+rb(k,icell2)+rr(k,icell1)+rr(k,icell2)))
1017 u(k,iedge) = fluxk + u_pert
1018 end do
1019
1020 else
1021
1022 do k=1,nvertlevels
1023 etavs = (0.5*(ppb(k,icell1)+ppb(k,icell2)+pp(k,icell1)+pp(k,icell2))/p0 - 0.252)*pii/2.
1024 fluxk = u0*flux*(cos(etavs)**1.5)
1025 u(k,iedge) = fluxk + u_pert
1026 end do
1027
1028 end if
1029
1030 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,iedge)
1031 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,iedge)
1032 do k=1,nz1
1033 ru(k,iedge) = 0.5*(rho_zz(k,cell1)+rho_zz(k,cell2))*u(k,iedge)
1034 end do
1035
1036 !
1037 ! Generate rotated Coriolis field
1038 !
1039
1040 fedge(iedge) = 2.0 * omega_e * &
1041 ( -cos(lonedge(iedge)) * cos(latedge(iedge)) * sin(alpha_grid) + &
1042 sin(latedge(iedge)) * cos(alpha_grid) &
1043 )
1044 end do
1045
1046 do ivtx=1,nvertices
1047 fvertex(ivtx) = 2.0 * omega_e * &
1048 (-cos(lonvertex(ivtx)) * cos(latvertex(ivtx)) * sin(alpha_grid) + &
1049 sin(latvertex(ivtx)) * cos(alpha_grid) &
1050 )
1051 end do
1052
1053 !
1054 ! CALCULATION OF OMEGA, RW = ZX * RU + ZZ * RW
1055 !
1056
1057 !
1058 ! pre-calculation z-metric terms in omega eqn.
1059 !
1060 do iedge = 1,nedges
1061 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,iedge)
1062 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,iedge)
1063
1064
1065 ! Avoid a potential divide by zero below if areaCell(nCells+1) is used in the denominator
1066 if (cell1 <= ncellssolve .or. cell2 <= ncellssolve ) then
1067 do k = 1, nvertlevels
1068
1069 if (config_theta_adv_order == 2) then
1070
1071 z_edge = (zgrid(k,cell1)+zgrid(k,cell2))/2.
1072
1073 else if (config_theta_adv_order == 3 .or. config_theta_adv_order ==4) then !theta_adv_order == 3 or 4
1074
1075 d2fdx2_cell1 = deriv_two(1,1,iedge) * zgrid(k,cell1)
1076 d2fdx2_cell2 = deriv_two(1,2,iedge) * zgrid(k,cell2)
1077
1078! WCS fix 20120711
1079
1080 do i=1, nedgesoncell(cell1)
1081 if ( cellsoncell(i,cell1) > 0) &
1082 d2fdx2_cell1 = d2fdx2_cell1 + deriv_two(i+1,1,iedge) * zgrid(k,cellsoncell(i,cell1))
1083 end do
1084 do i=1, nedgesoncell(cell2)
1085 if ( cellsoncell(i,cell2) > 0) &
1086 d2fdx2_cell2 = d2fdx2_cell2 + deriv_two(i+1,2,iedge) * zgrid(k,cellsoncell(i,cell2))
1087 end do
1088
1089 z_edge = 0.5*(zgrid(k,cell1) + zgrid(k,cell2)) &
1090 - (dcedge(iedge) **2) * (d2fdx2_cell1 + d2fdx2_cell2) / 12.
1091
1092 if (config_theta_adv_order == 3) then
1093 z_edge3 = - (dcedge(iedge) **2) * (d2fdx2_cell1 - d2fdx2_cell2) / 12.
1094 else
1095 z_edge3 = 0.
1096 end if
1097
1098 end if
1099
1100 zb(k,1,iedge) = (z_edge-zgrid(k,cell1))*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell1)
1101 zb(k,2,iedge) = (z_edge-zgrid(k,cell2))*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell2)
1102 zb3(k,1,iedge)= z_edge3*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell1)
1103 zb3(k,2,iedge)= z_edge3*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell2)
1104
1105 end do
1106 end if
1107
1108 end do
1109
1110 ! for including terrain
1111 rw = 0.0
1112 w = 0.0
1113 do iedge = 1,nedges
1114
1115 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,iedge)
1116 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,iedge)
1117
1118 do k = 2, nvertlevels
1119 flux = (fzm(k)*ru(k,iedge)+fzp(k)*ru(k-1,iedge))
1120 rw(k,cell2) = rw(k,cell2) + (fzm(k)*zz(k,cell2)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,cell2))*zb(k,2,iedge)*flux
1121 rw(k,cell1) = rw(k,cell1) - (fzm(k)*zz(k,cell1)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,cell1))*zb(k,1,iedge)*flux
1122
1123 if (config_theta_adv_order ==3) then
1124 rw(k,cell2) = rw(k,cell2) &
1125 - sign(1.0_rkind,ru(k,iedge))*config_coef_3rd_order* &
1126 (fzm(k)*zz(k,cell2)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,cell2))*zb3(k,2,iedge)*flux
1127 rw(k,cell1) = rw(k,cell1) &
1128 + sign(1.0_rkind,ru(k,iedge))*config_coef_3rd_order* &
1129 (fzm(k)*zz(k,cell1)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,cell1))*zb3(k,1,iedge)*flux
1130 end if
1131
1132 end do
1133
1134 end do
1135
1136 ! Compute w from rho_zz and rw
1137 do icell=1,ncells
1138 do k=2,nvertlevels
1139 w(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) / (fzp(k) * rho_zz(k-1,icell) + fzm(k) * rho_zz(k,icell))
1140 end do
1141 end do
1142
1143
1144 !
1145 ! Compute mass fluxes tangential to each edge (i.e., through the faces of dual grid cells)
1146 !
1147 v(:,:) = 0.0
1148 do iedge = 1, nedges
1149 do i=1,nedgesonedge(iedge)
1150 eoe = edgesonedge(i,iedge)
1151 do k = 1, nvertlevels
1152 v(k,iedge) = v(k,iedge) + weightsonedge(i,iedge) * u(k, eoe)
1153 end do
1154 end do
1155 end do
1156
1157 do i=1,10
1158 psurf = (cf1*(ppb(1,i)+pp(1,i)) + cf2*(ppb(2,i)+pp(2,i)) + cf3*(ppb(3,i)+pp(3,i)))/100.
1159
1160 psurf = (ppb(1,i)+pp(1,i)) + .5*dzw(1)*gravity &
1161 *(1.25*(rr(1,i)+rb(1,i))*(1.+scalars(index_qv,1,i)) &
1162 -.25*(rr(2,i)+rb(2,i))*(1.+scalars(index_qv,2,i)))
1163
1164 call mpas_log_write(' i, psurf, lat = $i $r $r', intargs=(/i/), realargs=(/psurf,latcell(i)*180./3.1415828/))
1165 end do
1166
1167 ! Compute rho and theta from rho_zz and theta_m
1168 do icell=1,ncells
1169 do k=1,nvertlevels
1170 rho(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) * zz(k,icell)
1171 theta(k,icell) = t(k,icell) / (1.0 + 1.61 * scalars(index_qv,k,icell))
1172 end do
1173 end do
1174
1175 end subroutine init_atm_case_jw
1176
1177
1178 subroutine init_atm_calc_flux_zonal(u_2d,etavs_2d,lat_2d,flux_zonal,lat1_in,lat2_in,dvEdge,a,u0,nz1,nlat)
1179
1180 implicit none
1181
1182 integer, intent(in) :: nz1,nlat
1183 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nz1,nlat), intent(in) :: u_2d,etavs_2d
1184 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nlat), intent(in) :: lat_2d
1185 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nz1), intent(out) :: flux_zonal
1186 real (kind=rkind), intent(in) :: lat1_in, lat2_in, dvedge, a, u0
1187
1188 integer :: k,i
1189 real (kind=rkind) :: lat1, lat2, w1, w2
1190 real (kind=rkind) :: dlat,da,db
1191
1192 lat1 = abs(lat1_in)
1193 lat2 = abs(lat2_in)
1194 if(lat2 <= lat1) then
1195 lat1 = abs(lat2_in)
1196 lat2 = abs(lat1_in)
1197 end if
1198
1199 do k=1,nz1
1200 flux_zonal(k) = 0.
1201 end do
1202
1203 do i=1,nlat-1
1204 if( (lat1 <= lat_2d(i+1)) .and. (lat2 >= lat_2d(i)) ) then
1205
1206 dlat = lat_2d(i+1)-lat_2d(i)
1207 da = (max(lat1,lat_2d(i))-lat_2d(i))/dlat
1208 db = (min(lat2,lat_2d(i+1))-lat_2d(i))/dlat
1209 w1 = (db-da) -0.5*(db-da)**2
1210 w2 = 0.5*(db-da)**2
1211
1212 do k=1,nz1
1213 flux_zonal(k) = flux_zonal(k) + w1*u_2d(k,i) + w2*u_2d(k,i+1)
1214 end do
1215
1216 end if
1217
1218 end do
1219
1220 ! renormalize for setting cell-face fluxes
1221
1222 do k=1,nz1
1223 flux_zonal(k) = sign(1.0_rkind,lat2_in-lat1_in)*flux_zonal(k)*dlat*a/dvedge/u0
1224 end do
1225
1226 end subroutine init_atm_calc_flux_zonal
1227
1228
1229 !SHP-balance
1230 subroutine init_atm_recompute_geostrophic_wind(u_2d,rho_2d,pp_2d,qv_2d,lat_2d,zz_2d,zx_2d, &
1231 cf1,cf2,cf3,fzm,fzp,rdzw,nz1,nlat,dlat,rad)
1232
1233 implicit none
1234
1235 integer, intent(in) :: nz1,nlat
1236 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nz1,nlat), intent(inout) :: u_2d
1237 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nz1,nlat), intent(in) :: rho_2d, pp_2d, qv_2d, zz_2d
1238 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nz1,nlat-1), intent(in) :: zx_2d
1239 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nlat), intent(in) :: lat_2d
1240 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nz1), intent(in) :: fzm, fzp, rdzw
1241 real (kind=rkind), intent(in) :: cf1, cf2, cf3, dlat, rad
1242
1243 !local variable
1244 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nz1,nlat-1) :: pgrad, ru, u
1245 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nlat-1) :: f
1246 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nz1+1) :: dpzx
1247
1248 ! real (kind=RKIND), parameter :: omega_e = 7.29212e-05
1249 real (kind=rkind) :: omega_e
1250
1251 real (kind=rkind) :: rdx, qtot, r_earth, phi
1252 integer :: k,i, itr
1253
1254 r_earth = rad
1255 omega_e = omega
1256 rdx = 1./(dlat*r_earth)
1257
1258 do i=1,nlat-1
1259 do k=1,nz1
1260 pgrad(k,i) = rdx*(pp_2d(k,i+1)/zz_2d(k,i+1)-pp_2d(k,i)/zz_2d(k,i))
1261 end do
1262
1263 dpzx(:) = 0.
1264
1265 k=1
1266 dpzx(k) = .5*zx_2d(k,i)*(cf1*(pp_2d(k ,i+1)+pp_2d(k ,i)) &
1267 +cf2*(pp_2d(k+1,i+1)+pp_2d(k+1,i)) &
1268 +cf3*(pp_2d(k+2,i+1)+pp_2d(k+2,i)))
1269 do k=2,nz1
1270 dpzx(k) = .5*zx_2d(k,i)*(fzm(k)*(pp_2d(k ,i+1)+pp_2d(k ,i)) &
1271 +fzp(k)*(pp_2d(k-1,i+1)+pp_2d(k-1,i)))
1272 end do
1273
1274 do k=1,nz1
1275 pgrad(k,i) = pgrad(k,i) - rdzw(k)*(dpzx(k+1)-dpzx(k))
1276 end do
1277 end do
1278
1279
1280 !initial value of v and rv -> that is from analytic sln.
1281 do i=1,nlat-1
1282 do k=1,nz1
1283 u(k,i) = .5*(u_2d(k,i)+u_2d(k,i+1))
1284 ru(k,i) = u(k,i)*(rho_2d(k,i)+rho_2d(k,i+1))*.5
1285 end do
1286 end do
1287
1288 call mpas_log_write('MAX U wind before REBALANCING ----> $r', realargs=(/maxval(abs(u))/))
1289
1290 !re-calculate geostrophic wind using iteration
1291 do itr=1,50
1292 do i=1,nlat-1
1293 phi = (lat_2d(i)+lat_2d(i+1))/2.
1294 f(i) = 2.*omega_e*sin(phi)
1295 do k=1,nz1
1296 if (f(i).eq.0.) then
1297 ru(k,i) = 0.
1298 else
1299 qtot = .5*(qv_2d(k,i)+qv_2d(k,i+1))
1300 ru(k,i) = - ( 1./(1.+qtot)*pgrad(k,i) + tan(phi)/r_earth*u(k,i)*ru(k,i) )/f(i)
1301 end if
1302 u(k,i) = ru(k,i)*2./(rho_2d(k,i)+rho_2d(k,i+1))
1303 end do
1304 end do
1305 end do
1306
1307 call mpas_log_write('MAX U wind after REBALANCING ----> $r', realargs=(/maxval(abs(u))/))
1308
1309 !update 2d ru
1310 do i=2,nlat-1
1311 do k=1,nz1
1312 u_2d(k,i) = (ru(k,i-1)+ru(k,i))*.5
1313 end do
1314 end do
1315
1316 i=1
1317 do k=1,nz1
1318 u_2d(k,i) = (3.*u_2d(k,i+1)-u_2d(k,i+2))*.5
1319 end do
1320 i=nlat
1321 do k=1,nz1
1322 u_2d(k,i) = (3.*u_2d(k,i-1)-u_2d(k,i-2))*.5
1323 end do
1324
1325 end subroutine init_atm_recompute_geostrophic_wind
1326
1327
1328 subroutine init_atm_case_squall_line(dminfo, mesh, nCells, nVertLevels, state, diag, test_case)
1329 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
1330 ! Setup squall line and supercell test case
1331 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
1332
1333 implicit none
1334
1335 type (dm_info), intent(in) :: dminfo
1336 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: mesh
1337 integer, intent(in) :: nCells
1338 integer, intent(in) :: nVertLevels
1339 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: state
1340 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: diag
1341 integer, intent(in) :: test_case
1342
1343 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: rdzw, dzu, rdzu, fzm, fzp
1344 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: zgrid, zxu, zz, hx, cqw
1345 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: ppb, pb, rho_zz, rb, rr, tb, rtb, p, pp, dss, t, rt, u, ru
1346 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: scalars
1347 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: zb, zb3
1348
1349 !This is temporary variable here. It just need when calculate tangential velocity v.
1350 integer :: eoe, j
1351 integer, dimension(:), pointer :: nEdgesOnEdge
1352 integer, dimension(:,:), pointer :: edgesOnEdge, cellsOnEdge
1353 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: weightsonedge
1354
1355 integer :: iCell, iCell1, iCell2 , iEdge, vtx1, vtx2, ivtx, i, k, nz, nz1, itr, cell1, cell2
1356 integer, pointer :: nEdges, nVertices, maxEdges, nCellsSolve
1357 integer, pointer :: index_qv
1358
1359 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1 ) :: znu, znw, znwc, znwv
1360 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1 ) :: znuc, znuv
1361
1362 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1 ) :: zc, zw, ah
1363 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels ) :: zu, dzw, rdzwp, rdzwm
1364
1365 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels, nCells) :: relhum, thi, tbi, cqwb
1366
1367 real (kind=rkind) :: r, xnutr
1368 real (kind=rkind) :: ztemp, zd, zt, dz, str
1369
1370 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels ) :: qvb
1371 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels ) :: t_init_1d
1372
1373 real (kind=rkind) :: d1, d2, d3, cof1, cof2
1374 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: cf1, cf2, cf3
1375 real (kind=rkind) :: ztr, thetar, ttr, thetas, um, us, zts, pitop, pibtop, ptopb, ptop, rcp, rcv, p0
1376 real (kind=rkind) :: radx, radz, zcent, xmid, delt, xloc, rad, yloc, ymid, a_scale
1377 real (kind=rkind) :: pres, temp, es, qvs
1378
1379 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xcell, ycell, zcell
1380 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xedge, yedge, zedge
1381 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xvertex, yvertex, zvertex
1382 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: dcedge, dvedge, areacell, areatriangle
1383 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: kiteareasonvertex
1384 logical, pointer :: on_a_sphere
1385 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: sphere_radius
1386
1387 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: t_init, w, rw, v, rho, theta
1388 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: u_init, qv_init, angleedge, fedge, fvertex
1389
1390 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'xCell', xcell)
1391 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'yCell', ycell)
1392 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zCell', zcell)
1393 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'xEdge', xedge)
1394 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'yEdge', yedge)
1395 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zEdge', zedge)
1396 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'xVertex', xvertex)
1397 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'yVertex', yvertex)
1398 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zVertex', zvertex)
1399 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dvEdge', dvedge)
1400 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dcEdge', dcedge)
1401 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'areaCell', areacell)
1402 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'areaTriangle', areatriangle)
1403 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'kiteAreasOnVertex', kiteareasonvertex)
1404
1405 call mpas_pool_get_config(mesh, 'on_a_sphere', on_a_sphere)
1406 call mpas_pool_get_config(mesh, 'sphere_radius', sphere_radius)
1407
1408 !
1409 ! Scale all distances
1410 !
1411
1412 a_scale = 1.0
1413
1414 xcell(:) = xcell(:) * a_scale
1415 ycell(:) = ycell(:) * a_scale
1416 zcell(:) = zcell(:) * a_scale
1417 xvertex(:) = xvertex(:) * a_scale
1418 yvertex(:) = yvertex(:) * a_scale
1419 zvertex(:) = zvertex(:) * a_scale
1420 xedge(:) = xedge(:) * a_scale
1421 yedge(:) = yedge(:) * a_scale
1422 zedge(:) = zedge(:) * a_scale
1423 dvedge(:) = dvedge(:) * a_scale
1424 dcedge(:) = dcedge(:) * a_scale
1425 areacell(:) = areacell(:) * a_scale**2.0
1426 areatriangle(:) = areatriangle(:) * a_scale**2.0
1427 kiteareasonvertex(:,:) = kiteareasonvertex(:,:) * a_scale**2.0
1428
1429 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'weightsOnEdge', weightsonedge)
1430 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'nEdgesOnEdge', nedgesonedge)
1431 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'edgesOnEdge', edgesonedge)
1432 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cellsOnEdge', cellsonedge)
1433
1434 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nEdges', nedges)
1435 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nVertices', nvertices)
1436 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nCellsSolve', ncellssolve)
1437 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'maxEdges', maxedges)
1438 nz1 = nvertlevels
1439 nz = nz1 + 1
1440
1441 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zgrid', zgrid)
1442 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zb', zb)
1443 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zb3', zb3)
1444 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'rdzw', rdzw)
1445 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dzu', dzu)
1446 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'rdzu', rdzu)
1447 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fzm', fzm)
1448 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fzp', fzp)
1449 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zxu', zxu)
1450 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zz', zz)
1451 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'hx', hx)
1452 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dss', dss)
1453 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 't_init', t_init)
1454 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'u_init', u_init)
1455 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'qv_init', qv_init)
1456 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'angleEdge', angleedge)
1457 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fEdge', fedge)
1458 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fVertex', fvertex)
1459
1460 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf1', cf1)
1461 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf2', cf2)
1462 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf3', cf3)
1463
1464 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_base', ppb)
1465 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'exner_base', pb)
1466 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho_base', rb)
1467 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'theta_base', tb)
1468 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rtheta_base', rtb)
1469 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'exner', p)
1470 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'cqw', cqw)
1471
1472 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_p', pp)
1473 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho_p', rr)
1474 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rtheta_p', rt)
1475 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'ru', ru)
1476 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rw', rw)
1477 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'v', v)
1478 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho', rho)
1479 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'theta', theta)
1480
1481 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'rho_zz', rho_zz)
1482 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'theta_m', t)
1483 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'u', u)
1484 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'w', w)
1485 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'scalars', scalars)
1486
1487 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(state, 'index_qv', index_qv)
1488
1489 scalars(:,:,:) = 0.
1490
1491 call atm_initialize_advection_rk(mesh, ncells, nedges, maxedges, on_a_sphere, sphere_radius )
1492 call atm_initialize_deformation_weights(mesh, ncells, on_a_sphere, sphere_radius)
1493
1494 xnutr = 0.
1495 zd = 12000.
1496
1497 p0 = 1.e+05
1498 rcp = rgas/cp
1499 rcv = rgas/(cp-rgas)
1500
1501 call mpas_log_write(' point 1 in test case setup ')
1502
1503! We may pass in an hx(:,:) that has been precomputed elsewhere.
1504! For now it is independent of k
1505
1506 do icell=1,ncells
1507 do k=1,nz
1508 hx(k,icell) = 0. ! squall line or supercell on flat plane
1509 end do
1510 end do
1511
1512 ! metrics for hybrid coordinate and vertical stretching
1513
1514 str = 1.0
1515 zt = 20000.
1516 dz = zt/float(nz1)
1517
1518! write(0,*) ' dz = ',dz
1519 call mpas_log_write(' hx computation complete ')
1520
1521 do k=1,nz
1522
1523! sh(k) is the stretching specified for height surfaces
1524
1525 zc(k) = zt*(real(k-1)*dz/zt)**str
1526
1527! to specify specific heights zc(k) for coordinate surfaces,
1528! input zc(k)
1529! zw(k) is the hieght of zeta surfaces
1530! zw(k) = (k-1)*dz yields constant dzeta
1531! and nonconstant dzeta/dz
1532! zw(k) = sh(k)*zt yields nonconstant dzeta
1533! and nearly constant dzeta/dz
1534
1535! zw(k) = float(k-1)*dz
1536 zw(k) = zc(k)
1537!
1538! ah(k) governs the transition between terrain-following
1539! and pureheight coordinates
1540! ah(k) = 0 is a terrain-following coordinate
1541! ah(k) = 1 is a height coordinate
1542
1543! ah(k) = 1.-cos(.5*pii*(k-1)*dz/zt)**6
1544 ah(k) = 1.
1545! call mpas_log_write(' k, zc, zw, ah = $i $r $r $r', intArgs=(/k/), realArgs=(/zc(k),zw(k),ah(k)/))
1546 end do
1547 do k=1,nz1
1548 dzw(k) = zw(k+1)-zw(k)
1549 rdzw(k) = 1./dzw(k)
1550 zu(k ) = .5*(zw(k)+zw(k+1))
1551 end do
1552 do k=2,nz1
1553 dzu(k) = .5*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1))
1554 rdzu(k) = 1./dzu(k)
1555 fzp(k) = .5* dzw(k )/dzu(k)
1556 fzm(k) = .5* dzw(k-1)/dzu(k)
1557 rdzwp(k) = dzw(k-1)/(dzw(k )*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1)))
1558 rdzwm(k) = dzw(k )/(dzw(k-1)*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1)))
1559 end do
1560
1561!********** how are we storing cf1, cf2 and cf3?
1562
1563 cof1 = (2.*dzu(2)+dzu(3))/(dzu(2)+dzu(3))*dzw(1)/dzu(2)
1564 cof2 = dzu(2) /(dzu(2)+dzu(3))*dzw(1)/dzu(3)
1565 cf1 = fzp(2) + cof1
1566 cf2 = fzm(2) - cof1 - cof2
1567 cf3 = cof2
1568
1569! d1 = .5*dzw(1)
1570! d2 = dzw(1)+.5*dzw(2)
1571! d3 = dzw(1)+dzw(2)+.5*dzw(3)
1572! cf1 = d2*d3*(d3-d2)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
1573! cf2 = d1*d3*(d1-d3)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
1574! cf3 = d1*d2*(d2-d1)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
1575
1576 do icell=1,ncells
1577 do k=1,nz
1578 zgrid(k,icell) = ah(k)*(zc(k)*(1.-hx(k,icell)/zt)+hx(k,icell)) &
1579 + (1.-ah(k)) * zc(k)
1580 end do
1581 do k=1,nz1
1582 zz(k,icell) = (zw(k+1)-zw(k))/(zgrid(k+1,icell)-zgrid(k,icell))
1583 end do
1584 end do
1585
1586 do i=1, nedges
1587 icell1 = cellsonedge(1,i)
1588 icell2 = cellsonedge(2,i)
1589 do k=1,nz1
1590 zxu(k,i) = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell2)-zgrid(k,icell1) + zgrid(k+1,icell2)-zgrid(k+1,icell1)) / dcedge(i)
1591 end do
1592 end do
1593 do i=1, ncells
1594 do k=1,nz1
1595 ztemp = .5*(zgrid(k+1,i)+zgrid(k,i))
1596 dss(k,i) = 0.
1597 ztemp = zgrid(k,i)
1598 if(ztemp.gt.zd+.1) then
1599 dss(k,i) = dss(k,i)+xnutr*sin(.5*pii*(ztemp-zd)/(zt-zd))**2
1600 end if
1601 end do
1602 end do
1603
1604!
1605! convective initialization
1606!
1607 ztr = 12000.
1608 thetar = 343.
1609 ttr = 213.
1610 thetas = 300.5
1611
1612! call mpas_log_write(' rgas, cp, gravity = $r $r $r', realArgs=(/rgas,cp, gravity/))
1613
1614 if ( test_case == 4) then ! squall line parameters
1615 um = 12.
1616 us = 10.
1617 zts = 2500.
1618 else if (test_case == 5) then !supercell parameters
1619 um = 30.
1620 us = 15.
1621 zts = 5000.
1622 end if
1623
1624 do i=1,ncells
1625 do k=1,nz1
1626 ztemp = .5*(zgrid(k,i)+zgrid(k+1,i))
1627 if(ztemp .gt. ztr) then
1628 t(k,i) = thetar*exp(9.8*(ztemp-ztr)/(1003.*ttr))
1629 relhum(k,i) = 0.25
1630 else
1631 t(k,i) = 300.+43.*(ztemp/ztr)**1.25
1632 relhum(k,i) = (1.-0.75*(ztemp/ztr)**1.25)
1633 if(t(k,i).lt.thetas) t(k,i) = thetas
1634 end if
1635 tb(k,i) = t(k,i)
1636 thi(k,i) = t(k,i)
1637 tbi(k,i) = t(k,i)
1638 cqw(k,i) = 1.
1639 cqwb(k,i) = 1.
1640 end do
1641 end do
1642
1643! relhum(:,:) = 0.
1644
1645! set the velocity field - we are on a plane here.
1646
1647 do i=1, nedges
1648 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,i)
1649 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,i)
1650 if(cell1 <= ncellssolve .or. cell2 <= ncellssolve) then
1651 do k=1,nz1
1652 ztemp = .25*( zgrid(k,cell1 )+zgrid(k+1,cell1 ) &
1653 +zgrid(k,cell2)+zgrid(k+1,cell2))
1654 if(ztemp.lt.zts) then
1655 u(k,i) = um*ztemp/zts
1656 else
1657 u(k,i) = um
1658 end if
1659 if(i == 1 ) u_init(k) = u(k,i) - us
1660 u(k,i) = cos(angleedge(i)) * (u(k,i) - us)
1661 end do
1662 end if
1663 end do
1664
1665 call mpas_dmpar_bcast_reals(dminfo, nz1, u_init)
1666
1667!
1668! for reference sounding
1669!
1670 qvb(:) = 0.0_rkind
1671
1672 do itr=1,30
1673
1674 pitop = 1.-.5*dzw(1)*gravity*(1.+scalars(index_qv,1,1))/(cp*t(1,1)*zz(1,1))
1675 pibtop = 1.-.5*dzw(1)*gravity*(1.+qvb(1))/(cp*tb(1,1)*zz(1,1))
1676 do k=2,nz1
1677 pitop = pitop-dzu(k)*gravity/(cp*cqw(k,1)*.5*(t(k,1)+t(k-1,1)) &
1678 *.5*(zz(k,1)+zz(k-1,1)))
1679 pibtop = pibtop-dzu(k)*gravity/(cp*cqwb(k,1)*.5*(tb(k,1)+tb(k-1,1)) &
1680 *.5*(zz(k,1)+zz(k-1,1)))
1681
1682 !call mpas_log_write('$i $r $r $r $r', intArgs=(/k/), realArgs=(/pitop,tb(k,1),dzu(k),tb(k,1)/))
1683 end do
1684 pitop = pitop-.5*dzw(nz1)*gravity*(1.+scalars(index_qv,nz1,1))/(cp*t(nz1,1)*zz(nz1,1))
1685 pibtop = pibtop-.5*dzw(nz1)*gravity*(1.+qvb(nz1))/(cp*tb(nz1,1)*zz(nz1,1))
1686
1687 call mpas_dmpar_bcast_real(dminfo, pitop)
1688 call mpas_dmpar_bcast_real(dminfo, pibtop)
1689
1690 ptopb = p0*pibtop**(1./rcp)
1691 call mpas_log_write('ptopb = $r', realargs=(/0.01_rkind*ptopb/))
1692
1693 do i=1, ncells
1694 pb(nz1,i) = pibtop+.5*dzw(nz1)*gravity*(1.+qvb(nz1))/(cp*tb(nz1,i)*zz(nz1,i))
1695 p(nz1,i) = pitop+.5*dzw(nz1)*gravity*(1.+scalars(index_qv,nz1,i))/(cp*t(nz1,i)*zz(nz1,i))
1696 do k=nz1-1,1,-1
1697 pb(k,i) = pb(k+1,i) + dzu(k+1)*gravity/(cp*cqwb(k+1,i)*.5*(tb(k,i)+tb(k+1,i)) &
1698 *.5*(zz(k,i)+zz(k+1,i)))
1699 p(k,i) = p(k+1,i) + dzu(k+1)*gravity/(cp*cqw(k+1,i)*.5*(t(k,i)+t(k+1,i)) &
1700 *.5*(zz(k,i)+zz(k+1,i)))
1701 end do
1702 do k=1,nz1
1703 rb(k,i) = pb(k,i)**(1./rcv)/((rgas/p0)*tb(k,i)*zz(k,i))
1704 rtb(k,i) = rb(k,i)*tb(k,i)
1705 rr(k,i) = p(k,i)**(1./rcv)/((rgas/p0)*t(k,i)*zz(k,i))-rb(k,i)
1706 ppb(k,i) = p0*(zz(k,i)*rgas*rtb(k,i)/p0)**(cp/cv)
1707 end do
1708 end do
1709
1710 !
1711 ! update water vapor mixing ratio from humidity profile
1712 !
1713 do i= 1,ncells
1714 do k=1,nz1
1715 temp = p(k,i)*thi(k,i)
1716 pres = p0*p(k,i)**(1./rcp)
1717 qvs = 380.*exp(17.27*(temp-273.)/(temp-36.))/pres
1718 scalars(index_qv,k,i) = min(0.014_rkind,relhum(k,i)*qvs)
1719 end do
1720 end do
1721
1722 do k=1,nz1
1723!*********************************************************************
1724! QVB = QV INCLUDES MOISTURE IN REFERENCE STATE
1725! qvb(k) = scalars(index_qv,k,1)
1726
1727! QVB = 0 PRODUCES DRY REFERENCE STATE
1728 qvb(k) = 0.
1729!*********************************************************************
1730 end do
1731
1732 do i= 1,ncells
1733 do k=1,nz1
1734 t(k,i) = thi(k,i)*(1.+1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,i))
1735 tb(k,i) = tbi(k,i)*(1.+1.61*qvb(k))
1736 end do
1737 do k=2,nz1
1738 cqw(k,i) = 1./(1.+.5*(scalars(index_qv,k,i)+scalars(index_qv,k-1,i)))
1739 cqwb(k,i) = 1./(1.+.5*(qvb(k)+qvb(k-1)))
1740 end do
1741 end do
1742
1743 end do !end of iteration loop
1744
1745 call mpas_log_write(' base state sounding ')
1746 call mpas_log_write(' k, pb, rb, tb, rtb, t, rr, p, qvb')
1747 do k=1,nvertlevels
1748 call mpas_log_write('$i $r $r $r $r $r $r $r $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/pb(k,1),rb(k,1),tb(k,1),rtb(k,1),t(k,1),rr(k,1),p(k,1),qvb(k)/))
1749 end do
1750
1751!
1752! potential temperature perturbation
1753!
1754! delt = -10.
1755! delt = -0.01
1756 delt = 3.
1757 radx = 10000.
1758 radz = 1500.
1759 zcent = 1500.
1760
1761 if (test_case == 4) then ! squall line prameters
1762 call mpas_dmpar_max_real(dminfo, maxval(xcell(:)), xmid)
1763 xmid = xmid * 0.5
1764 ymid = 0.0 ! Not used for squall line
1765 else if (test_case == 5) then ! supercell parameters
1766 call mpas_dmpar_max_real(dminfo, maxval(xcell(:)), xmid)
1767 call mpas_dmpar_max_real(dminfo, maxval(ycell(:)), ymid)
1768 xmid = xmid * 0.5
1769 ymid = ymid * 0.5
1770 end if
1771
1772 do i=1, ncells
1773 xloc = xcell(i) - xmid
1774 if (test_case == 4) then
1775 yloc = 0. !squall line setting
1776 else if (test_case == 5) then
1777 yloc = ycell(i) - ymid !supercell setting
1778 end if
1779
1780 do k = 1,nz1
1781 ztemp = .5*(zgrid(k+1,i)+zgrid(k,i))
1782 rad =sqrt((xloc/radx)**2+(yloc/radx)**2+((ztemp-zcent)/radz)**2)
1783 if(rad.lt.1) then
1784 thi(k,i) = thi(k,i) + delt*cos(.5*pii*rad)**2
1785 end if
1786 t(k,i) = thi(k,i)*(1.+1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,i))
1787 end do
1788 end do
1789
1790 do itr=1,30
1791
1792 pitop = 1.-.5*dzw(1)*gravity*(1.+scalars(index_qv,1,1))/(cp*t(1,1)*zz(1,1))
1793 do k=2,nz1
1794 pitop = pitop-dzu(k)*gravity/(cp*cqw(k,1)*.5*(t(k,1)+t(k-1,1)) &
1795 *.5*(zz(k,1)+zz(k-1,1)))
1796 end do
1797 pitop = pitop - .5*dzw(nz1)*gravity*(1.+scalars(index_qv,nz1,1))/(cp*t(nz1,1)*zz(nz1,1))
1798 ptop = p0*pitop**(1./rcp)
1799 call mpas_log_write('ptop = $r $r', realargs=(/0.01_rkind*ptop, 0.01_rkind*ptopb/))
1800
1801 call mpas_dmpar_bcast_real(dminfo, ptop)
1802
1803 do i = 1, ncells
1804
1805 pp(nz1,i) = ptop-ptopb+.5*dzw(nz1)*gravity* &
1806 (rr(nz1,i)+(rr(nz1,i)+rb(nz1,i))*scalars(index_qv,nz1,i))
1807 do k=nz1-1,1,-1
1808! pp(k,i) = pp(k+1,i)+.5*dzu(k+1)*gravity* &
1809! (rr(k ,i)+(rr(k ,i)+rb(k ,i))*scalars(index_qv,k ,i) &
1810! +rr(k+1,i)+(rr(k+1,i)+rb(k+1,i))*scalars(index_qv,k+1,i))
1811 pp(k,i) = pp(k+1,i)+dzu(k+1)*gravity*( &
1812 fzm(k+1)*(rb(k+1,i)*(scalars(index_qv,k+1,i)-qvb(k+1)) &
1813 +rr(k+1,i)*(1.+scalars(index_qv,k+1,i))) &
1814 +fzp(k+1)*(rb(k ,i)*(scalars(index_qv,k ,i)-qvb(k)) &
1815 +rr(k ,i)*(1.+scalars(index_qv,k ,i))))
1816 end do
1817 if (itr==1.and.i==1) then
1818 do k=1,nz1
1819 call mpas_log_write('pp-check $r', realargs=(/pp(k,i)/))
1820 end do
1821 end if
1822 do k=1,nz1
1823 rt(k,i) = (pp(k,i)/(rgas*zz(k,i)) &
1824 -rtb(k,i)*(p(k,i)-pb(k,i)))/p(k,i)
1825 p(k,i) = (zz(k,i)*(rgas/p0)*(rtb(k,i)+rt(k,i)))**rcv
1826 rr(k,i) = (rt(k,i)-rb(k,i)*(t(k,i)-tb(k,i)))/t(k,i)
1827 end do
1828
1829 end do ! loop over cells
1830
1831 end do ! iteration loop
1832!----------------------------------------------------------------------
1833!
1834 do k=1,nz1
1835 qv_init(k) = scalars(index_qv,k,1)
1836 end do
1837
1838 t_init_1d(:) = t(:,1)
1839 call mpas_dmpar_bcast_reals(dminfo, nz1, t_init_1d)
1840 call mpas_dmpar_bcast_reals(dminfo, nz1, qv_init)
1841
1842 do i=1,ncells
1843 do k=1,nz1
1844 t_init(k,i) = t_init_1d(k)
1845 rho_zz(k,i) = rb(k,i)+rr(k,i)
1846 end do
1847 end do
1848
1849 do i=1,nedges
1850 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,i)
1851 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,i)
1852 if(cell1 <= ncellssolve .or. cell2 <= ncellssolve) then
1853 do k=1,nz1
1854 ru(k,i) = 0.5*(rho_zz(k,cell1)+rho_zz(k,cell2))*u(k,i)
1855 end do
1856 end if
1857 end do
1858
1859
1860 !
1861 ! we are assuming w and rw are zero for this initialization
1862 ! i.e., no terrain
1863 !
1864 rw = 0.0
1865 w = 0.0
1866
1867 zb = 0.0
1868 zb3 = 0.0
1869
1870 !
1871 ! Generate rotated Coriolis field
1872 !
1873 do iedge=1,nedges
1874 fedge(iedge) = 0.0
1875 end do
1876
1877 do ivtx=1,nvertices
1878 fvertex(ivtx) = 0.0
1879 end do
1880
1881 !
1882 ! Compute mass fluxes tangential to each edge (i.e., through the faces of dual grid cells)
1883 !
1884 v(:,:) = 0.0
1885 do iedge = 1, nedges
1886 do i=1,nedgesonedge(iedge)
1887 eoe = edgesonedge(i,iedge)
1888 if (eoe > 0) then
1889 do k = 1, nvertlevels
1890 v(k,iedge) = v(k,iedge) + weightsonedge(i,iedge) * u(k, eoe)
1891 end do
1892 end if
1893 end do
1894 end do
1895
1896 ! call mpas_log_write(' k,u_init, t_init, qv_init ')
1897 ! do k=1,nVertLevels
1898 ! call mpas_log_write('$i $r $r $r', intArgs=(/k/), realArgs=(/u_init(k),t_init(k,1),qv_init(k)/))
1899 ! end do
1900
1901 ! Compute rho and theta from rho_zz and theta_m
1902 do icell=1,ncells
1903 do k=1,nvertlevels
1904 rho(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) * zz(k,icell)
1905 theta(k,icell) = t(k,icell) / (1.0 + 1.61 * scalars(index_qv,k,icell))
1906 end do
1907 end do
1908
1909 end subroutine init_atm_case_squall_line
1910
1911
1912!----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1913
1914
1915 subroutine init_atm_case_mtn_wave(dminfo, mesh, nCells, nVertLevels, state, diag, configs, init_case)
1916 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
1917 ! Setup baroclinic wave test case from Jablonowski and Williamson 2008 (QJRMS)
1918 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
1919
1920 implicit none
1921
1922 type (dm_info), intent(in) :: dminfo
1923 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: mesh
1924 integer, intent(in) :: nCells
1925 integer, intent(in) :: nVertLevels
1926 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: state
1927 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: diag
1928 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: configs
1929 integer, intent(in) :: init_case
1930
1931 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: t0=288., hm=250.
1932
1933 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: rdzw, dzu, rdzu, fzm, fzp
1934 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: zgrid, zxu, zz, hx, cqw
1935 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: ppb, pb, rho_zz, rb, rr, tb, rtb, p, pp, dss, t, rt, u, ru
1936 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: scalars, deriv_two, zb, zb3
1937
1938 !This is temporary variable here. It just need when calculate tangential velocity v.
1939 integer :: eoe, j
1940 integer, dimension(:), pointer :: nEdgesOnEdge, nEdgesOnCell
1941 integer, dimension(:,:), pointer :: edgesOnEdge, cellsOnEdge, cellsOnCell
1942 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: weightsonedge
1943
1944 integer :: iCell, iCell1, iCell2 , iEdge, vtx1, vtx2, ivtx, i, k, nz, itr, itrp, cell1, cell2, nz1
1945 integer, pointer :: nEdges, maxEdges, nCellsSolve, nVertices
1946 integer, pointer :: index_qv
1947
1948 real (kind=rkind) :: ptop, pitop, ptopb, p0, flux, d2fdx2_cell1, d2fdx2_cell2
1949
1950 real (kind=rkind) :: ztemp, zd, zt, dz, str
1951
1952 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels, nCells) :: relhum
1953 real (kind=rkind) :: es, qvs, xnutr, ptemp
1954 integer :: iter
1955
1956 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1 ) :: zc, zw, ah
1957 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels ) :: zu, dzw, rdzwp, rdzwm
1958
1959 real (kind=rkind) :: d1, d2, d3, cof1, cof2
1960 real (kind=rkind) :: um, vm,rcp, rcv
1961 real (kind=rkind) :: xmid, temp, pres, a_scale
1962
1963 real (kind=rkind) :: xi, xa, xc, xla, zinv, xn2, xn2m, xn2l, sm, dzh, dzht, dzmin, z_edge, z_edge3
1964
1965 integer, dimension(nCells, 2) :: next_cell
1966 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nCells) :: hxzt
1967 logical, parameter :: terrain_smooth = .false.
1968
1969 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xcell, ycell, zcell
1970 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xedge, yedge, zedge
1971 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xvertex, yvertex, zvertex
1972 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: dcedge, dvedge, areacell, areatriangle
1973 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: kiteareasonvertex
1974 logical, pointer :: on_a_sphere
1975 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: sphere_radius
1976 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: config_coef_3rd_order
1977 integer, pointer :: config_theta_adv_order
1978
1979 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: cf1, cf2, cf3
1980
1981 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: t_init, w, rw, v, rho, theta
1982 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: u_init, v_init, angleedge, fedge, fvertex
1983
1984
1985 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'xCell', xcell)
1986 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'yCell', ycell)
1987 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zCell', zcell)
1988 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'xEdge', xedge)
1989 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'yEdge', yedge)
1990 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zEdge', zedge)
1991 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'xVertex', xvertex)
1992 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'yVertex', yvertex)
1993 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zVertex', zvertex)
1994 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dvEdge', dvedge)
1995 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dcEdge', dcedge)
1996 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'areaCell', areacell)
1997 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'areaTriangle', areatriangle)
1998 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'kiteAreasOnVertex', kiteareasonvertex)
1999
2000 call mpas_pool_get_config(mesh, 'on_a_sphere', on_a_sphere)
2001 call mpas_pool_get_config(mesh, 'sphere_radius', sphere_radius)
2002
2003 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_coef_3rd_order', config_coef_3rd_order)
2004 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_theta_adv_order', config_theta_adv_order)
2005
2006 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'weightsOnEdge', weightsonedge)
2007 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'nEdgesOnEdge', nedgesonedge)
2008 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'edgesOnEdge', edgesonedge)
2009 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cellsOnEdge', cellsonedge)
2010 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'nEdgesOnCell', nedgesoncell)
2011 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cellsOnCell', cellsoncell)
2012 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'deriv_two', deriv_two)
2013 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 't_init', t_init)
2014 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'u_init', u_init)
2015 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'v_init', v_init)
2016 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'angleEdge', angleedge)
2017 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fEdge', fedge)
2018 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fVertex', fvertex)
2019
2020 !
2021 ! Scale all distances
2022 !
2023 a_scale = 1.0
2024
2025 xcell(:) = xcell(:) * a_scale
2026 ycell(:) = ycell(:) * a_scale
2027 zcell(:) = zcell(:) * a_scale
2028 xvertex(:) = xvertex(:) * a_scale
2029 yvertex(:) = yvertex(:) * a_scale
2030 zvertex(:) = zvertex(:) * a_scale
2031 xedge(:) = xedge(:) * a_scale
2032 yedge(:) = yedge(:) * a_scale
2033 zedge(:) = zedge(:) * a_scale
2034 dvedge(:) = dvedge(:) * a_scale
2035 dcedge(:) = dcedge(:) * a_scale
2036 areacell(:) = areacell(:) * a_scale**2.0
2037 areatriangle(:) = areatriangle(:) * a_scale**2.0
2038 kiteareasonvertex(:,:) = kiteareasonvertex(:,:) * a_scale**2.0
2039
2040
2041 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nEdges', nedges)
2042 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nVertices', nvertices)
2043 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nCellsSolve', ncellssolve)
2044 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'maxEdges', maxedges)
2045 nz1 = nvertlevels
2046 nz = nz1 + 1
2047
2048 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zgrid', zgrid)
2049 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zb', zb)
2050 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zb3', zb3)
2051 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'rdzw', rdzw)
2052 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dzu', dzu)
2053 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'rdzu', rdzu)
2054 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fzm', fzm)
2055 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fzp', fzp)
2056 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zxu', zxu)
2057 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zz', zz)
2058 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'hx', hx)
2059 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dss', dss)
2060
2061 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf1', cf1)
2062 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf2', cf2)
2063 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf3', cf3)
2064
2065 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_base', ppb)
2066 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'exner_base', pb)
2067 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho_base', rb)
2068 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'theta_base', tb)
2069 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rtheta_base', rtb)
2070 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'exner', p)
2071 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'cqw', cqw)
2072 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_p', pp)
2073 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho_p', rr)
2074 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rtheta_p', rt)
2075 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'ru', ru)
2076 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rw', rw)
2077 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'v', v)
2078 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho', rho)
2079 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'theta', theta)
2080
2081 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'rho_zz', rho_zz)
2082 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'theta_m', t)
2083 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'u', u)
2084 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'w', w)
2085 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'scalars', scalars)
2086
2087 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(state, 'index_qv', index_qv)
2088
2089 scalars(:,:,:) = 0.
2090
2091 call atm_initialize_advection_rk(mesh, ncells, nedges, maxedges, on_a_sphere, sphere_radius )
2092 call atm_initialize_deformation_weights(mesh, ncells, on_a_sphere, sphere_radius)
2093
2094 xnutr = 0.1
2095 zd = 10500.
2096
2097 p0 = 1.e+05
2098 rcp = rgas/cp
2099 rcv = rgas/(cp-rgas)
2100
2101 ! for hx computation
2102 xa = 5000. !SHP - should be changed based on grid distance
2103 xla = 4000.
2104 xc = maxval(xcell(:))/2.
2105
2106 ! metrics for hybrid coordinate and vertical stretching
2107 str = 1.0
2108 zt = 21000.
2109 dz = zt/float(nz1)
2110! call mpas_log_write(' dz = $r', realArgs=(/dz/))
2111
2112 do k=1,nz
2113
2114! sh(k) is the stretching specified for height surfaces
2115
2116 zc(k) = zt*(real(k-1)*dz/zt)**str
2117
2118! to specify specific heights zc(k) for coordinate surfaces,
2119! input zc(k)
2120! zw(k) is the hieght of zeta surfaces
2121! zw(k) = (k-1)*dz yields constant dzeta
2122! and nonconstant dzeta/dz
2123! zw(k) = sh(k)*zt yields nonconstant dzeta
2124! and nearly constant dzeta/dz
2125
2126! zw(k) = float(k-1)*dz
2127 zw(k) = zc(k)
2128!
2129! ah(k) governs the transition between terrain-following
2130! and pureheight coordinates
2131! ah(k) = 0 is a terrain-following coordinate
2132! ah(k) = 1 is a height coordinate
2133
2134! ah(k) = 1.-cos(.5*pii*(k-1)*dz/zt)**6
2135 ah(k) = 1.
2136! call mpas_log_write(' k, zc, zw, ah = $i $r $r $r', intArgs=(/k/), realArgs=(/zc(k),zw(k),ah(k)/))
2137 end do
2138 do k=1,nz1
2139 dzw(k) = zw(k+1)-zw(k)
2140 rdzw(k) = 1./dzw(k)
2141 zu(k ) = .5*(zw(k)+zw(k+1))
2142 end do
2143 do k=2,nz1
2144 dzu(k) = .5*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1))
2145 rdzu(k) = 1./dzu(k)
2146 fzp(k) = .5* dzw(k )/dzu(k)
2147 fzm(k) = .5* dzw(k-1)/dzu(k)
2148 rdzwp(k) = dzw(k-1)/(dzw(k )*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1)))
2149 rdzwm(k) = dzw(k )/(dzw(k-1)*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1)))
2150 end do
2151
2152!********** how are we storing cf1, cf2 and cf3?
2153
2154 d1 = .5*dzw(1)
2155 d2 = dzw(1)+.5*dzw(2)
2156 d3 = dzw(1)+dzw(2)+.5*dzw(3)
2157 !cf1 = d2*d3*(d3-d2)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
2158 !cf2 = d1*d3*(d1-d3)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
2159 !cf3 = d1*d2*(d2-d1)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
2160
