2161 cof1 = (2.*dzu(2)+dzu(3))/(dzu(2)+dzu(3))*dzw(1)/dzu(2)
2162 cof2 = dzu(2) /(dzu(2)+dzu(3))*dzw(1)/dzu(3)
2163 cf1 = fzp(2) + cof1
2164 cf2 = fzm(2) - cof1 - cof2
2165 cf3 = cof2
2166
2167! setting for terrain
2168 do icell=1,ncells
2169 xi = xcell(icell)
2170 !====1. for pure cosine mountain
2171 ! if(abs(xi-xc).ge.2.*xa) then
2172 ! hx(1,iCell) = 0.
2173 ! else
2174 ! hx(1,iCell) = hm*cos(.5*pii*(xi-xc)/(2.*xa))**2.
2175 ! end if
2176
2177 !====2. for cosine mountain
2178 !if(abs(xi-xc).lt.xa) THEN
2179 ! hx(1,iCell) = hm*cos(pii*(xi-xc)/xla)**2. *cos(.5*pii*(xi-xc)/xa )**2.
2180 ! else
2181 ! hx(1,iCell) = 0.
2182 ! end if
2183
2184 !====3. for shock mountain
2185 hx(1,icell) = hm*exp(-((xi-xc)/xa)**2)*cos(pii*(xi-xc)/xla)**2.
2186
2187 hx(nz,icell) = zt
2188
2189!***** SHP -> get the temporary point information for the neighbor cell ->> should be changed!!!!!
2190 do i=1,ncells
2191 !option 1
2192 !IF(yCell(i).eq.yCell(iCell).and.xCell(i).eq.xCell(iCell)-sqrt(3.)*dcEdge(1)) next_cell(iCell,1) = i
2193 !IF(yCell(i).eq.yCell(iCell).and.xCell(i).eq.xCell(iCell)+sqrt(3.)*dcEdge(1)) next_cell(iCell,2) = i
2194 !option 2
2195 next_cell(icell,1) = icell - 8 ! note ny=4
2196 next_cell(icell,2) = icell + 8 ! note ny=4
2197
2198 if (xcell(icell).le. 3.*dcedge(1)) then
2199 next_cell(icell,1) = 1
2200 else if (xcell(icell).ge. maxval(xcell(:))-3.*dcedge(1)) then
2201 next_cell(icell,2) = 1
2202 end if
2203
2204 end do
2205 end do
2206
2207 call mpas_log_write(' hx computation complete ')
2208
2209 if (terrain_smooth) then
2210 call mpas_log_write('***************************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
2211 call mpas_log_write('Please contact the MPAS-A developers for up-to-date terrain-smoothing code.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
2212 call mpas_log_write('Otherwise, set terrain_smooth=.false. in the mountain wave test case', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
2213 call mpas_log_write(' initialization routine and re-compile.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
2214 call mpas_log_write('***************************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
2215 end if
2216
2217 do icell=1,ncells
2218 do k=1,nz
2219 if (terrain_smooth) then
2220 zgrid(k,icell) = ah(k)*(zc(k)*(1.-hx(k,icell)/zt)+hx(k,icell)) &
2221 + (1.-ah(k)) * zc(k)
2222 else
2223 zgrid(k,icell) = ah(k)*(zc(k)*(1.-hx(1,icell)/zt)+hx(1,icell)) &
2224 + (1.-ah(k)) * zc(k)
2225 end if
2226 end do
2227 do k=1,nz1
2228 zz(k,icell) = (zw(k+1)-zw(k))/(zgrid(k+1,icell)-zgrid(k,icell))
2229 end do
2230 end do
2231
2232 do i=1, nedges
2233 icell1 = cellsonedge(1,i)
2234 icell2 = cellsonedge(2,i)
2235 do k=1,nz1
2236 zxu(k,i) = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell2)-zgrid(k,icell1) + zgrid(k+1,icell2)-zgrid(k+1,icell1)) / dcedge(i)
2237 end do
2238 end do
2239 do i=1, ncells
2240 do k=1,nz1
2241 ztemp = .5*(zgrid(k+1,i)+zgrid(k,i))
2242 dss(k,i) = 0.
2243 ztemp = zgrid(k,i)
2244 if(ztemp.gt.zd+.1) then
2245 dss(k,i) = dss(k,i)+xnutr*sin(.5*pii*(ztemp-zd)/(zt-zd))**2
2246 end if
2247 end do
2248 end do
2249
2250 call mpas_log_write(' grid metrics setup complete ')
2251
2252!
2253! mountain wave initialization
2254!
2255 !SHP-original
2256 !zinv = 1000.
2257 !SHP-schar case
2258 zinv = 3000.
2259
2260 xn2 = 0.0001
2261 xn2m = 0.0000
2262 xn2l = 0.0001
2263
2264 vm = 10.
2265 um = 0.
2266
2267 do k=1,nz1
2268 v_init(k) = vm
2269 u_init(k) = um
2270 end do
2271
2272 do i=1,ncells
2273 do k=1,nz1
2274 ztemp = .5*(zgrid(k,i)+zgrid(k+1,i))
2275 tb(k,i) = t0*(1. + xn2m/gravity*ztemp)
2276 if(ztemp .le. zinv) then
2277 t(k,i) = t0*(1.+xn2l/gravity*ztemp)
2278 else
2279 t(k,i) = t0*(1.+xn2l/gravity*zinv+xn2/gravity*(ztemp-zinv))
2280 end if
2281 relhum(k,i) = 0.
2282 end do
2283 end do
2284
2285! set the velocity field - we are on a plane here.
2286
2287 do i=1, nedges
2288 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,i)
2289 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,i)
2290 if(cell1 <= ncellssolve .or. cell2 <= ncellssolve) then
2291 do k=1,nz1
2292 ztemp = .25*( zgrid(k,cell1 )+zgrid(k+1,cell1 ) &
2293 +zgrid(k,cell2)+zgrid(k+1,cell2))
2294 u(k,i) = vm*sin(angleedge(i)) + um*cos(angleedge(i))
2295 end do
2296 end if
2297 end do
2298
2299!
2300! reference sounding based on dry atmosphere
2301!
2302 pitop = 1.-.5*dzw(1)*gravity/(cp*tb(1,1)*zz(1,1))
2303 do k=2,nz1
2304 pitop = pitop-dzu(k)*gravity/(cp*(fzm(k)*tb(k,1)+fzp(k)*tb(k-1,1)) &
2305 *(fzm(k)*zz(k,1)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,1)))
2306 end do
2307 pitop = pitop-.5*dzw(nz1)*gravity/(cp*tb(nz1,1)*zz(nz1,1))
2308 ptopb = p0*pitop**(1./rcp)
2309
2310 do i=1, ncells
2311 pb(nz1,i) = pitop+.5*dzw(nz1)*gravity/(cp*tb(nz1,i)*zz(nz1,i))
2312 p(nz1,i) = pitop+.5*dzw(nz1)*gravity/(cp*t(nz1,i)*zz(nz1,i))
2313 do k=nz1-1,1,-1
2314 pb(k,i) = pb(k+1,i) + dzu(k+1)*gravity/(cp*.5*(tb(k,i)+tb(k+1,i)) &
2315 *.5*(zz(k,i)+zz(k+1,i)))
2316 p(k,i) = p(k+1,i) + dzu(k+1)*gravity/(cp*.5*(t(k,i)+t(k+1,i)) &
2317 *.5*(zz(k,i)+zz(k+1,i)))
2318 end do
2319 do k=1,nz1
2320 rb(k,i) = pb(k,i)**(1./rcv)/((rgas/p0)*tb(k,i)*zz(k,i))
2321 rtb(k,i) = rb(k,i)*tb(k,i)
2322 rr(k,i) = p(k,i)**(1./rcv)/((rgas/p0)*t(k,i)*zz(k,i))-rb(k,i)
2323 cqw(k,i) = 1.
2324 end do
2325 end do
2326
2327 call mpas_log_write(' ***** base state sounding ***** ')
2328 call mpas_log_write('k pb p rb rtb rr tb t')
2329 do k=1,nvertlevels
2330 call mpas_log_write('$i $r $r $r $r $r $r $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/pb(k,1),p(k,1),rb(k,1),rtb(k,1),rr(k,1),tb(k,1),t(k,1)/))
2331 end do
2332
2333 scalars(index_qv,:,:) = 0.
2334
2335!-------------------------------------------------------------------
2336! ITERATIONS TO CONVERGE MOIST SOUNDING
2337 do itr=1,30
2338 pitop = 1.-.5*dzw(1)*gravity*(1.+scalars(index_qv,1,1))/(cp*t(1,1)*zz(1,1))
2339
2340 do k=2,nz1
2341 pitop = pitop-dzu(k)*gravity/(cp*cqw(k,1)*(fzm(k)*t(k,1)+fzp(k)*t(k-1,1)) &
2342 *(fzm(k)*zz(k,1)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,1)))
2343 end do
2344 pitop = pitop - .5*dzw(nz1)*gravity*(1.+scalars(index_qv,nz1,1))/(cp*t(nz1,1)*zz(nz1,1))
2345 ptop = p0*pitop**(1./rcp)
2346
2347 do i = 1, ncells
2348
2349 pp(nz1,i) = ptop-ptopb+.5*dzw(nz1)*gravity* &
2350 (rr(nz1,i)+(rr(nz1,i)+rb(nz1,i))*scalars(index_qv,nz1,i))
2351 do k=nz1-1,1,-1
2352 pp(k,i) = pp(k+1,i)+dzu(k+1)*gravity* &
2353 (fzm(k)*(rr(k ,i)+(rr(k ,i)+rb(k ,i))*scalars(index_qv,k ,i)) &
2354 +fzp(k)*(rr(k+1,i)+(rr(k+1,i)+rb(k+1,i))*scalars(index_qv,k+1,i)))
2355 end do
2356 do k=1,nz1
2357 rt(k,i) = (pp(k,i)/(rgas*zz(k,i)) &
2358 -rtb(k,i)*(p(k,i)-pb(k,i)))/p(k,i)
2359 p(k,i) = (zz(k,i)*(rgas/p0)*(rtb(k,i)+rt(k,i)))**rcv
2360 rr(k,i) = (rt(k,i)-rb(k,i)*(t(k,i)-tb(k,i)))/t(k,i)
2361 end do
2362!
2363! update water vapor mixing ratio from humitidty profile
2364!
2365 do k=1,nz1
2366 temp = p(k,i)*t(k,i)
2367 pres = p0*p(k,i)**(1./rcp)
2368 qvs = 380.*exp(17.27*(temp-273.)/(temp-36.))/pres
2369 scalars(index_qv,k,i) = min(0.014_rkind,relhum(k,i)*qvs)
2370 end do
2371
2372 do k=1,nz1
2373 t(k,i) = t(k,i)*(1.+1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,i))
2374 end do
2375 do k=2,nz1
2376 cqw(k,i) = 1./(1.+.5*( scalars(index_qv,k-1,i) &
2377 +scalars(index_qv,k ,i)))
2378 end do
2379
2380 end do ! loop over cells
2381
2382 end do ! iteration loop
2383!----------------------------------------------------------------------
2384!
2385 call mpas_log_write(' *** sounding for the simulation ***')
2386 call mpas_log_write(' z theta pres qv rho_m u rr')
2387 do k=1,nz1
2388 call mpas_log_write('$r $r $r $r $r $r $r', realargs=(/.5*(zgrid(k,1)+zgrid(k+1,1))/1000., &
2389 t(k,1)/(1.+1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,1)), &
2390 .01*p0*p(k,1)**(1./rcp), &
2391 1000.*scalars(index_qv,k,1), &
2392 (rb(k,1)+rr(k,1))*(1.+scalars(index_qv,k,1)), &
2393 u_init(k), rr(k,1)/))
2394 end do
2395
2396 do i=1,ncells
2397 do k=1,nz1
2398 rho_zz(k,i) = rb(k,i)+rr(k,i)
2399 end do
2400
2401 do k=1,nz1
2402 t_init(k,i) = t(k,i)
2403 end do
2404 end do
2405
2406 do i=1,nedges
2407 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,i)
2408 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,i)
2409 if(cell1 <= ncellssolve .or. cell2 <= ncellssolve) then
2410 do k=1,nz1
2411 ru(k,i) = 0.5*(rho_zz(k,cell1)+rho_zz(k,cell2))*u(k,i)
2412 end do
2413 end if
2414 end do
2415
2416!
2417! pre-calculation z-metric terms in omega eqn.
2418!
2419 do iedge = 1,nedges
2420 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,iedge)
2421 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,iedge)
2422 if (cell1 <= ncellssolve .or. cell2 <= ncellssolve ) then
2423
2424 do k = 1, nvertlevels
2425
2426 if (config_theta_adv_order == 2) then
2427
2428 z_edge = (zgrid(k,cell1)+zgrid(k,cell2))/2.
2429
2430 else !theta_adv_order == 3 or 4
2431
2432 d2fdx2_cell1 = deriv_two(1,1,iedge) * zgrid(k,cell1)
2433 d2fdx2_cell2 = deriv_two(1,2,iedge) * zgrid(k,cell2)
2434 do i=1, nedgesoncell(cell1)
2435 if ( cellsoncell(i,cell1) > 0) &
2436 d2fdx2_cell1 = d2fdx2_cell1 + deriv_two(i+1,1,iedge) * zgrid(k,cellsoncell(i,cell1))
2437 end do
2438 do i=1, nedgesoncell(cell2)
2439 if ( cellsoncell(i,cell2) > 0) &
2440 d2fdx2_cell2 = d2fdx2_cell2 + deriv_two(i+1,2,iedge) * zgrid(k,cellsoncell(i,cell2))
2441 end do
2442
2443 z_edge = 0.5*(zgrid(k,cell1) + zgrid(k,cell2)) &
2444 - (dcedge(iedge) **2) * (d2fdx2_cell1 + d2fdx2_cell2) / 12.
2445
2446 if (config_theta_adv_order == 3) then
2447 z_edge3 = - (dcedge(iedge) **2) * (d2fdx2_cell1 - d2fdx2_cell2) / 12.
2448 else
2449 z_edge3 = 0.
2450 end if
2451
2452 end if
2453
2454 zb(k,1,iedge) = (z_edge-zgrid(k,cell1))*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell1)
2455 zb(k,2,iedge) = (z_edge-zgrid(k,cell2))*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell2)
2456 zb3(k,1,iedge)= z_edge3*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell1)
2457 zb3(k,2,iedge)= z_edge3*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell2)
2458
2459 end do
2460
2461 end if
2462 end do
2463
2464! for including terrain
2465 w(:,:) = 0.0
2466 rw(:,:) = 0.0
2467
2468!
2469! calculation of omega, rw = zx * ru + zz * rw
2470!
2471
2472 do iedge = 1,nedges
2473
2474 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,iedge)
2475 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,iedge)
2476
2477 if (cell1 <= ncellssolve .or. cell2 <= ncellssolve ) then
2478 do k = 2, nvertlevels
2479 flux = (fzm(k)*ru(k,iedge)+fzp(k)*ru(k-1,iedge))
2480 rw(k,cell2) = rw(k,cell2) + (fzm(k)*zz(k,cell2)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,cell2))*zb(k,2,iedge)*flux
2481 rw(k,cell1) = rw(k,cell1) - (fzm(k)*zz(k,cell1)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,cell1))*zb(k,1,iedge)*flux
2482
2483 if (config_theta_adv_order ==3) then
2484 rw(k,cell2) = rw(k,cell2) &
2485 - sign(1.0_rkind,ru(k,iedge))*config_coef_3rd_order* &
2486 (fzm(k)*zz(k,cell2)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,cell2))*zb3(k,2,iedge)*flux
2487 rw(k,cell1) = rw(k,cell1) &
2488 + sign(1.0_rkind,ru(k,iedge))*config_coef_3rd_order* &
2489 (fzm(k)*zz(k,cell1)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,cell1))*zb3(k,1,iedge)*flux
2490 end if
2491
2492 end do
2493 end if
2494
2495 end do
2496
2497 ! Compute w from rho_zz and rw
2498 do icell=1,ncells
2499 do k=2,nvertlevels
2500 w(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) / (fzp(k) * rho_zz(k-1,icell) + fzm(k) * rho_zz(k,icell))
2501 end do
2502 end do
2503
2504
2505 do iedge=1,nedges
2506 fedge(iedge) = 0.
2507 end do
2508
2509 do ivtx=1,nvertices
2510 fvertex(ivtx) = 0.
2511 end do
2512
2513 !
2514 ! Compute mass fluxes tangential to each edge (i.e., through the faces of dual grid cells)
2515 !
2516 v(:,:) = 0.0
2517 do iedge = 1, nedges
2518 do i=1,nedgesonedge(iedge)
2519 eoe = edgesonedge(i,iedge)
2520 if (eoe > 0) then
2521 do k = 1, nvertlevels
2522 v(k,iedge) = v(k,iedge) + weightsonedge(i,iedge) * u(k, eoe)
2523 end do
2524 end if
2525 end do
2526 end do
2527
2528! do k=1,nVertLevels
2529! call mpas_log_write(' k,u_init, t_init = $i $r $r $r', intArgs=(/k/), realArgs=(/u_init(k),t_init(k,1)/))
2530! end do
2531
2532 ! Compute rho and theta from rho_zz and theta_m
2533 do icell=1,ncells
2534 do k=1,nvertlevels
2535 rho(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) * zz(k,icell)
2536 theta(k,icell) = t(k,icell) / (1.0 + 1.61 * scalars(index_qv,k,icell))
2537 end do
2538 end do
2539
2540 end subroutine init_atm_case_mtn_wave
2541
2542
2543 subroutine init_atm_case_gfs(block, mesh, nCells, nEdges, nVertLevels, fg, state, diag, diag_physics, init_case, dims, configs)
2544 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
2545 ! Real-data test case using GFS data
2546 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
2547
2548 use mpas_dmpar
2549 use init_atm_read_met
2550 use init_atm_llxy
2551 use init_atm_hinterp
2552 use mpas_hash
2553 use mpas_atmphys_constants, only : svpt0, svp1, svp2, svp3
2554
2555 implicit none
2556
2557 type (block_type), intent(inout), target :: block
2558 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: mesh
2559 integer, intent(in) :: nCells
2560 integer, intent(in) :: nEdges
2561 integer, intent(in) :: nVertLevels
2562 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: fg
2563 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: state
2564 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: diag
2565 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout):: diag_physics
2566 integer, intent(in) :: init_case
2567 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout):: dims
2568 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout):: configs
2569
2570 type (parallel_info), pointer :: parinfo
2571 type (dm_info), pointer :: dminfo
2572
2573 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: u0 = 35.0
2574 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: alpha_grid = 0. ! no grid rotation
2575
2576! real (kind=RKIND), parameter :: omega_e = 7.29212e-05
2577 real (kind=rkind) :: omega_e
2578
2579 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: t0b = 250., t0 = 288., delta_t = 4.8e+05, dtdz = 0.005, eta_t = 0.2
2580 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: u_perturbation = 1., pert_radius = 0.1, latitude_pert = 40., longitude_pert = 20.
2581 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: theta_c = pii/4.0
2582 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: lambda_c = 3.0*pii/2.0
2583 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: rh_max = 0.4 ! Maximum relative humidity
2584 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: k_x = 9. ! Normal mode wave number
2585
2586 type (met_data) :: field
2587 type (proj_info) :: proj
2588
2589 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: rdzw, dzu, rdzu, fzm, fzp
2590 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: vert_level, latpoints, lonpoints, ter
2591 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: zgrid, zxu, zz, hx
2592 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: pressure, ppb, pb, rho_zz, rb, rr, tb, rtb, p, pp, dss, t, rt
2593 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: surface_pressure
2594 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: destfield1d
2595 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: destfield2d
2596 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: zb, zb3
2597 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: scalars
2598 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: deriv_two
2599
2600 real (kind=rkind) :: target_z
2601 integer :: iCell, iCell1, iCell2 , iEdge, vtx1, vtx2, ivtx, i, k, nz, itr, itrp, cell1, cell2
2602 integer, pointer :: nCellsSolve, nz1
2603 integer :: nInterpPoints, ndims
2604
2605 integer :: nfglevels_actual
2606 integer, pointer :: index_qv
2607
2608 integer, dimension(5) :: interp_list
2609 real (kind=rkind) :: maskval
2610 real (kind=rkind) :: msgval
2611 real (kind=rkind) :: fillval
2612 integer :: masked
2613
2614 !This is temporary variable here. It just need when calculate tangential velocity v.
2615 integer :: eoe, j
2616 integer, dimension(:), pointer :: nEdgesOnCell
2617 integer, dimension(:,:), pointer :: edgesOnEdge, cellsOnEdge, edgesOnCell, cellsOnCell
2618 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: dvedge, dcedge, areacell
2619 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: v
2620 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: sorted_arr
2621 integer, dimension(:), pointer :: bdyMaskCell
2622
2623 type (field1DReal), pointer :: tempField
2624 type (field1DReal), pointer :: ter_field
2625 type (field1DReal), target :: tempFieldTarget
2626
2627 real(kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: hs, hs1, sm0
2628 real(kind=rkind) :: hm, hm_global, zh, dzmin, dzmina, dzmina_global, dzminf, dzminf_global, sm
2629 real(kind=rkind) :: dcsum
2630 integer :: nsmterrain, kz, sfc_k
2631 logical :: hybrid, smooth
2632
2633 integer :: it
2634 real (kind=rkind) :: p_check
2635
2636 ! For interpolating terrain and land use
2637 integer :: nx, ny
2638 integer :: istatus
2639
2640 real (kind=rkind), allocatable, dimension(:,:) :: rslab, maskslab
2641 integer, dimension(:), pointer :: mask_array
2642 integer, dimension(nEdges), target :: edge_mask
2643 character (len=StrKIND) :: fname
2644 logical :: is_sfc_field
2645
2646 real (kind=rkind) :: flux, fluxk, lat1, lat2, eta_v, r_pert, u_pert, lat_pert, lon_pert, r
2647 real (kind=rkind) :: lat, lon, x, y
2648
2649 real (kind=rkind) :: ptop, p0, phi
2650 real (kind=rkind) :: lon_edge
2651
2652 real (kind=rkind) :: r_earth, etavs, ztemp, zd, zt, dz, gam, delt, str
2653
2654 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels, nCells) :: rel_hum, temperature, qv
2655 real (kind=rkind) :: ptmp, es, rs, rgas_moist, qvs, xnutr, znut, ptemp, rcv
2656 integer :: iter
2657
2658 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1) :: hyai, hybi, znu, znw, znwc, znwv, hyam, hybm
2659 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1) :: znuc, znuv, bn, divh, dpn
2660
2661 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: specified_zw
2662 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1) :: sh, zw, ah
2663 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels) :: zu, dzw, rdzwp, rdzwm
2664 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels) :: eta, etav, teta, ppi, tt
2665
2666 real (kind=rkind) :: d1, d2, d3, cof1, cof2, psurf
2667
2668 ! storage for (lat,z) arrays for zonal velocity calculation
2669
2670 integer, parameter :: nlat=361
2671 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1) :: zz_1d, zgrid_1d, hx_1d
2672 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels) :: flux_zonal
2673 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nlat, nVertLevels) :: u_2d, etavs_2d
2674 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1) :: fsum
2675 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nlat) :: lat_2d
2676 real (kind=rkind) :: dlat
2677 real (kind=rkind) :: z_edge, z_edge3, d2fdx2_cell1, d2fdx2_cell2
2678 real (kind=rkind) :: alt, als, zetal, zl
2679
2680 ! calculation of the water vapor mixing ratio:
2681 real (kind=rkind) :: sh_max,sh_min,global_sh_max,global_sh_min
2682
2683 character (len=StrKIND), pointer :: config_met_prefix
2684 character (len=StrKIND), pointer :: config_start_time
2685 logical, pointer :: config_met_interp
2686 logical, pointer :: config_vertical_grid
2687 integer, pointer :: config_nsmterrain
2688 integer, pointer :: config_nsm
2689 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: config_dzmin
2690 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: config_ztop
2691 logical, pointer :: config_tc_vertical_grid
2692 character (len=StrKIND), pointer :: config_specified_zeta_levels
2693 logical, pointer :: config_use_spechumd
2694 integer, pointer :: config_nfglevels
2695 integer, pointer :: config_nfgsoillevels
2696 logical, pointer :: config_smooth_surfaces
2697 integer, pointer :: config_theta_adv_order
2698 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: config_coef_3rd_order
2699 logical, pointer :: config_blend_bdy_terrain
2700
2701 character (len=StrKIND), pointer :: config_extrap_airtemp
2702 integer :: extrap_airtemp
2703
2704 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: latcell, loncell
2705 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: latedge, lonedge
2706 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: angleedge
2707 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: cf1, cf2, cf3
2708 integer, dimension(:), pointer :: landmask
2709
2710 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: dzs_fg
2711 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: zs_fg
2712
2713 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: sst
2714 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: seaice
2715 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xice
2716 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: u
2717 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: w
2718 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: theta
2719 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: rho
2720 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: relhum
2721 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: spechum
2722 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: ru
2723 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: rw
2724 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: precipw
2725 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: ureconstructx
2726 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: ureconstructy
2727 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: ureconstructz
2728 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: ureconstructzonal
2729 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: ureconstructmeridional
2730
2731 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: psfc
2732 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: skintemp
2733 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: snow
2734 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: snowc
2735 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: u_fg
2736 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: v_fg
2737 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: z_fg
2738 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: t_fg
2739 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: rh_fg
2740 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: sh_fg
2741 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: gfs_z
2742 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: p_fg
2743 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: st_fg
2744 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: sm_fg
2745 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: soilz
2746
2747 type (hashtable) :: level_hash
2748 logical :: too_many_fg_levs
2749 integer :: level_value
2750
2751 ! For outputting surface fields u10, v10, q2, rh2, and t2m from first-guess data
2752 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: u10
2753 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: v10
2754 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: q2
2755 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: rh2
2756 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: t2m
2757
2758 character (len=StrKIND) :: errstring
2759
2760 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_met_prefix', config_met_prefix)
2761 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_start_time', config_start_time)
2762 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_met_interp', config_met_interp)
2763 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_vertical_grid', config_vertical_grid)
2764 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_nsmterrain', config_nsmterrain)
2765 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_nsm', config_nsm)
2766 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_dzmin', config_dzmin)
2767 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_ztop', config_ztop)
2768 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_tc_vertical_grid', config_tc_vertical_grid)
2769 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_specified_zeta_levels', config_specified_zeta_levels)
2770 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_use_spechumd', config_use_spechumd)
2771 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_nfglevels', config_nfglevels)
2772 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_nfgsoillevels', config_nfgsoillevels)
2773 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_smooth_surfaces', config_smooth_surfaces)
2774 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_theta_adv_order', config_theta_adv_order)
2775 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_coef_3rd_order', config_coef_3rd_order)
2776 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_blend_bdy_terrain', config_blend_bdy_terrain)
2777
2778 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_extrap_airtemp', config_extrap_airtemp)
2779 if (trim(config_extrap_airtemp) == 'constant') then
2780 extrap_airtemp = 0
2781 else if (trim(config_extrap_airtemp) == 'linear') then
2782 extrap_airtemp = 1
2783 else if (trim(config_extrap_airtemp) == 'lapse-rate') then
2784 extrap_airtemp = 2
2785 else
2786 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
2787 call mpas_log_write('* Invalid value for namelist variable config_extrap_airtemp *', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
2788 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
2789 end if
2790 call mpas_log_write("Using option '" // trim(config_extrap_airtemp) // "' for vertical extrapolation of temperature")
2791
2792 parinfo => block % parinfo
2793 dminfo => block % domain % dminfo
2794
2795 call mpas_pool_get_field(mesh, 'ter', ter_field)
2796
2797 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'nEdgesOnCell', nedgesoncell)
2798 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'edgesOnEdge', edgesonedge)
2799 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'edgesOnCell', edgesoncell)
2800 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dvEdge', dvedge)
2801 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dcEdge', dcedge)
2802 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'areaCell', areacell)
2803 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cellsOnEdge', cellsonedge)
2804 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cellsOnCell', cellsoncell)
2805 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'angleEdge', angleedge)
2806
2807 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'deriv_two', deriv_two)
2808 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zb', zb)
2809 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zb3', zb3)
2810
2811 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zgrid', zgrid)
2812 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'rdzw', rdzw)
2813 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dzu', dzu)
2814 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'rdzu', rdzu)
2815 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fzm', fzm)
2816 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fzp', fzp)
2817 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zxu', zxu)
2818 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zz', zz)
2819 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'hx', hx)
2820 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'ter', ter)
2821 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dss', dss)
2822
2823 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'exner_base', pb)
2824 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho_base', rb)
2825 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'theta_base', tb)
2826 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rtheta_base', rtb)
2827 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'exner', p)
2828 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_base', ppb)
2829 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_p', pp)
2830 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure', pressure)
2831 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'surface_pressure', surface_pressure)
2832 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'relhum', relhum)
2833 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'spechum', spechum)
2834 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'ru', ru)
2835 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rw', rw)
2836
2837 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'rho_zz', rho_zz)
2838 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho_p', rr)
2839 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'theta_m', t)
2840 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rtheta_p', rt)
2841 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'scalars', scalars)
2842 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'u', u)
2843 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'w', w)
2844 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'theta', theta)
2845 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho', rho)
2846 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag_physics, 'precipw', precipw)
2847 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'uReconstructX', ureconstructx)
2848 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'uReconstructY', ureconstructy)
2849 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'uReconstructZ', ureconstructz)
2850 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'uReconstructZonal', ureconstructzonal)
2851 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'uReconstructMeridional', ureconstructmeridional)
2852
2853 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'latCell', latcell)
2854 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'lonCell', loncell)
2855 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'latEdge', latedge)
2856 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'lonEdge', lonedge)
2857 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf1', cf1)
2858 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf2', cf2)
2859 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cf3', cf3)
2860 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'landmask', landmask)
2861
2862 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'dzs_fg', dzs_fg)
2863 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'zs_fg', zs_fg)
2864 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sst', sst)
2865 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'xice', xice)
2866 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'seaice', seaice)
2867 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'st_fg', st_fg)
2868 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', sm_fg)
2869 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'psfc', psfc)
2870 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'skintemp', skintemp)
2871 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'snow', snow)
2872 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'snowc', snowc)
2873 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'u', u_fg)
2874 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'v', v_fg)
2875 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'z', z_fg)
2876 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 't', t_fg)
2877 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'rh', rh_fg)
2878 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sh', sh_fg)
2879 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'gfs_z', gfs_z)
2880 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'p', p_fg)
2881
2882 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(dims, 'nVertLevels', nz1)
2883 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(dims, 'nCellsSolve', ncellssolve)
2884 nz = nz1 + 1
2885
2886 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(state, 'index_qv', index_qv)
2887
2888 xnutr = 0.
2889 zd = 12000.
2890 znut = eta_t
2891
2892 etavs = (1.-0.252)*pii/2.
2893 rcv = rgas/(cp-rgas)
2894 omega_e = omega
2895 p0 = 1.e+05
2896
2897 scalars(:,:,:) = 0.
2898
2899
2900 !
2901 ! If requested, blend the terrain along the domain boundaries with terrain from
2902 ! an intermediate file. For global domains, this routine will have no effect even
2903 ! if called, since terrain is only blended for cells with bdyMaskCell > 0.
2904 !
2905 if (config_blend_bdy_terrain) then
2906 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'bdyMaskCell', bdymaskcell)
2907 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'ter', ter)
2908
2909 call blend_bdy_terrain(config_met_prefix, config_start_time, ncells, latcell, loncell, bdymaskcell, ter, .false., istatus)
2910 if (istatus /= 0) then
2911 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
2912 call mpas_log_write('* Blending of terrain along domain boundaries failed! *', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
2913 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
2914 end if
2915 end if
2916
2917
2918 if (config_vertical_grid) then
2919
2920 !
2921 ! Vertical grid setup
2922 !
2923 allocate(hs(ncells+1))
2924 allocate(hs1(ncells+1))
2925
2926! Fourth order smoother for terrain
2927
2928 nsmterrain = config_nsmterrain
2929
2930 do i=1,nsmterrain
2931
2932 do icell=1,ncells
2933 hs(icell) = 0.
2934 if(ter(icell) .ne. 0.) then
2935 do j = 1,nedgesoncell(icell)
2936
2937 ! For smoothing at cells along the boundary of the mesh, set the terrain value
2938 ! for non-existent neighbors, which map to the "garbage cell", to the same as
2939 ! the terrain in the cell being smoothed
2940 if (cellsoncell(j,icell) == ncells+1) then
2941 ter(ncells+1) = ter(icell)
2942 end if
2943
2944 hs(icell) = hs(icell) + dvedge(edgesoncell(j,icell)) &
2945 / dcedge(edgesoncell(j,icell)) &
2946 * (ter(cellsoncell(j,icell))-ter(icell))
2947 end do
2948 end if
2949 hs(icell) = ter(icell) + 0.216*hs(icell)
2950 end do
2951
2952 do icell=1,ncells
2953 ter(icell) = 0.
2954 if(hs(icell) .ne. 0.) then
2955 do j = 1,nedgesoncell(icell)
2956
2957 ! For smoothing at cells along the boundary of the mesh, set the terrain value
2958 ! for non-existent neighbors, which map to the "garbage cell", to the same as
2959 ! the terrain in the cell being smoothed
2960 if (cellsoncell(j,icell) == ncells+1) then
2961 hs(ncells+1) = hs(icell)
2962 end if
2963
2964 ter(icell) = ter(icell) + dvedge(edgesoncell(j,icell)) &
2965 / dcedge(edgesoncell(j,icell)) &
2966 * (hs(cellsoncell(j,icell))-hs(icell))
2967 end do
2968 end if
2969 ter(icell) = hs(icell) - 0.216*ter(icell)
2970 end do
2971
2972 ! note that ther variable ter used throughout this section is a pointer to grid % ter % array, here we are passing ter's parent field
2973 call mpas_dmpar_exch_halo_field(ter_field)
2974
2975 end do
2976
2977 do icell=1,ncells
2978 hx(:,icell) = ter(icell)
2979 end do
2980
2981 hm = maxval(ter(1:ncellssolve))
2982 call mpas_dmpar_max_real(dminfo, hm, hm_global)
2983 hm = hm_global
2984 call mpas_log_write('max ter = $r', realargs=(/hm/))
2985
2986! Metrics for hybrid coordinate and vertical stretching
2987
2988 !
2989 ! If a the name of a file with vertical coordinate values has been specified,
2990 ! use those values to setup the vertical grid
2991 !
2992 if (len_trim(config_specified_zeta_levels) > 0) then
2993
2994 call mpas_log_write('Setting up vertical grid using levels from '''//trim(config_specified_zeta_levels)//'''')
2995
2996 if (read_text_array(dminfo, trim(config_specified_zeta_levels), specified_zw) /= 0) then
2997 call mpas_log_write('Failed to read vertical levels from '''//trim(config_specified_zeta_levels)//'''', &
2998 messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
2999 end if
3000
3001 if (size(specified_zw) /= nz) then
3002 call mpas_log_write('In the namelist.init_atmosphere file, config_nvertlevels = $i, but ', intargs=(/nz1/), &
3003 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
3004 call mpas_log_write('but '''//trim(config_specified_zeta_levels)//''' has $i values.', intargs=(/size(specified_zw)/), &
3005 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
3006 call mpas_log_write(''''//trim(config_specified_zeta_levels)//''' must contain nVertLevels+1 ($i) values.', intargs=(/nz/), &
3007 messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
3008 end if
3009
3010 zw(:) = specified_zw(:)
3011 zt = zw(nz)
3012
3013 deallocate(specified_zw)
3014
3015 !
3016 ! Otherwise, see if the user has requested to set up the vertical grid as in the MPAS TC configuration
3017 !
3018 else if (config_tc_vertical_grid) then
3019
3020 call mpas_log_write('Setting up vertical levels as in 2014 TC experiments')
3021
3022 zt = config_ztop
3023 dz = zt/float(nz1)
3024
3025!... Laura D. Fowler: change the values als,alt,and zetal valid for nVertLevels=41 to values
3026! needed for nVertLevels equal or greater than 55.
3027 if (nvertlevels >= 55) then
3028 als = .075 ! 55 levels.
3029 alt = 1.70 ! 55 levels.
3030 zetal = .75 ! 55 levels.
3031 else
3032 als = .075 ! 41 levels.
3033 alt = 1.23 ! 41 levels.
3034 zetal = .31 ! 41 levels.
3035 endif
3036 call mpas_log_write('')
3037 call mpas_log_write('--- config_tc_vertical_grid = $l', logicargs=(/config_tc_vertical_grid/))
3038 call mpas_log_write('--- als = $r', realargs=(/als/))
3039 call mpas_log_write('--- alt = $r', realargs=(/alt/))
3040 call mpas_log_write('--- zetal = $r', realargs=(/zetal/))
3041 if (nvertlevels /= 55 .and. nvertlevels /= 41) then
3042 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************')
3043 call mpas_log_write('* Note: als, alt, and zetal have not been tested for nVertLevels = $i', intargs=(/nvertlevels/))
3044 call mpas_log_write('* The values of these parameters have only been tested with 41 and 55 layers')
3045 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************')
3046 end if
3047 call mpas_log_write('')
3048!... end Laura D. Fowler / 2016-04-12.
3049
3050 do k=1,nz
3051 zl = 1.-alt*(1.-zetal)
3052 if ((real(k-1)/real(nz1)).LT.zetal) then
3053 zw(k) = (als*real(k-1)/real(nz1) &
3054 +(3.*(1.-alt)+2.*(alt-als)*zetal) &
3055 *((k-1)*dz/(zt*zetal))**2 &
3056 -(2.*(1.-alt) + (alt-als)*zetal) &
3057 *(real(k-1)*dz/(zt*zetal))**3) * zt
3058 else
3059 zw(k) = (zl+alt*(real(k-1)/real(nz1)-zetal))*zt
3060 end if
3061 if (k > 1) dzw(k-1) = zw(k)-zw(k-1)
3062 end do
3063
3064 !
3065 ! Otherwise, use the vertical level configuration from MPAS v2.0
3066 !
3067 else
3068
3069 call mpas_log_write('Setting up vertical levels as in MPAS 2.0 and earlier')
3070
3071 str = 1.5
3072 zt = config_ztop
3073 dz = zt/float(nz1)
3074
3075 do k=1,nz
3076 zw(k) = (real(k-1)/real(nz1))**str*zt
3077 if (k > 1) dzw(k-1) = zw(k)-zw(k-1)
3078 end do
3079 end if
3080
3081! ah(k) governs the transition between terrain-following
3082! and pure height coordinates
3083! ah(k) = 1 is a smoothed terrain-following coordinate
3084! ah(k) = 1.-zw(k)/zt is the basic terrain-following coordinate
3085! ah(k) = 0 is a height coordinate
3086
3087 hybrid = .true.
3088! hybrid = .false.
3089
3090 kz = nz
3091 if (hybrid) then
3092
3093 zh = 30000.0
3094! zh = 0.5*zt
3095
3096 do k=1,nz
3097 if (zw(k) < zh) then
3098 ah(k) = cos(.5*pii*zw(k)/zh)**6
3099
3100!!! ah(k) = ah(k)*(1.-zw(k)/zt)
3101
3102 else
3103 ah(k) = 0.
3104 kz = min(kz,k)
3105 end if
3106 end do
3107
3108 else
3109
3110 do k=1,nz
3111 ah(k) = 1.-zw(k)/zt
3112 end do
3113
3114 end if
3115
3116 do k=1,nz
3117 call mpas_log_write('$i $r $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/zw(k), ah(k)/))
3118 end do
3119
3120 do k=1,nz1
3121 dzw(k) = zw(k+1)-zw(k)
3122 rdzw(k) = 1./dzw(k)
3123 zu(k ) = .5*(zw(k)+zw(k+1))
3124 end do
3125 do k=2,nz1
3126 dzu(k) = .5*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1))
3127 rdzu(k) = 1./dzu(k)
3128 fzp(k) = .5* dzw(k )/dzu(k)
3129 fzm(k) = .5* dzw(k-1)/dzu(k)
3130 rdzwp(k) = dzw(k-1)/(dzw(k )*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1)))
3131 rdzwm(k) = dzw(k )/(dzw(k-1)*(dzw(k)+dzw(k-1)))
3132 end do
3133
3134!********** how are we storing cf1, cf2 and cf3?
3135
3136 cof1 = (2.*dzu(2)+dzu(3))/(dzu(2)+dzu(3))*dzw(1)/dzu(2)
3137 cof2 = dzu(2) /(dzu(2)+dzu(3))*dzw(1)/dzu(3)
3138 cf1 = fzp(2) + cof1
3139 cf2 = fzm(2) - cof1 - cof2
3140 cf3 = cof2
3141
3142! d1 = .5*dzw(1)
3143! d2 = dzw(1)+.5*dzw(2)
3144! d3 = dzw(1)+dzw(2)+.5*dzw(3)
3145! cf1 = d2*d3*(d3-d2)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
3146! cf2 = d1*d3*(d1-d3)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
3147! cf3 = d1*d2*(d2-d1)/(d2*d3*(d3-d2)+d1*d3*(d1-d3)+d1*d2*(d2-d1))
3148
3149
3150! Smoothing algorithm for coordinate surfaces
3151
3152 smooth = config_smooth_surfaces
3153
3154 if (smooth) then
3155
3156 dzmin = config_dzmin
3157
3158 allocate(sm0(ncells+1))
3159
3160 do icell=1,ncells
3161 dcsum = 0.0
3162 do j=1,nedgesoncell(icell)
3163 dcsum = dcsum + dcedge(edgesoncell(j,icell))
3164 end do
3165 dcsum = dcsum / real(nedgesoncell(icell))
3166 sm0(icell) = max(0.01_rkind, 0.125 * min(1.0_rkind, 3000.0_rkind/dcsum))
3167 end do
3168
3169 do k=2,kz-1
3170 hx(k,:) = hx(k-1,:)
3171 dzminf = zw(k)-zw(k-1)
3172
3173 do i=1,config_nsm + k
3174 do icell=1,ncells
3175
3176 sm = sm0(icell) * min((3.0*zw(k)/zt)**2.0, 1.0_rkind)
3177
3178 hs1(icell) = 0.
3179 do j = 1,nedgesoncell(icell)
3180
3181 ! For smoothing at cells along the boundary of the mesh, set the hx value
3182 ! for non-existent neighbors, which map to the "garbage cell", to the same as
3183 ! the hx in the cell being smoothed
3184 if (cellsoncell(j,icell) == ncells+1) then
3185 hx(k,ncells+1) = hx(k,icell)
3186 end if
3187
3188 hs1(icell) = hs1(icell) + dvedge(edgesoncell(j,icell)) &
3189 / dcedge(edgesoncell(j,icell)) &
3190 * (hx(k,cellsoncell(j,icell))-hx(k,icell))
3191 end do
3192 hs(icell) = hx(k,icell) + sm*hs1(icell)
3193
3194 end do
3195
3196 tempfield => tempfieldtarget
3197 tempfield % block => block
3198 tempfield % dimSizes(1) = ncells
3199 tempfield % sendList => parinfo % cellsToSend
3200 tempfield % recvList => parinfo % cellsToRecv
3201 tempfield % copyList => parinfo % cellsToCopy
3202 tempfield % array => hs
3203 tempfield % isActive = .true.
3204 tempfield % prev => null()
3205 tempfield % next => null()
3206
3207 call mpas_dmpar_exch_halo_field(tempfield)
3208
3209 do icell=1,ncells
3210 dzmina = (zw(k) + ah(k)*hs(icell)) - (zw(k-1) + ah(k-1)*hx(k-1,icell))
3211 if (dzmina > dzmin*(zw(k)-zw(k-1))) then
3212 hx(k,icell) = hs(icell)
3213 if (dzmina < dzminf) dzminf = dzmina
3214 end if
3215 end do
3216
3217 end do
3218 call mpas_dmpar_min_real(dminfo, dzminf, dzminf_global)
3219 call mpas_log_write('$i $i $r $r', intargs=(/k,i/), realargs=(/sm,dzminf_global/(zw(k)-zw(k-1))/))
3220 end do
3221
3222 deallocate(sm0)
3223
3224 do k=kz,nz
3225 hx(k,:) = 0.
3226 end do
3227
3228 else
3229
3230 do k=2,nz1
3231 dzmina = minval(zw(k)+ah(k)*hx(k,:)-zw(k-1)-ah(k-1)*hx(k-1,:))
3232 call mpas_log_write('$i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/dzmina/(zw(k)-zw(k-1))/))
3233 end do
3234
3235 end if
3236
3237 deallocate(hs )
3238 deallocate(hs1)
3239
3240! Height of coordinate levels (calculation of zgrid)
3241
3242 do icell=1,ncells
3243 do k=1,nz
3244 zgrid(k,icell) = zw(k) + ah(k)*hx(k,icell)
3245 end do
3246 do k=1,nz1
3247 zz(k,icell) = (zw(k+1)-zw(k))/(zgrid(k+1,icell)-zgrid(k,icell))
3248 end do
3249 end do
3250
3251 do i=1, nedges
3252 icell1 = cellsonedge(1,i)
3253 icell2 = cellsonedge(2,i)
3254 do k=1,nz1
3255 zxu(k,i) = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell2)-zgrid(k,icell1) + zgrid(k+1,icell2)-zgrid(k+1,icell1)) / dcedge(i)
3256 end do
3257 end do
3258 do i=1, ncells
3259 do k=1,nz1
3260 ztemp = .5*(zgrid(k+1,i)+zgrid(k,i))
3261 dss(k,i) = 0.
3262 ztemp = zgrid(k,i)
3263 if (ztemp.gt.zd+.1) then
3264 dss(k,i) = dss(k,i)+xnutr*sin(.5*pii*(ztemp-zd)/(zt-zd))**2
3265 end if
3266 end do
3267 end do
3268
3269
3270 ! For z-metric term in omega equation
3271 do iedge = 1,nedges
3272 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,iedge)
3273 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,iedge)
3274
3275 ! Avoid referencing the garbage cell for exterior edges
3276 if (cell1 == ncells+1) then
3277 cell1 = cell2
3278 end if
3279 if (cell2 == ncells+1) then
3280 cell2 = cell1
3281 end if
3282
3283 if (cell1 <= ncellssolve .or. cell2 <= ncellssolve ) then
3284
3285 do k = 1, nvertlevels
3286
3287 if (config_theta_adv_order == 2) then
3288
3289 z_edge = (zgrid(k,cell1)+zgrid(k,cell2))/2.
3290
3291 else !theta_adv_order == 3 or 4
3292
3293 d2fdx2_cell1 = deriv_two(1,1,iedge) * zgrid(k,cell1)
3294 d2fdx2_cell2 = deriv_two(1,2,iedge) * zgrid(k,cell2)
3295 do i=1, nedgesoncell(cell1)
3296 if ( cellsoncell(i,cell1) > 0) &
3297 d2fdx2_cell1 = d2fdx2_cell1 + deriv_two(i+1,1,iedge) * zgrid(k,cellsoncell(i,cell1))
3298 end do
3299 do i=1, nedgesoncell(cell2)
3300 if ( cellsoncell(i,cell2) > 0) &
3301 d2fdx2_cell2 = d2fdx2_cell2 + deriv_two(i+1,2,iedge) * zgrid(k,cellsoncell(i,cell2))
3302 end do
3303
3304 z_edge = 0.5*(zgrid(k,cell1) + zgrid(k,cell2)) &
3305 - (dcedge(iedge) **2) * (d2fdx2_cell1 + d2fdx2_cell2) / 12.
3306
3307 if (config_theta_adv_order == 3) then
3308 z_edge3 = - (dcedge(iedge) **2) * (d2fdx2_cell1 - d2fdx2_cell2) / 12.
3309 else
3310 z_edge3 = 0.
3311 end if
3312
3313 end if
3314
3315 zb(k,1,iedge) = (z_edge-zgrid(k,cell1))*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell1)
3316 zb(k,2,iedge) = (z_edge-zgrid(k,cell2))*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell2)
3317 zb3(k,1,iedge)= z_edge3*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell1)
3318 zb3(k,2,iedge)= z_edge3*dvedge(iedge)/areacell(cell2)
3319
3320 end do
3321
3322 end if
3323 end do
3324
3325 call mpas_log_write(' grid metrics setup complete ')
3326
3327 end if ! config_vertical_grid
3328
3329
3330 if (config_met_interp) then
3331
3332 !ldf (2011-11-19): added initialization of the sea-surface temperature, seaice fraction, and
3333 !seaice flag:
3334 sst = 0.0
3335 xice = 0.0
3336 seaice = 0.0
3337 !ldf end.
3338
3339 !
3340 ! First, try to locate the LANDSEA field for use as an interpolation mask
3341 !
3342 call read_met_init(trim(config_met_prefix), .false., config_start_time(1:13), istatus)
3343
3344 if (istatus /= 0) then
3345 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
3346 call mpas_log_write('Error opening initial meteorological data file ' &
3347 //trim(config_met_prefix)//':'//config_start_time(1:13), messagetype=mpas_log_err)
3348 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
3349 end if
3350
3351 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
3352
3353 do while (istatus == 0)
3354 if (trim(field % field) == 'LANDSEA') then
3355
3356 allocate(maskslab(-2:field % nx+3, field % ny))
3357 maskslab(1:field % nx, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(1:field % nx, 1:field % ny)
3358 maskslab(0, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx, 1:field % ny)
3359 maskslab(-1, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx-1, 1:field % ny)
3360 maskslab(-2, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx-2, 1:field % ny)
3361 maskslab(field % nx+1, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(1, 1:field % ny)
3362 maskslab(field % nx+2, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(2, 1:field % ny)
3363 maskslab(field % nx+3, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(3, 1:field % ny)
3364 call mpas_log_write('minval, maxval of LANDSEA = $r $r', realargs=(/minval(maskslab), maxval(maskslab)/))
3365
3366 end if
3367
3368 deallocate(field % slab)
3369 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
3370 end do
3371
3372 call read_met_close()
3373
3374 if (.not. allocated(maskslab)) then
3375 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
3376 call mpas_log_write('LANDSEA field not found in meteorological data file ' &
3377 //trim(config_met_prefix)//':'//config_start_time(1:13), messagetype=mpas_log_err)
3378 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
3379 end if
3380
3381 edge_mask(:) = 1
3382
3383
3384 !
3385 ! Horizontally interpolate meteorological data
3386 !
3387 allocate(vert_level(config_nfglevels))
3388 vert_level(:) = -1.0
3389
3390 call read_met_init(trim(config_met_prefix), .false., config_start_time(1:13), istatus)
3391
3392 if (istatus /= 0) then
3393 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
3394 call mpas_log_write('Error opening initial meteorological data file ' &
3395 //trim(config_met_prefix)//':'//config_start_time(1:13), messagetype=mpas_log_err)
3396 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
3397 end if
3398
3399 call mpas_hash_init(level_hash)
3400 too_many_fg_levs = .false.
3401
3402 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
3403
3404 do while (istatus == 0)
3405
3406 interp_list(1) = four_point
3407 interp_list(2) = search
3408 interp_list(3) = 0
3409
3410 maskval = -1.0
3411 masked = -1
3412 fillval = 0.0
3413 msgval = -1.e30
3414
3415 mask_array => landmask
3416
3417 if (trim(field % field) == 'UU' .or. &
3418 trim(field % field) == 'VV' .or. &
3419 trim(field % field) == 'TT' .or. &
3420 trim(field % field) == 'RH' .or. &
3421 trim(field % field) == 'SPECHUMD' .or. &
3422 trim(field % field) == 'GHT' .or. &
3423 trim(field % field) == 'PMSL' .or. &
3424 trim(field % field) == 'PSFC' .or. &
3425 trim(field % field) == 'SOILHGT' .or. &
3426 trim(field % field) == 'SM000010' .or. &
3427 trim(field % field) == 'SM010040' .or. &
3428 trim(field % field) == 'SM040100' .or. &
3429 trim(field % field) == 'SM100200' .or. &
3430 trim(field % field) == 'SM010200' .or. &
3431 trim(field % field) == 'SM000007' .or. &
3432 trim(field % field) == 'SM007028' .or. &
3433 trim(field % field) == 'SM028100' .or. &
3434 trim(field % field) == 'SM100255' .or. &
3435 trim(field % field) == 'SM100289' .or. &
3436 trim(field % field) == 'ST000010' .or. &
3437 trim(field % field) == 'ST010040' .or. &
3438 trim(field % field) == 'ST040100' .or. &
3439 trim(field % field) == 'ST100200' .or. &
3440 trim(field % field) == 'ST010200' .or. &
3441 trim(field % field) == 'ST000007' .or. &
3442 trim(field % field) == 'ST007028' .or. &
3443 trim(field % field) == 'ST028100' .or. &
3444 trim(field % field) == 'ST100255' .or. &
3445 trim(field % field) == 'ST100289' .or. &
3446 trim(field % field) == 'PRES' .or. &
3447 trim(field % field) == 'PRESSURE' .or. &
3448 trim(field % field) == 'SNOW' .or. &
3449 trim(field % field) == 'SEAICE' .or. &
3450 trim(field % field) == 'SKINTEMP') then
3451
3452 if (trim(field % field) == 'SM000010' .or. &
3453 trim(field % field) == 'SM010040' .or. &
3454 trim(field % field) == 'SM040100' .or. &
3455 trim(field % field) == 'SM100200' .or. &
3456 trim(field % field) == 'SM010200' .or. &
3457 trim(field % field) == 'SM000007' .or. &
3458 trim(field % field) == 'SM007028' .or. &
3459 trim(field % field) == 'SM028100' .or. &
3460 trim(field % field) == 'SM100255' .or. &
3461 trim(field % field) == 'SM100289' .or. &
3462 trim(field % field) == 'ST000010' .or. &
3463 trim(field % field) == 'ST010040' .or. &
3464 trim(field % field) == 'ST040100' .or. &
3465 trim(field % field) == 'ST100200' .or. &
3466 trim(field % field) == 'ST010200' .or. &
3467 trim(field % field) == 'ST000007' .or. &
3468 trim(field % field) == 'ST007028' .or. &
3469 trim(field % field) == 'ST028100' .or. &
3470 trim(field % field) == 'ST100255' .or. &
3471 trim(field % field) == 'ST100289' .or. &
3472 trim(field % field) == 'SNOW' .or. &
3473 trim(field % field) == 'SEAICE' .or. &
3474 trim(field % field) == 'SKINTEMP') then
3475 k = 1
3476 else if (trim(field % field) /= 'PMSL' .and. &
3477 trim(field % field) /= 'PSFC' .and. &
3478 trim(field % field) /= 'SOILHGT') then
3479
3480 ! Since the hash table can only store integers, transfer the bit pattern from
3481 ! the real-valued xlvl into an integer; that the result is not an integer version
3482 ! of the level is not important, since we only want to test uniqueness of levels
3483 level_value = transfer(field % xlvl, level_value)
3484 if (.not. mpas_hash_search(level_hash, level_value)) then
3485 call mpas_hash_insert(level_hash, level_value)
3486 if (mpas_hash_size(level_hash) > config_nfglevels) then
3487 too_many_fg_levs = .true.
3488 end if
3489 end if
3490
3491 !
3492 ! In case we have more than config_nfglevels levels, just keep cycling through
3493 ! the remaining fields in the intermediate file for the purpose of counting how
3494 ! many unique levels are found using the code above
3495 !
3496 if (too_many_fg_levs) then
3497 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
3498 cycle
3499 end if
3500
3501 do k=1,config_nfglevels
3502 if (vert_level(k) == field % xlvl .or. vert_level(k) == -1.0) exit
3503 end do
3504 if (vert_level(k) == -1.0) vert_level(k) = field % xlvl
3505 else
3506 k = 1
3507 end if
3508
3509 !
3510 ! Set up projection
3511 !
3512 call map_init(proj)
3513
3514 if (field % iproj == proj_latlon) then
3515 call map_set(proj_latlon, proj, &
3516 latinc = real(field % deltalat,rkind), &
3517 loninc = real(field % deltalon,rkind), &
3518 knowni = 1.0_rkind, &
3519 knownj = 1.0_rkind, &
3520 lat1 = real(field % startlat,rkind), &
3521 lon1 = real(field % startlon,rkind))
3522 else if (field % iproj == proj_gauss) then
3523 call map_set(proj_gauss, proj, &
3524 nlat = nint(field % deltalat), &
3525 loninc = 360.0_rkind / real(field % nx,rkind), &
3526 lat1 = real(field % startlat,rkind), &
3527 lon1 = real(field % startlon,rkind))
3528! nxmax = nint(360.0 / field % deltalon), &
3529 end if
3530
3531
3532 !
3533 ! Horizontally interpolate the field at level k
3534 !
3535 if (trim(field % field) == 'UU') then
3536 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating U at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
3537
3538 ! For U10, interpolate to cell centers
3539 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
3540 ninterppoints = ncells
3541 latpoints => latcell
3542 lonpoints => loncell
3543 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'u10', destfield1d)
3544 ndims = 1
3545
3546 ! otherwise to edges
3547 else
3548 mask_array => edge_mask
3549
3550 ninterppoints = nedges
3551 latpoints => latedge
3552 lonpoints => lonedge
3553 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'u', destfield2d)
3554 ndims = 2
3555 end if
3556
3557 else if (trim(field % field) == 'VV') then
3558 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating V at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
3559
3560 ! For V10, interpolate to cell centers
3561 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
3562 ninterppoints = ncells
3563 latpoints => latcell
3564 lonpoints => loncell
3565 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'v10', destfield1d)
3566 ndims = 1
3567
3568 ! otherwise to edges
3569 else
3570 mask_array => edge_mask
3571
3572 ninterppoints = nedges
3573 latpoints => latedge
3574 lonpoints => lonedge
3575 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'v', destfield2d)
3576 ndims = 2
3577 end if
3578
3579 else if (trim(field % field) == 'TT') then
3580 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating TT at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
3581 ninterppoints = ncells
3582 latpoints => latcell
3583 lonpoints => loncell
3584 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 't', destfield2d)
3585 ndims = 2
3586 else if (trim(field % field) == 'RH') then
3587 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating RH at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
3588 ninterppoints = ncells
3589 latpoints => latcell
3590 lonpoints => loncell
3591 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'rh', destfield2d)
3592 ndims = 2
3593 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SPECHUMD') then
3594 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SPECHUMD at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
3595 ninterppoints = ncells
3596 latpoints => latcell
3597 lonpoints => loncell
3598 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sh', destfield2d)
3599 ndims = 2
3600 else if (trim(field % field) == 'GHT') then
3601 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating GHT at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
3602 ninterppoints = ncells
3603 latpoints => latcell
3604 lonpoints => loncell
3605 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'z', destfield2d)
3606 ndims = 2
3607 else if (trim(field % field) == 'PRES') then
3608 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating PRES at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
3609 ninterppoints = ncells
3610 latpoints => latcell
3611 lonpoints => loncell
3612 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'p', destfield2d)
3613 ndims = 2
3614 else if (trim(field % field) == 'PRESSURE') then
3615 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating PRESSURE at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
3616 ninterppoints = ncells
3617 latpoints => latcell
3618 lonpoints => loncell
3619 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'p', destfield2d)
3620 ndims = 2
3621 else if (trim(field % field) == 'PMSL') then
3622 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating PMSL')
3623 ninterppoints = ncells
3624 latpoints => latcell
3625 lonpoints => loncell
3626 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'pmsl', destfield1d)
3627 ndims = 1
3628 else if (trim(field % field) == 'PSFC') then
3629 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating PSFC')
3630 ninterppoints = ncells
3631 latpoints => latcell
3632 lonpoints => loncell
3633 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'psfc', destfield1d)
3634 ndims = 1
3635 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SOILHGT') then
3636 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SOILHGT')
3637 ninterppoints = ncells
3638 latpoints => latcell
3639 lonpoints => loncell
3640 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'soilz', destfield1d)
3641 ndims = 1
3642 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SM000010') then
3643 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SM000010')
3644
3645 interp_list(1) = four_point
3646 interp_list(2) = w_average4
3647 interp_list(3) = search
3648 interp_list(4) = 0
3649
3650 maskval = 0.0
3651 masked = 0
3652 fillval = 1.0
3653
3654 ninterppoints = ncells
3655 latpoints => latcell
3656 lonpoints => loncell
3657 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', destfield2d)
3658 k = 1
3659 ndims = 2
3660 dzs_fg(k,:) = 10.
3661 zs_fg(k,:) = 10.
3662 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SM010200') then
3663 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SM100200')
3664
3665 interp_list(1) = four_point
3666 interp_list(2) = w_average4
3667 interp_list(3) = search
3668 interp_list(4) = 0
3669
3670 maskval = 0.0
3671 masked = 0
3672 fillval = 1.0
3673
3674 ninterppoints = ncells
3675 latpoints => latcell
3676 lonpoints => loncell
3677 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', destfield2d)
3678 k = 2
3679 ndims = 2
3680 dzs_fg(k,:) = 200.-10.
3681 zs_fg(k,:) = 200.
3682 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SM010040') then
3683 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SM010040')
3684
3685 interp_list(1) = four_point
3686 interp_list(2) = w_average4
3687 interp_list(3) = search
3688 interp_list(4) = 0
3689
3690 maskval = 0.0
3691 masked = 0
3692 fillval = 1.0
3693
3694 ninterppoints = ncells
3695 latpoints => latcell
3696 lonpoints => loncell
3697 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', destfield2d)
3698 k = 2
3699 ndims = 2
3700 dzs_fg(k,:) = 40.-10.
3701 zs_fg(k,:) = 40.
3702 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SM040100') then
3703 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SM040100')
3704
3705 interp_list(1) = four_point
3706 interp_list(2) = w_average4
3707 interp_list(3) = search
3708 interp_list(4) = 0
3709
3710 maskval = 0.0
3711 masked = 0
3712 fillval = 1.0
3713
3714 ninterppoints = ncells
3715 latpoints => latcell
3716 lonpoints => loncell
3717 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', destfield2d)
3718 k = 3
3719 ndims = 2
3720 dzs_fg(k,:) = 100.-40.
3721 zs_fg(k,:) = 100.
3722 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SM100200') then
3723 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SM100200')
3724
3725 interp_list(1) = four_point
3726 interp_list(2) = w_average4
3727 interp_list(3) = search
3728 interp_list(4) = 0
3729
3730 maskval = 0.0
3731 masked = 0
3732 fillval = 1.0
3733
3734 ninterppoints = ncells
3735 latpoints => latcell
3736 lonpoints => loncell
3737 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', destfield2d)
3738 k = 4
3739 ndims = 2
3740 dzs_fg(k,:) = 200.-100.
3741 zs_fg(k,:) = 200.
3742 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SM000007') then
3743 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SM000007')
3744
3745 interp_list(1) = four_point
3746 interp_list(2) = w_average4
3747 interp_list(3) = search
3748 interp_list(4) = 0
3749
3750 maskval = 0.0
3751 masked = 0
3752 fillval = 1.0
3753
3754 ninterppoints = ncells
3755 latpoints => latcell
3756 lonpoints => loncell
3757 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', destfield2d)
3758 k = 1
3759 ndims = 2
3760 dzs_fg(k,:) = 7.
3761 zs_fg(k,:) = 7.
3762 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SM007028') then
3763 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SM007028')
3764
3765 interp_list(1) = four_point
3766 interp_list(2) = w_average4
3767 interp_list(3) = search
3768 interp_list(4) = 0
3769
3770 maskval = 0.0
3771 masked = 0
3772 fillval = 1.0
3773
3774 ninterppoints = ncells
3775 latpoints => latcell
3776 lonpoints => loncell
3777 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', destfield2d)
3778 k = 2
3779 ndims = 2
3780 dzs_fg(k,:) = 28.-7.
3781 zs_fg(k,:) = 28.
3782 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SM028100') then
3783 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SM028100')
3784
3785 interp_list(1) = four_point
3786 interp_list(2) = w_average4
3787 interp_list(3) = search
3788 interp_list(4) = 0
3789
3790 maskval = 0.0
3791 masked = 0
3792 fillval = 1.0
3793
3794 ninterppoints = ncells
3795 latpoints => latcell
3796 lonpoints => loncell
3797 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', destfield2d)
3798 k = 3
3799 ndims = 2
3800 dzs_fg(k,:) = 100.-28.
3801 zs_fg(k,:) = 100.
3802 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SM100255') then
3803 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SM100255')
3804
3805 interp_list(1) = four_point
3806 interp_list(2) = w_average4
3807 interp_list(3) = search
3808 interp_list(4) = 0
3809
3810 maskval = 0.0
3811 masked = 0
3812 fillval = 1.0
3813
3814 ninterppoints = ncells
3815 latpoints => latcell
3816 lonpoints => loncell
3817 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', destfield2d)
3818 k = 4
3819 ndims = 2
3820 dzs_fg(k,:) = 255.-100.
3821 zs_fg(k,:) = 255.
3822 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SM100289') then
3823 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SM100289')
3824
3825 interp_list(1) = four_point
3826 interp_list(2) = w_average4
3827 interp_list(3) = search
3828 interp_list(4) = 0
3829
3830 maskval = 0.0
3831 masked = 0
3832 fillval = 1.0
3833
3834 ninterppoints = ncells
3835 latpoints => latcell
3836 lonpoints => loncell
3837 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sm_fg', destfield2d)
3838 k = 4
3839 ndims = 2
3840 dzs_fg(k,:) = 289.-100.
3841 zs_fg(k,:) = 289.
3842 else if (trim(field % field) == 'ST000010') then
3843 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating ST000010')
3844
3845 interp_list(1) = sixteen_point
3846 interp_list(2) = four_point
3847 interp_list(3) = w_average4
3848 interp_list(4) = search
3849 interp_list(5) = 0
3850
3851 maskval = 0.0
3852 masked = 0
3853 fillval = 285.0
3854
3855 ninterppoints = ncells
3856 latpoints => latcell
3857 lonpoints => loncell
3858 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'st_fg', destfield2d)
3859 k = 1
3860 ndims = 2
3861 dzs_fg(k,:) = 10.
3862 zs_fg(k,:) = 10.
3863 else if (trim(field % field) == 'ST010200') then
3864 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating ST010200')
3865
3866 interp_list(1) = sixteen_point
3867 interp_list(2) = four_point
3868 interp_list(3) = w_average4

3880 k = 2

3884 else if (trim(field % field) == 'ST010040') then

3901 k = 2

3905 else if (trim(field % field) == 'ST040100') then

3926 else if (trim(field % field) == 'ST100200') then

3947 else if (trim(field % field) == 'ST000007') then

3962 lonpoints => loncell
3963 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'st_fg', destfield2d)
3964 k = 1

3967 zs_fg(k,:) = 7.
3968 else if (trim(field % field) == 'ST007028') then
3969 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating ST007028')
3970
3971 interp_list(1) = sixteen_point

3973 interp_list(3) = w_average4
3974 interp_list(4) = search
3975 interp_list(5) = 0
3976
3977 maskval = 0.0
3978 masked = 0

3980

3982 latpoints => latcell
3983 lonpoints => loncell
3984 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'st_fg', destfield2d)
3985 k = 2

3987 dzs_fg(k,:) = 28.-7.
3988 zs_fg(k,:) = 28.
3989 else if (trim(field % field) == 'ST028100') then
3990 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating ST028100')
3991
3992 interp_list(1) = sixteen_point
3993 interp_list(2) = four_point
3994 interp_list(3) = w_average4
3995 interp_list(4) = search
3996 interp_list(5) = 0
3997
3998 maskval = 0.0
3999 masked = 0
4000 fillval = 285.0
4001
4002 ninterppoints = ncells
4003 latpoints => latcell
4004 lonpoints => loncell
4005 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'st_fg', destfield2d)
4006 k = 3
4007 ndims = 2
4008 dzs_fg(k,:) = 100.-28.
4009 zs_fg(k,:) = 100.
4010 else if (trim(field % field) == 'ST100255') then
4011 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating ST100255')
4012
4013 interp_list(1) = sixteen_point
4014 interp_list(2) = four_point
4015 interp_list(3) = w_average4
4016 interp_list(4) = search
4017 interp_list(5) = 0
4018
4019 maskval = 0.0
4020 masked = 0
4021 fillval = 285.0
4022
4023 ninterppoints = ncells
4024 latpoints => latcell
4025 lonpoints => loncell
4026 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'st_fg', destfield2d)
4027 k = 4
4028 ndims = 2
4029 dzs_fg(k,:) = 255.-100.
4030 zs_fg(k,:) = 255.
4031 else if (trim(field % field) == 'ST100289') then
4032 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating ST100289')
4033
4034 interp_list(1) = sixteen_point
4035 interp_list(2) = four_point
4036 interp_list(3) = w_average4
4037 interp_list(4) = search
4038 interp_list(5) = 0
4039
4040 maskval = 0.0
4041 masked = 0
4042 fillval = 285.0
4043
4044 ninterppoints = ncells
4045 latpoints => latcell
4046 lonpoints => loncell
4047 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'st_fg', destfield2d)
4048 k = 4
4049 ndims = 2
4050 dzs_fg(k,:) = 289.-100.
4051 zs_fg(k,:) = 289.
4052 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SNOW') then
4053 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SNOW')
4054
4055 interp_list(1) = four_point
4056 interp_list(2) = w_average4
4057 interp_list(3) = 0
4058
4059 masked = 0
4060 fillval = 0.0
4061
4062 ninterppoints = ncells
4063 latpoints => latcell
4064 lonpoints => loncell
4065 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'snow', destfield1d)
4066 ndims = 1
4067 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SEAICE') then
4068 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SEAICE')
4069
4070 interp_list(1) = four_point
4071 interp_list(2) = w_average4
4072 interp_list(3) = search
4073 interp_list(4) = 0
4074
4075 maskval = 1.0
4076 masked = 1
4077 fillval = 0.0
4078
4079 ninterppoints = ncells
4080 latpoints => latcell
4081 lonpoints => loncell
4082 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'xice', destfield1d)
4083 ndims = 1
4084 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SKINTEMP') then
4085 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SKINTEMP')
4086 ninterppoints = ncells
4087 latpoints => latcell
4088 lonpoints => loncell
4089 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'skintemp', destfield1d)
4090 ndims = 1
4091 end if
4092
4093 allocate(rslab(-2:field % nx+3, field % ny))
4094 rslab(1:field % nx, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(1:field % nx, 1:field % ny)
4095 rslab(0, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx, 1:field % ny)
4096 rslab(-1, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx-1, 1:field % ny)
4097 rslab(-2, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx-2, 1:field % ny)
4098 rslab(field % nx+1, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(1, 1:field % ny)
4099 rslab(field % nx+2, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(2, 1:field % ny)
4100 rslab(field % nx+3, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(3, 1:field % ny)
4101
4102 do i=1,ninterppoints
4103 if (mask_array(i) /= masked) then
4104 lat = latpoints(i)*deg_per_rad
4105 lon = lonpoints(i)*deg_per_rad
4106 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4107 if (x < 0.5) then
4108 lon = lon + 360.0
4109 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4110 else if (x >= real(field%nx)+0.5) then
4111 lon = lon - 360.0
4112 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4113 end if
4114 if (y < 0.5) then
4115 y = 1.0
4116 else if (y >= real(field%ny)+0.5) then
4117 y = real(field%ny)
4118 end if
4119 if (ndims == 1) then
4120 if (maskval /= -1.0) then
4121 destfield1d(i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, -2, field % nx + 3, 1, field % ny, 1, 1, msgval, interp_list, 1, maskval=maskval, mask_array=maskslab)
4122 else
4123 destfield1d(i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, -2, field % nx + 3, 1, field % ny, 1, 1, msgval, interp_list, 1)
4124 end if
4125 else if (ndims == 2) then
4126 if (maskval /= -1.0) then
4127 destfield2d(k,i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, -2, field % nx + 3, 1, field % ny, 1, 1, msgval, interp_list, 1, maskval=maskval, mask_array=maskslab)
4128 else
4129 destfield2d(k,i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, -2, field % nx + 3, 1, field % ny, 1, 1, msgval, interp_list, 1)
4130 end if
4131 end if
4132 else
4133 if (ndims == 1) then
4134 destfield1d(i) = fillval
4135 else if (ndims == 2) then
4136 destfield2d(k,i) = fillval
4137 end if
4138 end if
4139 end do
4140
4141 !
4142 ! In addition to interpolating wind fields to cell edges, we should
4143 ! also interpolate to cell centers at the surface in order to
4144 ! produce U10 and V10 fields
4145 !
4146 is_sfc_field = .false.
4147 mask_array => landmask
4148 if (index(field % field, 'UU') /= 0 .and. vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
4149 ninterppoints = ncells
4150 latpoints => latcell
4151 lonpoints => loncell
4152 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'u10', destfield1d)
4153 ndims = 1
4154 is_sfc_field = .true.
4155 else if (index(field % field, 'VV') /= 0 .and. vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
4156 ninterppoints = ncells
4157 latpoints => latcell
4158 lonpoints => loncell
4159 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'v10', destfield1d)
4160 ndims = 1
4161 is_sfc_field = .true.
4162 else if (index(field % field, 'TT') /= 0 .and. vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
4163 ninterppoints = ncells
4164 latpoints => latcell
4165 lonpoints => loncell
4166 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 't2m', destfield1d)
4167 ndims = 1
4168 is_sfc_field = .true.
4169 else if (index(field % field, 'RH') /= 0 .and. vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
4170 ninterppoints = ncells
4171 latpoints => latcell
4172 lonpoints => loncell
4173 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'rh2', destfield1d)
4174 ndims = 1
4175 is_sfc_field = .true.
4176 end if
4177
4178 if (is_sfc_field) then
4179 do i=1,ninterppoints
4180 lat = latpoints(i)*deg_per_rad
4181 lon = lonpoints(i)*deg_per_rad
4182 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4183 if (x < 0.5) then
4184 lon = lon + 360.0
4185 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4186 end if
4187 destfield1d(i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, -2, field % nx + 3, 1, field % ny, 1, 1, &
4188 msgval, interp_list, 1, maskval=maskval, mask_array=maskslab)
4189 end do
4190 end if
4191
4192 deallocate(rslab)
4193
4194 end if
4195
4196 deallocate(field % slab)
4197 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
4198 end do
4199
4200 call read_met_close()
4201 level_value = mpas_hash_size(level_hash)
4202 call mpas_hash_destroy(level_hash)
4203
4204 if (too_many_fg_levs) then
4205 write(errstring,'(a,i4)') ' Please increase config_nfglevels to at least ', level_value
4206 call mpas_log_write('*******************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
4207 call mpas_log_write('Error: The meteorological data file has more than config_nfglevels.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
4208 call mpas_log_write(trim(errstring), messagetype=mpas_log_err)
4209 call mpas_log_write(' in the namelist and re-run.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
4210 call mpas_log_write('*******************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
4211 end if
4212
4213
4214 !
4215 ! Check how many distinct levels we actually found in the meteorological data
4216 !
4217 do k=1,config_nfglevels
4218 if (vert_level(k) == -1.0) exit
4219 end do
4220 nfglevels_actual = k-1
4221 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************')
4222 call mpas_log_write('Found $i levels in the first-guess data', intargs=(/nfglevels_actual/))
4223 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************')
4224
4225
4226 !
4227 ! Extract surface fields from first-guess
4228 !
4229! call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'u10', u10)
4230! call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'v10', v10)
4231 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'q2', q2)
4232 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'rh2', rh2)
4233 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 't2m', t2m)
4234 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'u', u_fg)
4235 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'v', v_fg)
4236 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 't', t_fg)
4237 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'rh', rh_fg)
4238! u10(:) = 0.0
4239! v10(:) = 0.0
4240 q2(:) = 0.0
4241 rh2(:) = 0.0
4242 t2m(:) = 0.0
4243
4244 do k=1,config_nfglevels
4245 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
4246! u10(:) = u_fg(k,:)
4247! v10(:) = v_fg(k,:)
4248 t2m(:) = t_fg(k,:)
4249 rh2(:) = rh_fg(k,:)
4250 do icell = 1, ncells
4251 es = svp1 * 10.0_rkind * exp(svp2 * (t2m(icell)-svpt0) / (t2m(icell)-svp3))
4252 es = min(es, 0.99_rkind * 0.01_rkind * psfc(icell))
4253 rs = 0.622_rkind * es * 100.0_rkind / (psfc(icell) - es * 100.0_rkind)
4254 q2(icell) = 0.01_rkind * rs * rh2(icell)
4255 end do
4256 end if
4257 end do
4258
4259
4260
4261 !
4262 ! For isobaric data, fill in the 3-d pressure field; otherwise, ensure
4263 ! that the surface pressure and height fields are filled in
4264 !
4265 if (minval(p_fg(1:nfglevels_actual,1:ncellssolve)) == 0.0 .and. &
4266 maxval(p_fg(1:nfglevels_actual,1:ncellssolve)) == 0.0) then
4267 call mpas_log_write('Setting pressure field for isobaric data')
4268 do k=1,config_nfglevels
4269 if (vert_level(k) /= 200100.0) then
4270 p_fg(k,:) = vert_level(k)
4271 else
4272 p_fg(k,:) = psfc(:)
4273 end if
4274 end do
4275 else
4276 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'z', z_fg)
4277 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'soilz', soilz)
4278 call mpas_log_write('Assuming model-level input data')
4279 do k=1,config_nfglevels
4280 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
4281 p_fg(k,:) = psfc(:)
4282 z_fg(k,:) = soilz(:)
4283 end if
4284 end do
4285 end if
4286
4287 ! Set SST based on SKINTEMP field if it wasn't found in input data
4288 if (minval(sst) == 0.0 .and. maxval(sst) == 0.0) then
4289 call mpas_log_write('Setting SST from SKINTEMP')
4290 !where (landmask == 0) sst = skintemp
4291 sst = skintemp
4292 end if
4293
4294 ! Set SNOWC (snow-cover flag) based on SNOW
4295 snowc(:) = 0.0
4296 where (snow > 0.0) snowc = 1.0
4297
4298!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
4299!MGD CHECK
4300!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
4301do icell=1,ncells
4302 if (landmask(icell) == 1) then
4303
4304 do k = 1, config_nfgsoillevels
4305 if (st_fg(k,icell) <= 0.0) call mpas_log_write('Bad st_fg $i $i', intargs=(/k, icell/))
4306 end do
4307
4308 do k = 1, config_nfgsoillevels
4309 if (sm_fg(k,icell) <= 0.0) then
4310 call mpas_log_write('Bad sm_fg $r $i $i', intargs=(/k, icell/), realargs=(/sm_fg(k,icell)/))
4311 sm_fg(k,icell) = 0.001
4312 end if
4313 end do
4314 !LDF end.
4315
4316 end if
4317end do
4318call mpas_log_write('Done with soil consistency check')
4319
4320
4321 !
4322 ! Get SEAICE from a separate file
4323 !
4324 call read_met_init('SEAICE_FRACTIONAL', .true., config_start_time(1:13), istatus)
4325
4326 if (istatus /= 0) then
4327 call mpas_log_write('SEAICE_FRACTIONAL file not found...')
4328 end if
4329
4330 if (istatus == 0) then
4331 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
4332 do while (istatus == 0)
4333 if (trim(field % field) == 'SEAICE') then
4334
4335 call mpas_log_write('PROCESSING SEAICE')
4336
4337 !
4338 ! Set up projection
4339 !
4340 call map_init(proj)
4341
4342 if (field % iproj == proj_ps) then
4343 call map_set(proj_ps, proj, &
4344 dx = real(field % dx,rkind), &
4345 truelat1 = real(field % truelat1,rkind), &
4346 stdlon = real(field % xlonc,rkind), &
4347 knowni = real(field % nx / 2.0,rkind), &
4348 knownj = real(field % ny / 2.0,rkind), &
4349 lat1 = real(field % startlat,rkind), &
4350 lon1 = real(field % startlon,rkind))
4351 end if
4352
4353 if (trim(field % field) == 'SEAICE') then
4354 ninterppoints = ncells
4355 latpoints => latcell
4356 lonpoints => loncell
4357 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'xice', destfield1d)
4358 ndims = 1
4359 end if
4360
4361 interp_list(1) = four_point
4362 interp_list(2) = w_average4
4363 interp_list(3) = 0
4364
4365 masked = 1
4366 fillval = 0.0
4367 msgval = 1.01
4368 mask_array => landmask
4369
4370
4371 allocate(rslab(field % nx, field % ny))
4372 rslab(:,:) = field % slab(:,:)
4373 do i=1,ninterppoints
4374 if (mask_array(i) /= masked) then
4375 lat = latpoints(i)*deg_per_rad
4376 lon = lonpoints(i)*deg_per_rad
4377 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4378 if (x < 0.5) then
4379 lon = lon + 360.0
4380 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4381 else if (x >= real(field%nx)+0.5) then
4382 lon = lon - 360.0
4383 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4384 end if
4385 if (y < 0.5) then
4386 y = 1.0
4387 else if (y >= real(field%ny)+0.5) then
4388 y = real(field%ny)
4389 end if
4390 if (ndims == 1) then
4391 destfield1d(i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, 1, field % nx, 1, field % ny, 1, 1, msgval, interp_list, 1)
4392 if (destfield1d(i) == msgval) destfield1d(i) = fillval
4393 else if (ndims == 2) then
4394 destfield2d(k,i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, 1, field % nx, 1, field % ny, 1, 1, msgval, interp_list, 1)
4395 if (destfield2d(k,i) == msgval) destfield2d(k,i) = fillval
4396 end if
4397 else
4398 if (ndims == 1) then
4399 destfield1d(i) = fillval
4400 else if (ndims == 2) then
4401 destfield2d(k,i) = fillval
4402 end if
4403 end if
4404 end do
4405 deallocate(rslab)
4406
4407 end if
4408
4409 deallocate(field % slab)
4410 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
4411 end do
4412 end if
4413
4414 call read_met_close()
4415
4416
4417 !
4418 ! Get OMLD climatology from a separate file
4419 !
4420 call read_met_init('OMLD', .true., config_start_time(1:13), istatus)
4421
4422 if (istatus /= 0) then
4423 call mpas_log_write('OMLD file not found...')
4424 end if
4425
4426 if (istatus == 0) then
4427 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
4428 do while (istatus == 0)
4429 if (index(field % field, 'OMLD') /= 0) then
4430
4431 call mpas_log_write('PROCESSING OMLD')
4432
4433 !
4434 ! Set up projection
4435 !
4436 call map_init(proj)
4437
4438 if (field % iproj == proj_latlon) then
4439 call map_set(proj_latlon, proj, &
4440 latinc = real(field % deltalat,rkind), &
4441 loninc = real(field % deltalon,rkind), &
4442 knowni = 1.0_rkind, &
4443 knownj = 1.0_rkind, &
4444 lat1 = real(field % startlat,rkind), &
4445 lon1 = real(field % startlon,rkind))
4446 else
4447 call mpas_log_write('We were expecting OMLD field to be on a lat-lon projection...', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
4448 end if
4449
4450 if (index(field % field, 'OMLD') /= 0) then
4451 ninterppoints = ncells
4452 latpoints => latcell
4453 lonpoints => loncell
4454 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'h_oml_initial', destfield1d)
4455 ndims = 1
4456 end if
4457
4458 interp_list(1) = four_point
4459 interp_list(2) = w_average4
4460 interp_list(3) = search
4461 interp_list(4) = 0
4462
4463 masked = 1
4464 fillval = 0.0
4465 msgval = 0.0
4466 mask_array => landmask
4467
4468
4469 allocate(rslab(field % nx, field % ny))
4470 rslab(:,:) = field % slab(:,:)
4471 do i=1,ninterppoints
4472 if (mask_array(i) /= masked) then
4473 lat = latpoints(i)*deg_per_rad
4474 lon = lonpoints(i)*deg_per_rad
4475 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4476 if (x < 0.5) then
4477 lon = lon + 360.0
4478 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4479 else if (x >= real(field%nx)+0.5) then
4480 lon = lon - 360.0
4481 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
4482 end if
4483 if (y < 0.5) then
4484 y = 1.0
4485 else if (y >= real(field%ny)+0.5) then
4486 y = real(field%ny)
4487 end if
4488 if (ndims == 1) then
4489 destfield1d(i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, 1, field % nx, 1, field % ny, 1, 1, msgval, interp_list, 1)
4490 if (destfield1d(i) == msgval) destfield1d(i) = fillval
4491 else if (ndims == 2) then
4492 destfield2d(k,i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, 1, field % nx, 1, field % ny, 1, 1, msgval, interp_list, 1)
4493 if (destfield2d(k,i) == msgval) destfield2d(k,i) = fillval
4494 end if
4495 else
4496 if (ndims == 1) then
4497 destfield1d(i) = fillval
4498 else if (ndims == 2) then
4499 destfield2d(k,i) = fillval
4500 end if
4501 end if
4502 end do
4503 deallocate(rslab)
4504
4505 end if
4506
4507 deallocate(field % slab)
4508 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
4509 end do
4510 end if
4511
4512 call read_met_close()
4513
4514
4515 if (allocated(maskslab)) deallocate(maskslab)
4516
4517 ! Freeze really cold ocean
4518 where (sst < 271.0 .and. landmask == 0) xice = 1.0
4519
4520 ! Limit XICE to values between 0 and 1. Although the input meteorological field is between 0.
4521 ! and 1., interpolation to the MPAS grid can yield values of XiCE less than 0. and greater
4522 ! than 1.:
4523 where (xice < 0._rkind) xice = 0._rkind
4524 where (xice > 1._rkind) xice = 1._rkind
4525
4526 ! Set SEAICE (0/1 flag) based on XICE (fractional ice coverage)
4527 seaice(:) = 0.0
4528 where (xice >= 0.5) seaice = 1.0
4529
4530
4531 !
4532 ! Compute normal wind component and store in fg % u
4533 !
4534 do iedge=1,nedges
4535 do k=1,nfglevels_actual
4536 u_fg(k,iedge) = cos(angleedge(iedge)) * u_fg(k,iedge) &
4537 + sin(angleedge(iedge)) * v_fg(k,iedge)
4538 end do
4539 end do
4540
4541 !
4542 ! Vertically interpolate meteorological data
4543 !
4544 allocate(sorted_arr(2,nfglevels_actual))
4545
4546 do icell=1,ncells
4547
4548 ! T
4549 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
4550 do k = 1, nfglevels_actual
4551 sorted_arr(1,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
4552 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
4553 sorted_arr(2,k) = t_fg(k,icell)
4554 end do
4555 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
4556 do k = 1, nvertlevels
4557 target_z = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell) + zgrid(k+1,icell))
4558 t(k,icell) = vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, &
4559 sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, &
4560 extrap=extrap_airtemp, ierr=istatus)
4561 if (istatus /= 0) then
4562 write(errstring,'(a,i4,a,i10)') 'Error in interpolation of t(k,iCell) for k=', k, ', iCell=', icell
4563 call mpas_log_write('*****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
4564 call mpas_log_write(trim(errstring), messagetype=mpas_log_err)
4565 call mpas_log_write('*****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
4566 end if
4567 end do
4568
4569
4570 ! RH
4571 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
4572 relhum(:,icell) = 0._rkind
4573 do k = 1, nfglevels_actual
4574 sorted_arr(1,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
4575 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
4576 sorted_arr(2,k) = rh_fg(k,icell)
4577 end do
4578 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
4579 do k = nvertlevels, 1, -1
4580 target_z = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell) + zgrid(k+1,icell))
4581 relhum(k,icell) = vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, &
4582 sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, extrap=0)
4583 end do
4584
4585
4586 ! SPECHUM: if first-guess values are negative, set those values to zero before
4587 ! vertical interpolation.
4588 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
4589 spechum(:,icell) = 0._rkind
4590 do k = 1, nfglevels_actual
4591 sorted_arr(1,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
4592 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
4593 sorted_arr(2,k) = max(0._rkind,sh_fg(k,icell))
4594 end do
4595 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
4596 do k = nvertlevels, 1, -1
4597 target_z = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell) + zgrid(k+1,icell))
4598 spechum(k,icell) = vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, &
