4599 sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, extrap=0)
4600 end do
4601
4602
4603 ! GHT
4604 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
4605 do k = 1, nfglevels_actual
4606 sorted_arr(1,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
4607 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
4608 sorted_arr(2,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
4609 end do
4610 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
4611 do k = 1, nvertlevels
4612 target_z = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell) + zgrid(k+1,icell))
4613 gfs_z(k,icell) = vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, &
4614 sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, extrap=1)
4615 end do
4616
4617
4618 ! PRESSURE
4619 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
4620 do k = 1, nfglevels_actual
4621 sorted_arr(1,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
4622 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
4623 sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
4624 sfc_k = k
4625 end if
4626 sorted_arr(2,k) = log(p_fg(k,icell))
4627 end do
4628 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
4629 do k = 1, nvertlevels
4630 target_z = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell) + zgrid(k+1,icell))
4631 pressure(k,icell) = exp(vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, &
4632 sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, extrap=1))
4633 end do
4634
4635 end do
4636
4637
4638 do iedge=1,nedges
4639
4640 ! U
4641 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
4642 do k=1,nfglevels_actual
4643 sorted_arr(1,k) = 0.5 * (z_fg(k,cellsonedge(1,iedge)) + z_fg(k,cellsonedge(2,iedge)))
4644!NOSFC if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) sorted_arr(1,k) = 0.5 * (fg % soilz % array(cellsOnEdge(1,iEdge)) + fg % soilz % array(cellsOnEdge(2,iEdge)))
4645 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
4646 sorted_arr(2,k) = u_fg(k,iedge)
4647 end do
4648 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
4649 do k=1,nvertlevels
4650 target_z = 0.25 * (zgrid(k,cellsonedge(1,iedge)) + zgrid(k+1,cellsonedge(1,iedge)) + zgrid(k,cellsonedge(2,iedge)) + zgrid(k+1,cellsonedge(2,iedge)))
4651! u(k,iEdge) = vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr, order=1, extrap=0)
4652 u(k,iedge) = vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, extrap=1)
4653 end do
4654
4655 end do
4656
4657
4658 !
4659 ! Reconstruct zonal and meridional winds for diagnostic puposes:
4660 !
4661 call mpas_rbf_interp_initialize(mesh)
4662 call mpas_init_reconstruct(mesh)
4663 call mpas_reconstruct(mesh, u, &
4664 ureconstructx, &
4665 ureconstructy, &
4666 ureconstructz, &
4667 ureconstructzonal, &
4668 ureconstructmeridional &
4669 )
4670
4671
4672 !
4673 ! Adjust surface pressure for difference in topography
4674 !
4675 do sfc_k=1,nfglevels_actual
4676 if (vert_level(sfc_k) == 200100.) exit
4677 end do
4678 do icell=1,ncells
4679
4680 ! We need to extrapolate
4681 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
4682 do k=1,nfglevels_actual
4683 sorted_arr(1,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
4684 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
4685!NOSFC sorted_arr(1,k) = fg % soilz % array(iCell)
4686 sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
4687 end if
4688 sorted_arr(2,k) = log(p_fg(k,icell))
4689 end do
4690 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
4691 target_z = zgrid(1,icell)
4692 psfc(icell) = exp(vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr, order=1, extrap=1))
4693
4694 end do
4695
4696 deallocate(sorted_arr)
4697
4698
4699 ! Diagnose the water vapor mixing ratios:
4700 global_sh_min = 0._rkind
4701 global_sh_max = 0._rkind
4702 if(config_use_spechumd) then
4703 sh_min = minval(spechum(:,1:ncellssolve))
4704 sh_max = maxval(spechum(:,1:ncellssolve))
4705 call mpas_dmpar_min_real(dminfo,sh_min,global_sh_min)
4706 call mpas_dmpar_max_real(dminfo,sh_max,global_sh_max)
4707 endif
4708 call mpas_log_write('')
4709 call mpas_log_write('--- global_sh_min = $r', realargs=(/global_sh_min/))
4710 call mpas_log_write('--- global_sh_max = $r', realargs=(/global_sh_max/))
4711 call mpas_log_write('')
4712
4713 call mpas_log_write('--- config_use_spechumd = $l', logicargs=(/config_use_spechumd/))
4714 if(.not. config_use_spechumd .or. (global_sh_min==0._rkind .and. global_sh_max==0._rkind)) then
4715 !--- calculate the saturation mixing ratio and interpolated first-guess relative humidity:
4716 if (config_use_spechumd) then
4717 call mpas_log_write('config_use_spechumd=T, but specific humidity was not found in '//trim(config_met_prefix)//':'//config_start_time(1:13), messagetype=mpas_log_warn)
4718 end if
4719 call mpas_log_write(' *** initializing water vapor mixing ratio using first-guess relative humidity')
4720 call mpas_log_write('')
4721
4722 do k = 1, nvertlevels
4723 do icell = 1, ncells
4724! es = svp1*10.*exp(svp2*(t(k,iCell)-svpt0)/(t(k,iCell)-svp3))
4725! es = min(es,0.99*0.01*pressure(k,iCell))
4726! rs = 0.622*es*100. / (pressure(k,iCell)-es*100.)
4727
4728 !
4729 ! Note: the RH field provided by ungrib should always be with respect to liquid water,
4730 ! hence, we can always call rslf; see the routine fix_gfs_rh in WPS/ungrib/src/rrpr.F .
4731 !
4732 rs = rslf(pressure(k,icell),t(k,icell))
4733 scalars(index_qv,k,icell) = 0.01_rkind*rs*relhum(k,icell)
4734 enddo
4735 enddo
4736 else
4737 !--- use the interpolated first-guess specific humidity:
4738 call mpas_log_write(' *** initializing water vapor mixing ratio using first-guess specific humidity')
4739 call mpas_log_write('')
4740 do k = 1, nvertlevels
4741 do icell = 1, ncells
4742 scalars(index_qv,k,icell) = spechum(k,icell)/(1._rkind-spechum(k,icell))
4743 enddo
4744 enddo
4745 endif
4746
4747 !
4748 ! After RH has been used to compute qv (unless config_use_spechumd = T and a valid spechum field
4749 ! is available), modify the RH field to be with respect to ice for temperatures below freezing.
4750 ! NB: Here we pass in 1:nCells explicitly, since computations involving the "garbage cell" could
4751 ! trigger FPEs.
4752 !
4753 call convert_relhum_wrt_ice(t(:,1:ncells), relhum(:,1:ncells))
4754
4755 !
4756 ! Diagnose fields needed in initial conditions file (u, w, rho, theta)
4757 ! NB: At this point, "rho_zz" is simple dry density, and "theta_m" is regular potential temperature
4758 !
4759 do icell=1,ncells
4760
4761 ! Q2
4762 es = 6.112 * exp((17.27*(t2m(icell) - 273.16))/(t2m(icell) - 35.86))
4763 rs = 0.622 * es * 100. / (psfc(icell) - es * 100.)
4764 q2(icell) = 0.01 * rs * rh2(icell)
4765
4766
4767 do k=1,nvertlevels
4768 ! PI
4769 p(k,icell) = (pressure(k,icell) / p0) ** (rgas / cp)
4770
4771 ! THETA - can compute this using PI instead
4772! t(k,iCell) = t(k,iCell) / p(k,iCell)
4773 t(k,icell) = t(k,icell) * (p0 / pressure(k,icell)) ** (rgas / cp)
4774
4775 ! RHO_ZZ
4776 rho_zz(k,icell) = pressure(k,icell) / rgas / (p(k,icell) * t(k,icell) &
4777 * (1.0 + (rvord - 1.0) * scalars(index_qv,k,icell)))
4778 rho_zz(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) / (1.0 + scalars(index_qv,k,icell))
4779 end do
4780 end do
4781
4782
4783 !
4784 ! Calculation of the initial precipitable water:
4785 !
4786 do icell = 1,ncells
4787 precipw(icell) = 0.0
4788 do k = 1,nvertlevels
4789 precipw(icell) = precipw(icell) + rho_zz(k,icell)*scalars(index_qv,k,icell)*(zgrid(k+1,icell)-zgrid(k,icell))
4790 end do
4791 end do
4792
4793 !
4794 ! Reference state based on a dry isothermal atmosphere
4795 !
4796 do icell=1,ncells
4797 do k=1,nz1
4798 ztemp = 0.5*(zgrid(k+1,icell)+zgrid(k,icell))
4799 ppb(k,icell) = p0*exp(-gravity*ztemp/(rgas*t0b)) ! pressure_base
4800 pb(k,icell) = (ppb(k,icell)/p0)**(rgas/cp) ! exner_base
4801! rb (k,iCell) = ppb(k,iCell)/(rgas*t0b*zz(k,iCell)) ! rho_base
4802 rb(k,icell) = ppb(k,icell)/(rgas*t0b) ! rho_base
4803 tb(k,icell) = t0b/pb(k,icell) ! theta_base
4804 rtb(k,icell) = rb(k,icell)*tb(k,icell) ! rtheta_base
4805 p(k,icell) = pb(k,icell) ! exner
4806 pp(k,icell) = 0. ! pressure_p
4807 rr(k,icell) = 0. ! rho_p
4808 end do
4809 end do
4810
4811 do icell=1,ncells
4812 do k=1,nvertlevels
4813
4814! WCS 20130821 - couple with vertical metric
4815
4816 rb(k,icell) = rb(k,icell) / zz(k,icell)
4817 rho_zz(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) / zz(k,icell)
4818
4819 pp(k,icell) = pressure(k,icell) - ppb(k,icell)
4820 rr(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) - rb(k,icell)
4821
4822 end do
4823 end do
4824
4825 do icell=1,ncells
4826 k = 1
4827! WCS 20130821 - couple with vertical metric, note: rr is coupled here
4828 rho_zz(k,icell) = ((pressure(k,icell) / p0)**(cv / cp)) * (p0 / rgas) &
4829 / (t(k,icell)*(1.0 + 1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,icell))) / zz(k,icell)
4830 rr(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) - rb(k,icell)
4831
4832 do k=2,nvertlevels
4833 it = 0
4834 p_check = 2.0 * 0.0001
4835 do while ( (it < 30) .and. (p_check > 0.0001) )
4836
4837 p_check = pp(k,icell)
4838! WCS 20130821 - MPAS hydrostatic relation
4839 pp(k,icell) = pp(k-1,icell) - (fzm(k)*rr(k,icell) + fzp(k)*rr(k-1,icell))*gravity*dzu(k) &
4840 - (fzm(k)*rho_zz(k,icell)*scalars(index_qv,k,icell) &
4841 + fzp(k)*rho_zz(k-1,icell)*scalars(index_qv,k-1,icell))*gravity*dzu(k)
4842 pressure(k,icell) = pp(k,icell) + ppb(k,icell)
4843 p(k,icell) = (pressure(k,icell) / p0) ** (rgas / cp)
4844! WCS 20130821 - couple with vertical metric
4845 rho_zz(k,icell) = pressure(k,icell) / rgas &
4846 / (p(k,icell)*t(k,icell)*(1.0 + 1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,icell)))/zz(k,icell)
4847 rr(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) - rb(k,icell)
4848
4849 p_check = abs(p_check - pp(k,icell))
4850
4851 it = it + 1
4852 end do
4853 end do
4854 end do
4855
4856 ! Compute theta_m and rho-tilde
4857 do icell=1,ncells
4858 do k=1,nvertlevels
4859 t(k,icell) = t(k,icell) * (1.0 + 1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,icell))
4860!! WCS 20130821 - coupling with vertical metric already accomplished...
4861!! rho_zz(k,iCell) = rho_zz(k,iCell) / zz(k,iCell)
4862!! rb(k,iCell) = rb(k,iCell) / zz(k,iCell)
4863! WCS 20130821 - decouple rr from vertical metric
4864 rr(k,icell) = rr(k,icell)*zz(k,icell)
4865 end do
4866 end do
4867
4868 do iedge=1,nedges
4869 do k=1,nvertlevels
4870 ru(k,iedge) = u(k,iedge) * 0.5*(rho_zz(k,cellsonedge(1,iedge)) + rho_zz(k,cellsonedge(2,iedge)))
4871 end do
4872 end do
4873
4874
4875 rw(:,:) = 0.0
4876
4877 do icell=1,ncellssolve
4878
4879 do i=1,nedgesoncell(icell)
4880 iedge=edgesoncell(i,icell)
4881
4882 do k = 2, nvertlevels
4883 flux = (fzm(k)*ru(k,iedge)+fzp(k)*ru(k-1,iedge))
4884 if (icell == cellsonedge(1,iedge)) then
4885 rw(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) - (fzm(k)*zz(k,icell)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,icell))*zb(k,1,iedge)*flux
4886 else
4887 rw(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) + (fzm(k)*zz(k,icell)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,icell))*zb(k,2,iedge)*flux
4888 end if
4889
4890 if (config_theta_adv_order ==3) then
4891 if (icell == cellsonedge(1,iedge)) then
4892 rw(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) &
4893 + sign(1.0_rkind,ru(k,iedge))*config_coef_3rd_order* &
4894 (fzm(k)*zz(k,icell)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,icell))*zb3(k,1,iedge)*flux
4895 else
4896 rw(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) &
4897 - sign(1.0_rkind,ru(k,iedge))*config_coef_3rd_order* &
4898 (fzm(k)*zz(k,icell)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,icell))*zb3(k,2,iedge)*flux
4899 end if
4900 end if
4901
4902 end do
4903
4904 end do
4905
4906 end do
4907
4908
4909 ! Compute w from rho_zz and rw
4910 do icell=1,ncellssolve
4911 do k=2,nvertlevels
4912 w(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) / (fzp(k) * rho_zz(k-1,icell) + fzm(k) * rho_zz(k,icell))
4913 end do
4914 end do
4915
4916 deallocate(vert_level)
4917
4918
4919 ! Calculate surface pressure (This is an ad-hoc calculation. The actual surface pressure is actually re-calculated at
4920 !the top of the subroutine MPAS_to_physics in ../core_atmos_physics/mpas_atmphys_interface_nhyd.F
4921 do icell=1,ncells
4922 surface_pressure(icell) = 0.5*gravity/rdzw(1) &
4923 * (1.25* rho_zz(1,icell) * (1. + scalars(index_qv, 1, icell)) &
4924 - 0.25* rho_zz(2,icell) * (1. + scalars(index_qv, 2, icell)))
4925 surface_pressure(icell) = surface_pressure(icell) + pp(1,icell) + ppb(1,icell)
4926 end do
4927
4928 ! Compute rho and theta from rho_zz and theta_m
4929 do icell=1,ncells
4930 do k=1,nvertlevels
4931 rho(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) * zz(k,icell)
4932 theta(k,icell) = t(k,icell) / (1.0 + 1.61 * scalars(index_qv,k,icell))
4933 end do
4934 end do
4935
4936
4937 end if ! config_met_interp
4938
4939 end subroutine init_atm_case_gfs
4940
4941
4942 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
4943 ! routine init_atm_case_lbc
4944 !
4954 !
4955 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
4956 subroutine init_atm_case_lbc(timestamp, block, mesh, nCells, nEdges, nVertLevels, fg, state, diag, lbc_state, dims, configs)
4957
4958 use mpas_dmpar, only : mpas_dmpar_min_real, mpas_dmpar_max_real
4959 use init_atm_read_met, only : met_data, read_met_init, read_met_close, read_next_met_field
4960 use init_atm_llxy, only : proj_info, map_init, map_set, latlon_to_ij, proj_latlon, proj_gauss, deg_per_rad
4961 use init_atm_hinterp, only : interp_sequence, four_point, sixteen_point, w_average4, search
4962 use mpas_hash, only : hashtable, mpas_hash_init, mpas_hash_destroy, mpas_hash_search, mpas_hash_size, mpas_hash_insert
4963
4964 implicit none
4965
4966 character(len=*), intent(in) :: timestamp
4967 type (block_type), intent(inout), target :: block
4968 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: mesh
4969 integer, intent(in) :: nCells
4970 integer, intent(in) :: nEdges
4971 integer, intent(in) :: nVertLevels
4972 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: fg
4973 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: state
4974 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: diag
4975 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: lbc_state
4976 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout):: dims
4977 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout):: configs
4978
4979 type (dm_info), pointer :: dminfo
4980
4981 real (kind=rkind), parameter :: t0b = 250.0
4982
4983 type (met_data) :: field
4984 type (proj_info) :: proj
4985
4986 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: dzu, fzm, fzp
4987 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: vert_level, latpoints, lonpoints
4988 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: zgrid, zz
4989 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: pressure, ppb, pb, rho_zz, rb, rr, tb, rtb, p, pp, t, rt
4990 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: destfield1d
4991 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: destfield2d
4992 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: zb, zb3
4993 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: scalars
4994
4995 real (kind=rkind) :: target_z
4996 integer :: iCell, iEdge, i, k, nVertLevelsP1
4997 integer, pointer :: nCellsSolve
4998 integer :: nInterpPoints, ndims
4999
5000 integer :: nfglevels_actual
5001 integer, pointer :: index_qv
5002
5003 integer, dimension(5) :: interp_list
5004 real (kind=rkind) :: msgval
5005
5006 integer, dimension(:), pointer :: nEdgesOnCell
5007 integer, dimension(:,:), pointer :: cellsOnEdge, edgesOnCell
5008 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: sorted_arr
5009
5010 integer :: sfc_k
5011
5012 integer :: it
5013 real (kind=rkind) :: p_check
5014
5015 integer :: istatus
5016
5017 real (kind=rkind), allocatable, dimension(:,:) :: rslab
5018
5019 real (kind=rkind) :: flux
5020 real (kind=rkind) :: lat, lon, x, y
5021
5022 real (kind=rkind) :: p0
5023
5024 real (kind=rkind) :: etavs, ztemp
5025
5026 real (kind=rkind) :: rs, rcv
5027
5028 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nVertLevels + 1) :: sh
5029
5030 ! calculation of the water vapor mixing ratio:
5031 real (kind=rkind) :: sh_max,sh_min,global_sh_max,global_sh_min
5032
5033 character (len=StrKIND), pointer :: config_met_prefix
5034 logical, pointer :: config_use_spechumd
5035 integer, pointer :: config_nfglevels
5036 integer, pointer :: config_theta_adv_order
5037 real (kind=rkind), pointer :: config_coef_3rd_order
5038
5039 character (len=StrKIND), pointer :: config_extrap_airtemp
5040 integer :: extrap_airtemp
5041
5042 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: latcell, loncell
5043 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: latedge, lonedge
5044 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: angleedge
5045
5046 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: u
5047 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: w
5048 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: theta
5049 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: rho
5050 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: relhum
5051 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: spechum
5052 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: ru
5053 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: rw
5054
5055 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: u_fg
5056 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: v_fg
5057 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: z_fg
5058 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: t_fg
5059 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: rh_fg
5060 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: sh_fg
5061 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: p_fg
5062 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: soilz
5063
5064 type (hashtable) :: level_hash
5065 logical :: too_many_fg_levs
5066 integer :: level_value
5067
5068 character (len=StrKIND) :: errstring
5069
5070 real (kind=rkind) :: max_zgrid_local, max_zgrid_global
5071
5072
5073 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating LBCs at time '//trim(timestamp))
5074
5075 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_met_prefix', config_met_prefix)
5076 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_use_spechumd', config_use_spechumd)
5077 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_nfglevels', config_nfglevels)
5078 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_theta_adv_order', config_theta_adv_order)
5079 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_coef_3rd_order', config_coef_3rd_order)
5080
5081 call mpas_pool_get_config(configs, 'config_extrap_airtemp', config_extrap_airtemp)
5082 if (trim(config_extrap_airtemp) == 'constant') then
5083 extrap_airtemp = 0
5084 else if (trim(config_extrap_airtemp) == 'linear') then
5085 extrap_airtemp = 1
5086 else if (trim(config_extrap_airtemp) == 'lapse-rate') then
5087 extrap_airtemp = 2
5088 else
5089 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5090 call mpas_log_write('* Invalid value for namelist variable config_extrap_airtemp *', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5091 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
5092 end if
5093 call mpas_log_write("Using option '" // trim(config_extrap_airtemp) // "' for vertical extrapolation of temperature")
5094
5095 dminfo => block % domain % dminfo
5096
5097 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'nEdgesOnCell', nedgesoncell)
5098 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'edgesOnCell', edgesoncell)
5099 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cellsOnEdge', cellsonedge)
5100 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'angleEdge', angleedge)
5101
5102 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zb', zb)
5103 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zb3', zb3)
5104
5105 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zgrid', zgrid)
5106 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'dzu', dzu)
5107 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fzm', fzm)
5108 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'fzp', fzp)
5109 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zz', zz)
5110
5111 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'exner_base', pb)
5112 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho_base', rb)
5113 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'theta_base', tb)
5114 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rtheta_base', rtb)
5115 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'exner', p)
5116 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_base', ppb)
5117 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_p', pp)
5118 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure', pressure)
5119 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'relhum', relhum)
5120 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'spechum', spechum)
5121 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'ru', ru)
5122 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rw', rw)
5123
5124 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'rho_zz', rho_zz)
5125 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho_p', rr)
5126 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'theta_m', t)
5127 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rtheta_p', rt)
5128 call mpas_pool_get_array(lbc_state, 'lbc_scalars', scalars)
5129 call mpas_pool_get_array(lbc_state, 'lbc_u', u)
5130 call mpas_pool_get_array(lbc_state, 'lbc_w', w)
5131 call mpas_pool_get_array(lbc_state, 'lbc_theta', theta)
5132 call mpas_pool_get_array(lbc_state, 'lbc_rho', rho)
5133
5134 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'latCell', latcell)
5135 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'lonCell', loncell)
5136 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'latEdge', latedge)
5137 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'lonEdge', lonedge)
5138
5139 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'u', u_fg)
5140 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'v', v_fg)
5141 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'z', z_fg)
5142 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 't', t_fg)
5143 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'rh', rh_fg)
5144 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sh', sh_fg)
5145 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'p', p_fg)
5146
5147 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(dims, 'nCellsSolve', ncellssolve)
5148 nvertlevelsp1 = nvertlevels + 1
5149
5150 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(state, 'index_qv', index_qv)
5151
5152 etavs = (1.0_rkind - 0.252_rkind) * pii / 2.0_rkind
5153 rcv = rgas / (cp - rgas)
5154 p0 = 1.0e+05_rkind
5155
5156 scalars(:,:,:) = 0.0_rkind
5157
5158 !
5159 ! Check that we have what looks like a valid zgrid field. If the max value for zgrid is zero,
5160 ! the input file likely does not contain vertical grid information.
5161 !
5162 max_zgrid_local = maxval(zgrid(:,1:ncellssolve))
5163 call mpas_dmpar_max_real(dminfo, max_zgrid_local, max_zgrid_global)
5164 if (max_zgrid_global == 0.0_rkind) then
5165 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', &
5166 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5167 call mpas_log_write('The maximum value of the zgrid field is 0. Please ensure that the ''input'' stream ', &
5168 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5169 call mpas_log_write('contains valid vertical grid information.', &
5170 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5171 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', &
5172 messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
5173 end if
5174
5175
5176 !
5177 ! Horizontally interpolate meteorological data
5178 !
5179 allocate(vert_level(config_nfglevels))
5180 vert_level(:) = -1.0
5181
5182 ! TODO: We should check that timestamp is actually of length >= 13
5183 call read_met_init(trim(config_met_prefix), .false., timestamp(1:13), istatus)
5184
5185 if (istatus /= 0) then
5186 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', &
5187 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5188 call mpas_log_write('Error opening initial meteorological data file '//trim(config_met_prefix)//':'//timestamp(1:13), &
5189 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5190 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', &
5191 messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
5192 end if
5193
5194 call mpas_hash_init(level_hash)
5195 too_many_fg_levs = .false.
5196
5197 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
5198
5199 do while (istatus == 0)
5200
5201 interp_list(1) = four_point
5202 interp_list(2) = search
5203 interp_list(3) = 0
5204
5205 msgval = -1.e30
5206
5207 if (trim(field % field) == 'UU' .or. &
5208 trim(field % field) == 'VV' .or. &
5209 trim(field % field) == 'TT' .or. &
5210 trim(field % field) == 'RH' .or. &
5211 trim(field % field) == 'SPECHUMD' .or. &
5212 trim(field % field) == 'GHT' .or. &
5213 trim(field % field) == 'SOILHGT' .or. &
5214 trim(field % field) == 'PRES' .or. &
5215 trim(field % field) == 'PRESSURE') then
5216
5217 if (trim(field % field) /= 'SOILHGT') then
5218
5219 ! Since the hash table can only store integers, transfer the bit pattern from
5220 ! the real-valued xlvl into an integer; that the result is not an integer version
5221 ! of the level is not important, since we only want to test uniqueness of levels
5222 level_value = transfer(field % xlvl, level_value)
5223 if (.not. mpas_hash_search(level_hash, level_value)) then
5224 call mpas_hash_insert(level_hash, level_value)
5225 if (mpas_hash_size(level_hash) > config_nfglevels) then
5226 too_many_fg_levs = .true.
5227 end if
5228 end if
5229
5230 !
5231 ! In case we have more than config_nfglevels levels, just keep cycling through
5232 ! the remaining fields in the intermediate file for the purpose of counting how
5233 ! many unique levels are found using the code above
5234 !
5235 if (too_many_fg_levs) then
5236 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
5237 cycle
5238 end if
5239
5240 do k=1,config_nfglevels
5241 if (vert_level(k) == field % xlvl .or. vert_level(k) == -1.0) exit
5242 end do
5243 if (vert_level(k) == -1.0) vert_level(k) = field % xlvl
5244 else
5245 k = 1
5246 end if
5247
5248 !
5249 ! Set up projection
5250 !
5251 call map_init(proj)
5252
5253 if (field % iproj == proj_latlon) then
5254 call map_set(proj_latlon, proj, &
5255 latinc = real(field % deltalat,rkind), &
5256 loninc = real(field % deltalon,rkind), &
5257 knowni = 1.0_rkind, &
5258 knownj = 1.0_rkind, &
5259 lat1 = real(field % startlat,rkind), &
5260 lon1 = real(field % startlon,rkind))
5261 else if (field % iproj == proj_gauss) then
5262 call map_set(proj_gauss, proj, &
5263 nlat = nint(field % deltalat), &
5264 loninc = 360.0_rkind / real(field % nx,rkind), &
5265 lat1 = real(field % startlat,rkind), &
5266 lon1 = real(field % startlon,rkind))
5267 end if
5268
5269
5270 !
5271 ! Horizontally interpolate the field at level k
5272 !
5273 if (trim(field % field) == 'UU') then
5274 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating U at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
5275 ninterppoints = nedges
5276 latpoints => latedge
5277 lonpoints => lonedge
5278 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'u', destfield2d)
5279 ndims = 2
5280 else if (trim(field % field) == 'VV') then
5281 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating V at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
5282 ninterppoints = nedges
5283 latpoints => latedge
5284 lonpoints => lonedge
5285 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'v', destfield2d)
5286 ndims = 2
5287 else if (trim(field % field) == 'TT') then
5288 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating TT at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
5289 ninterppoints = ncells
5290 latpoints => latcell
5291 lonpoints => loncell
5292 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 't', destfield2d)
5293 ndims = 2
5294 else if (trim(field % field) == 'RH') then
5295 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating RH at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
5296 ninterppoints = ncells
5297 latpoints => latcell
5298 lonpoints => loncell
5299 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'rh', destfield2d)
5300 ndims = 2
5301 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SPECHUMD') then
5302 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SPECHUMD at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
5303 ninterppoints = ncells
5304 latpoints => latcell
5305 lonpoints => loncell
5306 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sh', destfield2d)
5307 ndims = 2
5308 else if (trim(field % field) == 'GHT') then
5309 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating GHT at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
5310 ninterppoints = ncells
5311 latpoints => latcell
5312 lonpoints => loncell
5313 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'z', destfield2d)
5314 ndims = 2
5315 else if (trim(field % field) == 'PRES') then
5316 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating PRES at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
5317 ninterppoints = ncells
5318 latpoints => latcell
5319 lonpoints => loncell
5320 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'p', destfield2d)
5321 ndims = 2
5322 else if (trim(field % field) == 'PRESSURE') then
5323 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating PRESSURE at $i $r', intargs=(/k/), realargs=(/vert_level(k)/))
5324 ninterppoints = ncells
5325 latpoints => latcell
5326 lonpoints => loncell
5327 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'p', destfield2d)
5328 ndims = 2
5329 else if (trim(field % field) == 'SOILHGT') then
5330 call mpas_log_write('Interpolating SOILHGT')
5331 ninterppoints = ncells
5332 latpoints => latcell
5333 lonpoints => loncell
5334 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'soilz', destfield1d)
5335 ndims = 1
5336 end if
5337
5338 allocate(rslab(-2:field % nx+3, field % ny))
5339 rslab(1:field % nx, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(1:field % nx, 1:field % ny)
5340 rslab(0, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx, 1:field % ny)
5341 rslab(-1, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx-1, 1:field % ny)
5342 rslab(-2, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx-2, 1:field % ny)
5343 rslab(field % nx+1, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(1, 1:field % ny)
5344 rslab(field % nx+2, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(2, 1:field % ny)
5345 rslab(field % nx+3, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(3, 1:field % ny)
5346
5347 do i=1,ninterppoints
5348 lat = latpoints(i)*deg_per_rad
5349 lon = lonpoints(i)*deg_per_rad
5350 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
5351 if (x < 0.5) then
5352 lon = lon + 360.0
5353 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
5354 else if (x >= real(field%nx)+0.5) then
5355 lon = lon - 360.0
5356 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
5357 end if
5358 if (y < 0.5) then
5359 y = 1.0
5360 else if (y >= real(field%ny)+0.5) then
5361 y = real(field%ny)
5362 end if
5363 if (ndims == 1) then
5364 destfield1d(i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, -2, field%nx + 3, 1, field%ny, 1, 1, msgval, interp_list, 1)
5365 else if (ndims == 2) then
5366 destfield2d(k,i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, -2, field%nx + 3, 1, field%ny, 1, 1, msgval, interp_list, 1)
5367 end if
5368 end do
5369
5370 deallocate(rslab)
5371
5372 end if
5373
5374 deallocate(field % slab)
5375 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
5376 end do
5377
5378 call read_met_close()
5379 level_value = mpas_hash_size(level_hash)
5380 call mpas_hash_destroy(level_hash)
5381
5382 if (too_many_fg_levs) then
5383 write(errstring,'(a,i4)') ' Please increase config_nfglevels to at least ', level_value
5384 call mpas_log_write('*******************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5385 call mpas_log_write('Error: The meteorological data file has more than config_nfglevels.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5386 call mpas_log_write(trim(errstring), messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5387 call mpas_log_write(' in the namelist and re-run.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5388 call mpas_log_write('*******************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
5389 end if
5390
5391
5392 !
5393 ! Check how many distinct levels we actually found in the meteorological data
5394 !
5395 do k=1,config_nfglevels
5396 if (vert_level(k) == -1.0) exit
5397 end do
5398 nfglevels_actual = k-1
5399 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************')
5400 call mpas_log_write('Found $i levels in the first-guess data', intargs=(/nfglevels_actual/))
5401 call mpas_log_write('*************************************************')
5402
5403
5404 !
5405 ! For isobaric data, fill in the 3-d pressure field; otherwise, ensure
5406 ! that the surface pressure and height fields are filled in
5407 !
5408 if (minval(p_fg(1:nfglevels_actual,1:ncellssolve)) == 0.0 .and. &
5409 maxval(p_fg(1:nfglevels_actual,1:ncellssolve)) == 0.0) then
5410 call mpas_log_write('Setting pressure field for isobaric data')
5411 do k=1,config_nfglevels
5412 if (vert_level(k) /= 200100.0) then
5413 p_fg(k,:) = vert_level(k)
5414 end if
5415 end do
5416 else
5417 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'z', z_fg)
5418 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'soilz', soilz)
5419 call mpas_log_write('Assuming model-level input data')
5420 do k=1,config_nfglevels
5421 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
5422 z_fg(k,:) = soilz(:)
5423 end if
5424 end do
5425 end if
5426
5427
5428 !
5429 ! Compute normal wind component and store in fg % u
5430 !
5431 do iedge=1,nedges
5432 do k=1,nfglevels_actual
5433 u_fg(k,iedge) = cos(angleedge(iedge)) * u_fg(k,iedge) &
5434 + sin(angleedge(iedge)) * v_fg(k,iedge)
5435 end do
5436 end do
5437
5438 !
5439 ! Vertically interpolate meteorological data
5440 !
5441 allocate(sorted_arr(2,nfglevels_actual))
5442
5443 do icell=1,ncells
5444
5445 ! T
5446 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
5447 do k = 1, nfglevels_actual
5448 sorted_arr(1,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
5449 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
5450 sorted_arr(2,k) = t_fg(k,icell)
5451 end do
5452 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
5453 do k = 1, nvertlevels
5454 target_z = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell) + zgrid(k+1,icell))
5455 t(k,icell) = vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, &
5456 sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, &
5457 extrap=extrap_airtemp, ierr=istatus)
5458 if (istatus /= 0) then
5459 write(errstring,'(a,i4,a,i10)') 'Error in interpolation of t(k,iCell) for k=', k, ', iCell=', icell
5460 call mpas_log_write('*****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5461 call mpas_log_write(trim(errstring), messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5462 call mpas_log_write('*****************************************************************', messagetype=mpas_log_crit)
5463 end if
5464 end do
5465
5466
5467 ! RH
5468 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
5469 relhum(:,icell) = 0._rkind
5470 do k = 1, nfglevels_actual
5471 sorted_arr(1,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
5472 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
5473 sorted_arr(2,k) = rh_fg(k,icell)
5474 end do
5475 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
5476 do k = nvertlevels, 1, -1
5477 target_z = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell) + zgrid(k+1,icell))
5478 relhum(k,icell) = vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, &
5479 sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, extrap=0)
5480 if (target_z < z_fg(1,icell) .and. k < nvertlevels) relhum(k,icell) = relhum(k+1,icell)
5481 end do
5482
5483
5484 ! SPECHUM: if first-guess values are negative, set those values to zero before
5485 ! vertical interpolation.
5486 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
5487 spechum(:,icell) = 0._rkind
5488 do k = 1, nfglevels_actual
5489 sorted_arr(1,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
5490 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
5491 sorted_arr(2,k) = max(0._rkind,sh_fg(k,icell))
5492 end do
5493 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
5494 do k = nvertlevels, 1, -1
5495 target_z = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell) + zgrid(k+1,icell))
5496 spechum(k,icell) = vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, &
5497 sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, extrap=0)
5498 if (target_z < z_fg(1,icell) .and. k < nvertlevels) spechum(k,icell) = spechum(k+1,icell)
5499 end do
5500
5501
5502 ! PRESSURE
5503 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
5504 do k = 1, nfglevels_actual
5505 sorted_arr(1,k) = z_fg(k,icell)
5506 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) then
5507 sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
5508 sfc_k = k
5509 p_fg(k,icell) = 1.0 ! Any value that has valid log is fine...
5510 end if
5511 sorted_arr(2,k) = log(p_fg(k,icell))
5512 end do
5513 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
5514 do k = 1, nvertlevels
5515 target_z = 0.5 * (zgrid(k,icell) + zgrid(k+1,icell))
5516 pressure(k,icell) = exp(vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, &
5517 sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, extrap=1))
5518 end do
5519
5520 end do
5521
5522
5523 do iedge=1,nedges
5524
5525 ! U
5526 sorted_arr(:,:) = -999.0
5527 do k=1,nfglevels_actual
5528 sorted_arr(1,k) = 0.5 * (z_fg(k,cellsonedge(1,iedge)) + z_fg(k,cellsonedge(2,iedge)))
5529 if (vert_level(k) == 200100.0) sorted_arr(1,k) = 99999.0
5530 sorted_arr(2,k) = u_fg(k,iedge)
5531 end do
5532 call mpas_quicksort(nfglevels_actual, sorted_arr)
5533 do k=1,nvertlevels
5534 target_z = 0.25 * (zgrid(k,cellsonedge(1,iedge)) + zgrid(k+1,cellsonedge(1,iedge)) &
5535 + zgrid(k,cellsonedge(2,iedge)) + zgrid(k+1,cellsonedge(2,iedge)))
5536 u(k,iedge) = vertical_interp(target_z, nfglevels_actual-1, sorted_arr(:,1:nfglevels_actual-1), order=1, extrap=1)
5537 end do
5538
5539 end do
5540
5541 deallocate(sorted_arr)
5542
5543
5544 ! Diagnose the water vapor mixing ratios:
5545 global_sh_min = 0._rkind
5546 global_sh_max = 0._rkind
5547 if(config_use_spechumd) then
5548 sh_min = minval(spechum(:,1:ncellssolve))
5549 sh_max = maxval(spechum(:,1:ncellssolve))
5550 call mpas_dmpar_min_real(dminfo,sh_min,global_sh_min)
5551 call mpas_dmpar_max_real(dminfo,sh_max,global_sh_max)
5552 endif
5553 call mpas_log_write('')
5554 call mpas_log_write('--- global_sh_min = $r', realargs=(/global_sh_min/))
5555 call mpas_log_write('--- global_sh_max = $r', realargs=(/global_sh_max/))
5556 call mpas_log_write('')
5557
5558 call mpas_log_write('--- config_use_spechumd = $l', logicargs=(/config_use_spechumd/))
5559 if(.not. config_use_spechumd .or. (global_sh_min==0._rkind .and. global_sh_max==0._rkind)) then
5560 !--- calculate the saturation mixing ratio and interpolated first-guess relative humidity:
5561 if (config_use_spechumd) then
5562 call mpas_log_write('config_use_spechumd=T, but specific humidity was not found in ' &
5563 //trim(config_met_prefix)//':'//timestamp(1:13), messagetype=mpas_log_warn)
5564 end if
5565 call mpas_log_write(' *** initializing water vapor mixing ratio using first-guess relative humidity')
5566 call mpas_log_write('')
5567
5568 do k = 1, nvertlevels
5569 do icell = 1, ncells
5570 !
5571 ! Note: the RH field provided by ungrib should always be with respect to liquid water,
5572 ! hence, we can always call rslf; see the routine fix_gfs_rh in WPS/ungrib/src/rrpr.F .
5573 !
5574 rs = rslf(pressure(k,icell),t(k,icell))
5575 scalars(index_qv,k,icell) = 0.01_rkind*rs*relhum(k,icell)
5576 enddo
5577 enddo
5578 else
5579 !--- use the interpolated first-guess specific humidity:
5580 call mpas_log_write(' *** initializing water vapor mixing ratio using first-guess specific humidity')
5581 call mpas_log_write('')
5582 do k = 1, nvertlevels
5583 do icell = 1, ncells
5584 scalars(index_qv,k,icell) = spechum(k,icell)/(1._rkind-spechum(k,icell))
5585 enddo
5586 enddo
5587 endif
5588
5589 !
5590 ! Diagnose fields needed in initial conditions file (u, w, rho, theta)
5591 ! NB: At this point, "rho_zz" is simple dry density, and "theta_m" is regular potential temperature
5592 !
5593 do icell=1,ncells
5594
5595 do k=1,nvertlevels
5596 ! PI
5597 p(k,icell) = (pressure(k,icell) / p0) ** (rgas / cp)
5598
5599 ! THETA - can compute this using PI instead
5600 t(k,icell) = t(k,icell) * (p0 / pressure(k,icell)) ** (rgas / cp)
5601
5602 ! RHO_ZZ
5603 rho_zz(k,icell) = pressure(k,icell) / rgas / (p(k,icell) * t(k,icell))
5604 rho_zz(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) / (1.0 + scalars(index_qv,k,icell))
5605 end do
5606 end do
5607
5608
5609 !
5610 ! Reference state based on a dry isothermal atmosphere
5611 !
5612 do icell=1,ncells
5613 do k=1,nvertlevels
5614 ztemp = 0.5*(zgrid(k+1,icell)+zgrid(k,icell))
5615 ppb(k,icell) = p0*exp(-gravity*ztemp/(rgas*t0b)) ! pressure_base
5616 pb(k,icell) = (ppb(k,icell)/p0)**(rgas/cp) ! exner_base
5617 rb(k,icell) = ppb(k,icell)/(rgas*t0b) ! rho_base
5618 tb(k,icell) = t0b/pb(k,icell) ! theta_base
5619 rtb(k,icell) = rb(k,icell)*tb(k,icell) ! rtheta_base
5620 p(k,icell) = pb(k,icell) ! exner
5621 pp(k,icell) = 0. ! pressure_p
5622 rr(k,icell) = 0. ! rho_p
5623 end do
5624 end do
5625
5626 do icell=1,ncells
5627 do k=1,nvertlevels
5628
5629 ! couple with vertical metric
5630 rb(k,icell) = rb(k,icell) / zz(k,icell)
5631 rho_zz(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) / zz(k,icell)
5632
5633 pp(k,icell) = pressure(k,icell) - ppb(k,icell)
5634 rr(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) - rb(k,icell)
5635
5636 end do
5637 end do
5638
5639 do icell=1,ncells
5640 k = 1
5641
5642 ! couple with vertical metric, note: rr is coupled here
5643 rho_zz(k,icell) = ((pressure(k,icell) / p0)**(cv / cp)) * (p0 / rgas) &
5644 / (t(k,icell)*(1.0 + 1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,icell))) / zz(k,icell)
5645 rr(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) - rb(k,icell)
5646
5647 do k=2,nvertlevels
5648 it = 0
5649 p_check = 2.0 * 0.0001
5650 do while ( (it < 30) .and. (p_check > 0.0001) )
5651
5652 p_check = pp(k,icell)
5653
5654 ! MPAS hydrostatic relation
5655 pp(k,icell) = pp(k-1,icell) - (fzm(k)*rr(k,icell) + fzp(k)*rr(k-1,icell))*gravity*dzu(k) &
5656 - (fzm(k)*rho_zz(k,icell)*scalars(index_qv,k,icell) &
5657 + fzp(k)*rho_zz(k-1,icell)*scalars(index_qv,k-1,icell))*gravity*dzu(k)
5658 pressure(k,icell) = pp(k,icell) + ppb(k,icell)
5659 p(k,icell) = (pressure(k,icell) / p0) ** (rgas / cp)
5660
5661 ! couple with vertical metric
5662 rho_zz(k,icell) = pressure(k,icell) / rgas &
5663 / (p(k,icell)*t(k,icell)*(1.0 + 1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,icell)))/zz(k,icell)
5664 rr(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) - rb(k,icell)
5665
5666 p_check = abs(p_check - pp(k,icell))
5667
5668 it = it + 1
5669 end do
5670 end do
5671 end do
5672
5673 ! Compute theta_m and rho-tilde
5674 do icell=1,ncells
5675 do k=1,nvertlevels
5676 t(k,icell) = t(k,icell) * (1.0 + 1.61*scalars(index_qv,k,icell))
5677 rr(k,icell) = rr(k,icell)*zz(k,icell)
5678 end do
5679 end do
5680
5681 do iedge=1,nedges
5682 do k=1,nvertlevels
5683 ru(k,iedge) = u(k,iedge) * 0.5*(rho_zz(k,cellsonedge(1,iedge)) + rho_zz(k,cellsonedge(2,iedge)))
5684 end do
5685 end do
5686
5687
5688 rw(:,:) = 0.0
5689
5690 do icell=1,ncellssolve
5691
5692 do i=1,nedgesoncell(icell)
5693 iedge=edgesoncell(i,icell)
5694
5695 do k = 2, nvertlevels
5696 flux = (fzm(k)*ru(k,iedge)+fzp(k)*ru(k-1,iedge))
5697 if (icell == cellsonedge(1,iedge)) then
5698 rw(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) - (fzm(k)*zz(k,icell)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,icell))*zb(k,1,iedge)*flux
5699 else
5700 rw(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) + (fzm(k)*zz(k,icell)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,icell))*zb(k,2,iedge)*flux
5701 end if
5702
5703 if (config_theta_adv_order ==3) then
5704 if (icell == cellsonedge(1,iedge)) then
5705 rw(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) &
5706 + sign(1.0_rkind,ru(k,iedge))*config_coef_3rd_order* &
5707 (fzm(k)*zz(k,icell)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,icell))*zb3(k,1,iedge)*flux
5708 else
5709 rw(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) &
5710 - sign(1.0_rkind,ru(k,iedge))*config_coef_3rd_order* &
5711 (fzm(k)*zz(k,icell)+fzp(k)*zz(k-1,icell))*zb3(k,2,iedge)*flux
5712 end if
5713 end if
5714
5715 end do
5716
5717 end do
5718
5719 end do
5720
5721
5722 ! Compute w from rho_zz and rw
5723 do icell=1,ncellssolve
5724 do k=2,nvertlevels
5725 w(k,icell) = rw(k,icell) / (fzp(k) * rho_zz(k-1,icell) + fzm(k) * rho_zz(k,icell))
5726 end do
5727 end do
5728
5729 deallocate(vert_level)
5730
5731
5732 ! Compute rho and theta from rho_zz and theta_m
5733 do icell=1,ncells
5734 do k=1,nvertlevels
5735 rho(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) * zz(k,icell)
5736 theta(k,icell) = t(k,icell) / (1.0 + 1.61 * scalars(index_qv,k,icell))
5737 end do
5738 end do
5739
5740 end subroutine init_atm_case_lbc
5741
5742
5743 integer function nearest_edge(target_lat, target_lon, &
5744 start_edge, &
5745 nCells, nEdges, maxEdges, nEdgesOnCell, edgesOnCell, cellsOnEdge, latCell, lonCell, latEdge, lonEdge)
5746
5747 implicit none
5748
5749 real (kind=rkind), intent(in) :: target_lat, target_lon
5750 integer, intent(in) :: start_edge
5751 integer, intent(in) :: ncells, nedges, maxedges
5752 integer, dimension(nCells), intent(in) :: nedgesoncell
5753 integer, dimension(maxEdges,nCells), intent(in) :: edgesoncell
5754 integer, dimension(2,nEdges), intent(in) :: cellsonedge
5755 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nCells), intent(in) :: latcell, loncell
5756 real (kind=rkind), dimension(nEdges), intent(in) :: latedge, lonedge
5757
5758 integer :: i, cell1, cell2, icell
5759 integer :: iedge
5760 integer :: current_edge
5761 real (kind=rkind) :: cell1_dist, cell2_dist
5762 real (kind=rkind) :: current_distance, d
5763 real (kind=rkind) :: nearest_distance
5764
5765 nearest_edge = start_edge
5766 current_edge = -1
5767
5768 do while (nearest_edge /= current_edge)
5769 current_edge = nearest_edge
5770 current_distance = sphere_distance(latedge(current_edge), lonedge(current_edge), target_lat, target_lon, 1.0_rkind)
5771 nearest_edge = current_edge
5772 nearest_distance = current_distance
5773 cell1 = cellsonedge(1,current_edge)
5774 cell2 = cellsonedge(2,current_edge)
5775 cell1_dist = sphere_distance(latcell(cell1), loncell(cell1), target_lat, target_lon, 1.0_rkind)
5776 cell2_dist = sphere_distance(latcell(cell2), loncell(cell2), target_lat, target_lon, 1.0_rkind)
5777 if (cell1_dist < cell2_dist) then
5778 icell = cell1
5779 else
5780 icell = cell2
5781 end if
5782 do i = 1, nedgesoncell(icell)
5783 iedge = edgesoncell(i,icell)
5784 if (iedge <= nedges) then
5785 d = sphere_distance(latedge(iedge), lonedge(iedge), target_lat, target_lon, 1.0_rkind)
5786 if (d < nearest_distance) then
5787 nearest_edge = iedge
5788 nearest_distance = d
5789 end if
5790 end if
5791 end do
5792 end do
5793
5794 end function nearest_edge
5795
5796
5797 real (kind=rkind) function vertical_interp(target_z, nz, zf, order, extrap, surface_val, sealev_val, ierr)
5798
5799 implicit none
5800
5801 real (kind=rkind), intent(in) :: target_z
5802 integer, intent(in) :: nz
5803 real (kind=rkind), dimension(2,nz), intent(in) :: zf ! zf(1,:) is column of vertical coordinate values, zf(2,:) is column of field values
5804 integer, intent(in), optional :: order
5805 integer, intent(in), optional :: extrap ! can take values 0 = constant, 1 = linear (default), 2 = lapse-rate
5806 real (kind=rkind), intent(in), optional :: surface_val
5807 real (kind=rkind), intent(in), optional :: sealev_val
5808 integer, intent(out), optional :: ierr
5809
5810 integer :: k, lm, lp
5811 real (kind=rkind) :: wm, wp
5812 real (kind=rkind) :: slope
5813
5814 integer :: interp_order, extrap_type
5815 real (kind=rkind) :: surface, sealevel
5816
5817 if (present(ierr)) ierr = 0
5818
5819 if (present(order)) then
5820 interp_order = order
5821 else
5822 interp_order = 2
5823 end if
5824
5825 if (present(extrap)) then
5826 extrap_type = extrap
5827 else
5828 extrap_type = 1
5829 end if
5830
5831 if (present(surface_val)) then
5832 surface = surface_val
5833 else
5834 surface = 200100.0
5835 end if
5836
5837 if (present(sealev_val)) then
5838 sealevel = sealev_val
5839 else
5840 sealevel = 201300.0
5841 end if
5842
5843 !
5844 ! Extrapolation required
5845 !
5846 if (target_z < zf(1,1)) then
5847 if (extrap_type == 0) then
5848 vertical_interp = zf(2,1)
5849 else if (extrap_type == 1) then
5850 slope = (zf(2,2) - zf(2,1)) / (zf(1,2) - zf(1,1))
5851 vertical_interp = zf(2,1) + slope * (target_z - zf(1,1))
5852 else if (extrap_type == 2) then
5853 vertical_interp = zf(2,1) - (target_z - zf(1,1))*0.0065
5854 end if
5855 return
5856 end if
5857 if (target_z >= zf(1,nz)) then
5858 if (extrap_type == 0) then
5859 vertical_interp = zf(2,nz)
5860 else if (extrap_type == 1) then
5861 slope = (zf(2,nz) - zf(2,nz-1)) / (zf(1,nz) - zf(1,nz-1))
5862 vertical_interp = zf(2,nz) + slope * (target_z - zf(1,nz))
5863 else if (extrap_type == 2) then
5864 call mpas_log_write('extrap_type == 2 not implemented for target_z >= zf(1,nz)', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
5865 if (present(ierr)) ierr = 1
5866 return
5867 end if
5868 return
5869 end if
5870
5871
5872 !
5873 ! No extrapolation required
5874 !
5875 do k=1,nz-1
5876 if (target_z >= zf(1,k) .and. target_z < zf(1,k+1)) then
5877 lm = k
5878 lp = k+1
5879 wm = (zf(1,k+1) - target_z) / (zf(1,k+1) - zf(1,k))
5880 wp = (target_z - zf(1,k)) / (zf(1,k+1) - zf(1,k))
5881 exit
5882 end if
5883 end do
5884
5885 vertical_interp = wm*zf(2,lm) + wp*zf(2,lp)
5886
5887 return
5888
5889 end function vertical_interp
5890
5891
5892!----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5893
5894 real (kind=rkind) function env_qv( z, temperature, pressure, rh_max )
5895
5896 implicit none
5897 real (kind=rkind) :: z, temperature, pressure, ztr, es, qvs, p0, rh_max
5898
5899 p0 = 100000.
5900
5901! ztr = 5000.
5902!
5903! if(z .gt. ztr) then
5904! env_qv = 0.
5905! else
5906! if(z.lt.2000.) then
5907! env_qv = .5
5908! else
5909! env_qv = .5*(1.-(z-2000.)/(ztr-2000.))
5910! end if
5911! end if
5912
5913 if (pressure .lt. 50000. ) then
5914 env_qv = 0.0
5915 else
5916 env_qv = (1.-((p0-pressure)/50000.)**1.25)
5917 end if
5918
5919 env_qv = min(rh_max,env_qv)
5920
5921! env_qv is the relative humidity, turn it into mixing ratio
5922 if (temperature .gt. 273.15) then
5923 es = 1000.*0.6112*exp(17.67*(temperature-273.15)/(temperature-29.65))
5924 else
5925 es = 1000.*0.6112*exp(21.8745584*(temperature-273.16)/(temperature-7.66))
5926 end if
5927 qvs = (287.04/461.6)*es/(pressure-es)
5928
5929 ! qvs = 380.*exp(17.27*(temperature-273.)/(temperature-36.))/pressure
5930
5931 env_qv = env_qv*qvs
5932
5933 end function env_qv
5934
5935
5936 subroutine physics_idealized_init(mesh, fg)
5937
5938 implicit none
5939
5940 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: mesh
5941 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: fg
5942
5943 !local variables:
5944 integer :: iCell, iMonth, iSoil
5945 integer, pointer :: nCells, nSoilLevels, nMonths
5946 integer, dimension(:), pointer :: landmask, lu_index, soilcat_top
5947 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: ter, xice, shdmin, shdmax, vegfra, sfc_albbck, xland, seaice
5948 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: snow, snowc, snoalb, snowh, skintemp, sst, tmn
5949 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: tslb, smcrel, sh2o, smois, dzs, albedo12m, greenfrac
5950
5951 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5952
5953 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nCells', ncells)
5954 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nSoilLevels', nsoillevels)
5955 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(mesh, 'nMonths', nmonths)
5956
5957 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'ter', ter)
5958 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'landmask', landmask)
5959 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'lu_index', lu_index)
5960 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'soilcat_top', soilcat_top)
5961 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'shdmin', shdmin)
5962 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'shdmax', shdmax)
5963 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'snoalb', snoalb)
5964 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'albedo12m', albedo12m)
5965 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'greenfrac', greenfrac)
5966
5967 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'xice', xice)
5968 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'vegfra', vegfra)
5969 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sfc_albbck', sfc_albbck)
5970 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'xland', xland)
5971 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'seaice', seaice)
5972 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'snow', snow)
5973 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'snowc', snowc)
5974 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'snowh', snowh)
5975 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'skintemp', skintemp)
5976 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sst', sst)
5977 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'tmn', tmn)
5978 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'tslb', tslb)
5979 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'smcrel', smcrel)
5980 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'sh2o', sh2o)
5981 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'smois', smois)
5982 call mpas_pool_get_array(fg, 'dzs', dzs)
5983
5984 !initialization of surface input variables that are not needed if we run the current set of
5985 !idealized test cases:
5986
5987
5988 do icell = 1, ncells
5989
5990 !terrain,soil type, and vegetation:
5991 ter(icell) = 0.0
5992 xice(icell) = 0.0
5993 landmask(icell) = 0
5994 lu_index(icell) = 0
5995 soilcat_top(icell) = 0
5996 shdmin(icell) = 0.0
5997 shdmax(icell) = 0.0
5998 vegfra(icell) = 0.0
5999 sfc_albbck(icell) = 0.0
6000 xland(icell) = 0.0
6001 seaice(icell) = 0.0
6002
6003 !snow coverage:
6004 snow(icell) = 0.0
6005 snowc(icell) = 0.0
6006 snoalb(icell) = 0.08
6007 snowh(icell) = 0.0
6008
6009 !surface and sea-surface temperatures:
6010 skintemp(icell) = 288.0
6011 sst(icell) = 288.0
6012
6013 !soil layers:
6014 tmn(icell) = 288.0
6015 do isoil = 1, nsoillevels
6016 tslb(isoil,icell) = 288.0
6017 smcrel(isoil,icell) = 0.0
6018 sh2o(isoil,icell) = 0.0
6019 smois(isoil,icell) = 0.0
6020 dzs(isoil,icell) = 0.0
6021 end do
6022
6023 !monthly climatological surface albedo and greeness fraction:
6024 do imonth = 1, nmonths
6025 albedo12m(imonth,icell) = 0.08
6026 greenfrac(imonth,icell) = 0.0
6027 end do
6028
6029 end do
6030
6031 end subroutine physics_idealized_init
6032
6033
6034 subroutine decouple_variables(mesh, nCells, nVertLevels, state, diag)
6035
6036 implicit none
6037
6038 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(in) :: mesh
6039 integer, intent(in) :: nCells
6040 integer, intent(in) :: nVertLevels
6041 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: state
6042 type (mpas_pool_type), intent(inout) :: diag
6043
6044 integer :: iCell, iEdge, k
6045
6046 integer, dimension(:,:), pointer :: cellsOnEdge
6047 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: rdzw
6048 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), pointer :: zz, pp, ppb, rho, rho_zz, theta, theta_m
6049 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: surface_pressure
6050 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:,:), pointer :: scalars
6051
6052 integer, pointer :: index_qv
6053
6054 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'cellsOnEdge', cellsonedge)
6055 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'rdzw', rdzw)
6056 call mpas_pool_get_array(mesh, 'zz', zz)
6057 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_p', pp)
6058 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'pressure_base', ppb)
6059 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'surface_pressure', surface_pressure)
6060 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'rho', rho)
6061 call mpas_pool_get_array(diag, 'theta', theta)
6062 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'rho_zz', rho_zz)
6063 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'theta_m', theta_m)
6064 call mpas_pool_get_array(state, 'scalars', scalars)
6065
6066 call mpas_pool_get_dimension(state, 'index_qv', index_qv)
6067
6068 ! Compute surface pressure
6069 do icell=1,ncells
6070 surface_pressure(icell) = 0.5*gravity/rdzw(1) &
6071 * (1.25* rho_zz(1,icell) * (1. + scalars(index_qv, 1, icell)) &
6072 - 0.25* rho_zz(2,icell) * (1. + scalars(index_qv, 2, icell)))
6073 surface_pressure(icell) = surface_pressure(icell) + pp(1,icell) + ppb(1,icell)
6074 end do
6075
6076
6077 ! Compute rho and theta from rho_zz and theta_m
6078 do icell=1,ncells
6079 do k=1,nvertlevels
6080 rho(k,icell) = rho_zz(k,icell) * zz(k,icell)
6081 theta(k,icell) = theta_m(k,icell) / (1.0 + 1.61 * scalars(index_qv,k,icell))
6082 end do
6083 end do
6084
6085 end subroutine decouple_variables
6086
6087
6088 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
6089 ! routine blend_bdy_terrain
6090 !
6110 !
6111 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
6112 subroutine blend_bdy_terrain(config_met_prefix, config_start_time, nCells, latCell, lonCell, bdyMaskCell, ter, dryrun, ierr)
6113
6114 use init_atm_read_met, only : read_met_init, read_met_close, read_next_met_field, met_data
6115 use init_atm_llxy, only : map_init, map_set, proj_info, latlon_to_ij, proj_latlon, proj_gauss, deg_per_rad
6116 use init_atm_hinterp, only : interp_sequence, four_point
6117
6118 implicit none
6119
6120 character(len=*), intent(in) :: config_met_prefix
6121 character(len=*), intent(in) :: config_start_time
6122 integer, intent(in) :: nCells
6123 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), intent(in) :: latcell ! These four variables (latCell, lonCell, bdyMaskCell, and ter)
6124 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), intent(in) :: loncell ! may actually have more than nCells elements, for example,
6125 integer, dimension(:), intent(in) :: bdyMaskCell ! if the arrays include a "garbage cell".
6126 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: ter !
6127 logical, intent(in) :: dryrun
6128 integer, intent(out) :: ierr
6129
6130 integer, parameter :: nBdyLayers = 7 ! The number of relaxation layers plus the number of specified layers
6131 integer, parameter :: nSpecLayers = 2 ! The number of specified layers
6132
6133 integer :: i
6134 integer :: istatus
6135 integer, dimension(2) :: interp_list
6136 real (kind=rkind) :: weight
6137 real (kind=rkind) :: lat, lon
6138 real (kind=rkind) :: x, y
6139 real (kind=rkind), allocatable, dimension(:,:) :: rslab
6140 type (met_data) :: field
6141 type (proj_info) :: proj
6142
6143
6144 ierr = 0
6145
6146 if (.not. dryrun) then
6147 call mpas_log_write('Blending first-guess terrain field along domain boundary')
6148 end if
6149
6150 call read_met_init(trim(config_met_prefix), .false., config_start_time(1:13), istatus)
6151
6152 if (istatus /= 0) then
6153 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', &
6154 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
6155 call mpas_log_write('Error opening file with terrain field, '//trim(config_met_prefix)//':'//config_start_time(1:13), &
6156 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
6157 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', &
6158 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
6159 ierr = 1
6160 return
6161 end if
6162
6163 !
6164 ! Loop over fields in the intermediate file looking for the SOILHGT field
6165 !
6166 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
6167 do while (istatus == 0)
6168 if (trim(field % field) == 'SOILHGT') then
6169
6170 if (.not. dryrun) then
6171 interp_list(1) = four_point
6172 interp_list(2) = 0
6173
6174 !
6175 ! Set up map projection - currently, only the regular lat-lon projection is handled
6176 !
6177 call map_init(proj)
6178
6179 if (field % iproj == proj_latlon) then
6180 call map_set(proj_latlon, proj, &
6181 latinc = real(field % deltalat,rkind), &
6182 loninc = real(field % deltalon,rkind), &
6183 knowni = 1.0_rkind, &
6184 knownj = 1.0_rkind, &
6185 lat1 = real(field % startlat,rkind), &
6186 lon1 = real(field % startlon,rkind))
6187 else if (field % iproj == proj_gauss) then
6188 call map_set(proj_gauss, proj, &
6189 nlat = nint(field % deltalat), &
6190 loninc = 360.0_rkind / real(field % nx,rkind), &
6191 lat1 = real(field % startlat,rkind), &
6192 lon1 = real(field % startlon,rkind))
6193 end if
6194
6195 !
6196 ! Copy the first-guess terrain field into an array that includes some periodic points
6197 !
6198 allocate(rslab(-2:field % nx+3, field % ny))
6199 rslab(1:field % nx, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(1:field % nx, 1:field % ny)
6200 rslab(0, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx, 1:field % ny)
6201 rslab(-1, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx-1, 1:field % ny)
6202 rslab(-2, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(field % nx-2, 1:field % ny)
6203 rslab(field % nx+1, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(1, 1:field % ny)
6204 rslab(field % nx+2, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(2, 1:field % ny)
6205 rslab(field % nx+3, 1:field % ny) = field % slab(3, 1:field % ny)
6206
6207 !
6208 ! For each cell in the MPAS mesh, perform terrain blending if the cell is a boundary cell
6209 !
6210 do i=1,ncells
6211 if (bdymaskcell(i) > 0) then
6212 lat = latcell(i)*deg_per_rad
6213 lon = loncell(i)*deg_per_rad
6214 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
6215 if (x < 0.5) then
6216 lon = lon + 360.0
6217 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
6218 else if (x >= real(field%nx)+0.5) then
6219 lon = lon - 360.0
6220 call latlon_to_ij(proj, lat, lon, x, y)
6221 end if
6222 if (y < 0.5) then
6223 y = 1.0
6224 else if (y >= real(field%ny)+0.5) then
6225 y = real(field%ny)
6226 end if
6227
6228 !
6229 ! Is this a specified cell?
6230 !
6231 if (bdymaskcell(i) > (nbdylayers - nspeclayers)) then
6232 ter(i) = interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, -2, field%nx + 3, 1, field%ny, &
6233 1, 1, -1.0e30_rkind, interp_list, 1)
6234
6235 !
6236 ! Or a relaxation cell?
6237 !
6238 else
6239 weight = real(bdymaskcell(i),kind=rkind) / real(nbdylayers - nspeclayers,kind=rkind)
6240 ter(i) = weight * interp_sequence(x, y, 1, rslab, -2, field%nx + 3, 1, field%ny, &
6241 1, 1, -1.0e30_rkind, interp_list, 1) &
6242 + (1.0_rkind - weight) * ter(i)
6243
6244 end if
6245 end if
6246 end do
6247
6248 deallocate(rslab)
6249 end if
6250
6251 !
6252 ! At this point, we have found and processed the first-guess terrain field, so we can return
6253 !
6254 deallocate(field % slab)
6255 call read_met_close()
6256 return
6257
6258 end if
6259
6260 deallocate(field % slab)
6261 call read_next_met_field(field, istatus)
6262 end do
6263
6264 call read_met_close()
6265
6266 !
6267 ! If we have reached this point, no first-guess terrain field was found...
6268 !
6269 ierr = 1
6270 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', &
6271 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
6272 call mpas_log_write('SOILHGT field not found in intermediate file ' &
6273 //trim(config_met_prefix)//':'//config_start_time(1:13) , &
6274 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
6275 call mpas_log_write('********************************************************************************', &
6276 messagetype=mpas_log_err)
6277
6278 end subroutine blend_bdy_terrain
6279
6280
6281 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
6282 ! routine convert_relhum_wrt_ice
6283 !
6296 !
6297 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
6298 subroutine convert_relhum_wrt_ice(t, relhum)
6299
6300 implicit none
6301
6302 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), intent(in) :: t
6303 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: relhum
6304
6305 integer :: iCell, k
6306 integer :: nVertLevels
6307 integer :: nCells
6308 real (kind=rkind) :: eis, ews, r1
6309
6310
6311 nvertlevels = size(t, dim=1)
6312 ncells = size(t, dim=2)
6313
6314 call mpas_log_write('')
6315 call mpas_log_write('Recomputing RH w.r.t. ice below freezing')
6316 call mpas_log_write('')
6317
6318 do icell = 1, ncells
6319 do k = 1, nvertlevels
6320 if ( t(k,icell) <= 273.15_rkind ) then
6321
6322 ! use formula in ungrib to reconstruct RH
6323 eis = 0.01_rkind * exp(9.550426_rkind - (5723.265_rkind / t(k,icell)) + (3.53068_rkind * log(t(k,icell))) &
6324 - (0.00728332_rkind * t(k,icell)))
6325 ews = 6.112_rkind * exp(17.67_rkind * (t(k,icell)-273.15_rkind) / ((t(k,icell)-273.15_rkind)+243.5_rkind))
6326
6327 ! A linear approximation to the GFS blending region ( -20 C > T < 0 C )
6328 if ( t(k,icell) > 253.15_rkind ) then
6329 r1 = ((273.15_rkind - t(k,icell)) / 20.0_rkind)
6330 r1 = (r1 * eis) + ((1.0_rkind-r1)*ews)
6331 else
6332 r1 = eis
6333 end if
6334 r1 = max(r1, 1.0e-12_rkind)
6335 ews = max(ews, 0.0_rkind)
6336 relhum(k,icell) = ews / r1 * relhum(k,icell)
6337 relhum(k,icell) = min(relhum(k,icell), 100.0_rkind)
6338 relhum(k,icell) = max(relhum(k,icell), 0.0_rkind)
6339 end if
6340 end do
6341 end do
6342
6343 end subroutine convert_relhum_wrt_ice
6344
6345
6346 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
6347 ! routine read_text_array
6348 !
6368 !
6369 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
6370 function read_text_array(dminfo, filename, xarray) result(ierr)
6371
6372 use mpas_io_units, only : mpas_new_unit, mpas_release_unit
6373 use mpas_log, only : mpas_log_write
6374 use mpas_derived_types, only : mpas_log_err
6375
6376 implicit none
6377
6378 type (dm_info), intent(in) :: dminfo
6379 character(len=*), intent(in) :: filename
6380 real (kind=rkind), dimension(:), pointer :: xarray
6381
6382 integer :: ierr
6383
6384 integer :: i
6385 integer :: nlines
6386 integer :: iunit
6387 integer :: iexists
6388 logical :: exists
6389 real (kind=rkind) :: rtemp
6390
6391
6392 ierr = 1
6393 nullify(xarray)
6394
6395 !
6396 ! Check whether the file exists
6397 !
6398 if (dminfo % my_proc_id == io_node) then
6399 inquire(file=filename, exist=exists)
6400 if (exists) then
6401 iexists = 1
6402 else
6403 iexists = 0
6404 end if
6405 end if
6406 call mpas_dmpar_bcast_int(dminfo, iexists)
6407
6408 if (iexists == 0) then
6409 call mpas_log_write('Text file '''//filename//''' does not exist.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
6410 return
6411 end if
6412
6413 !
6414 ! Count the number of lines in the file
6415 !
6416 if (dminfo % my_proc_id == io_node) then
6417 call mpas_new_unit(iunit)
6418 open(unit=iunit, file=filename, form='formatted', status='old', iostat=ierr)
6419 if (ierr /= 0) then
6420 nlines = -1
6421 else
6422 nlines = 0
6423 read(unit=iunit, fmt=*, iostat=ierr) rtemp
6424 do while (ierr == 0)
6425 nlines = nlines + 1
6426 read(unit=iunit, fmt=*, iostat=ierr) rtemp
6427 end do
6428 end if
6429 close(unit=iunit)
6430 call mpas_release_unit(iunit)
6431 end if
6432 call mpas_dmpar_bcast_int(dminfo, nlines)
6433
6434 if (nlines <= 0) then
6435 if (nlines < 0) then
6436 call mpas_log_write('Text file '''//filename//''' could not be opened for reading.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
6437 else
6438 call mpas_log_write('Text file '''//filename//''' contains no readable real values.', messagetype=mpas_log_err)
6439 end if
6440 ierr = 1
6441 return
6442 end if
6443
6444 !
6445 ! Allocate output array, read, and broadcast
6446 !
6447 allocate(xarray(nlines))
6448 if (dminfo % my_proc_id == io_node) then
6449 call mpas_new_unit(iunit)
6450 open(unit=iunit, file=filename, form='formatted', status='old', iostat=ierr)
6451 do i=1,nlines
6452 read(unit=iunit, fmt=*, iostat=ierr) xarray(i)
6453 end do
6454 close(unit=iunit)
6455 call mpas_release_unit(iunit)
6456 end if
6457
6458 call mpas_dmpar_bcast_reals(dminfo, nlines, xarray)
6459 ierr = 0
6460
6461 end function read_text_array
6462
6463
6464end module init_atm_cases

Constant: Gas constant for dry air [J kg-1 K-1].

mpas_dmpar
MPAS Communication Routines.

mpas_dmpar::mpas_dmpar_min_real
subroutine, public mpas_dmpar_min_real(dminfo, r, rmin)
MPAS dmpar minimum real routine.
Definition: mpas_dmpar.F:828
mpas_dmpar::mpas_dmpar_bcast_real
subroutine, public mpas_dmpar_bcast_real(dminfo, r, proc)
MPAS dmpar broadcast real routine.
Definition: mpas_dmpar.F:448
mpas_dmpar::mpas_dmpar_max_real
subroutine, public mpas_dmpar_max_real(dminfo, r, rmax)
MPAS dmpar maximum real routine.
